Theory CompositionalRefinement

(*
Title: Value-Dependent SIFUM Refinement
Authors: Toby Murray, Robert Sison
*)
theory CompositionalRefinement
imports Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.Compositionality
begin


lemma inj_card_le: 
  "inj (f::'a ‚áí 'b) ‚üπ finite (UNIV::'b set) ‚üπ card (UNIV::'a set) ‚â§ card (UNIV::'b set)"
  by (blast intro: card_inj_on_le)

text ‚Äπ
  We define a generic locale for capturing refinement between an abstract and a concrete
  program. We then define and prove sufficient, conditions that preserve local security
  from the abstract to the concrete program.

  Below we define a second locale that is more restrictive than this one. Specifically, this
  one allows the concrete program to have extra variables not present in the abstract one.
  These variables might be used, for instance, to implement a runtime stack that was implicit
  in the semantics of the abstract program; or as temporary storage for expression evaluation
  that may (appear to be) atomic in the abstract semantics.

  The simpler locale below forbids extra variables in the concrete program, making the
  necessary conditions for preservation of local security simpler.
‚Ä∫
locale sifum_refinement = 
  abs: sifum_security dma‚á©A ùíû_vars‚á©A ùíû‚á©A eval‚á©A some_val +
  conc: sifum_security dma‚á©C ùíû_vars‚á©C ùíû‚á©C eval‚á©C some_val
  for dma‚á©A :: "('Var‚á©A,'Val) Mem ‚áí 'Var‚á©A ‚áí Sec"
  and dma‚á©C :: "('Var‚á©C,'Val) Mem ‚áí 'Var‚á©C ‚áí Sec"
  and ùíû_vars‚á©A :: "'Var‚á©A ‚áí 'Var‚á©A set"
  and ùíû_vars‚á©C :: "'Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Var‚á©C set"
  and ùíû‚á©A :: "'Var‚á©A set"
  and ùíû‚á©C :: "'Var‚á©C set"
  and eval‚á©A :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and eval‚á©C :: "('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and some_val :: "'Val" +
  fixes var‚á©C_of :: "'Var‚á©A ‚áí 'Var‚á©C"
  assumes var‚á©C_of_inj: "inj var‚á©C_of" 
  assumes dma_consistent:
    "dma‚á©A (Œªx‚á©A. mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)) x‚á©A = dma‚á©C mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)"
  assumes ùíû_vars_consistent:
    "(var‚á©C_of ` ùíû_vars‚á©A x‚á©A) = ùíû_vars‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)"
  (* we make the (reasonable IMHO) assumption that the only control variables
     are user-declared and so that the compiler won't introduce new ones. *)
  assumes control_vars_are_A_vars:
    "ùíû‚á©C = var‚á©C_of ` ùíû‚á©A"

section "General Compositional Refinement"

text ‚Äπ
  The type of state relations between the abstract and compiled components.
  The job of a certifying compiler will be to exhibit one of these for each
  component it compiles. Below we'll define the conditions that such a
  relation needs to satisfy to give compositional refinement.
‚Ä∫
type_synonym ('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation = 
   "(('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val) LocalConf √ó ('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf) set"

context sifum_refinement begin

abbreviation 
  conf_abv‚á©A :: "'Com‚á©A ‚áí 'Var‚á©A Mds ‚áí ('Var‚á©A, 'Val) Mem ‚áí (_,_,_) LocalConf"
  ("‚ü®_, _, _‚ü©‚á©A" [0, 0, 0] 1000)
where
  "‚ü® c, mds, mem ‚ü©‚á©A ‚â° ((c, mds), mem)"

abbreviation 
  conf_abv‚á©C :: "'Com‚á©C ‚áí 'Var‚á©C Mds ‚áí ('Var‚á©C, 'Val) Mem ‚áí (_,_,_) LocalConf"
  ("‚ü®_, _, _‚ü©‚á©C" [0, 0, 0] 1000)
where
  "‚ü® c, mds, mem ‚ü©‚á©C ‚â° ((c, mds), mem)"

abbreviation 
  eval_abv‚á©A :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val) LocalConf ‚áí (_, _, _) LocalConf ‚áí bool"
  (infixl "‚Üù‚á©A" 70)
 where
  "x ‚Üù‚á©A y ‚â° (x, y) ‚àà eval‚á©A"

abbreviation 
  eval_abv‚á©C :: "('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf ‚áí (_, _, _) LocalConf ‚áí bool"
  (infixl "‚Üù‚á©C" 70)
where
  "x ‚Üù‚á©C y ‚â° (x, y) ‚àà eval‚á©C"

definition
  preserves_modes_mem :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚â° 
  (‚àÄ c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C. (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
      (‚àÄx‚á©A. (mem‚á©A x‚á©A) = (mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A))) ‚àß
      (‚àÄm. var‚á©C_of ` mds‚á©A m = (range var‚á©C_of) ‚à© mds‚á©C m))"

definition
  mem‚á©A_of :: "('Var‚á©C, 'Val) Mem ‚áí ('Var‚á©A, 'Val) Mem"
where
  "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C ‚â°  (Œªx‚á©A. (mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)))"
  
definition
  mds‚á©A_of :: "'Var‚á©C Mds ‚áí 'Var‚á©A Mds"
where
  "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C ‚â° (Œª m. (inv var‚á©C_of) ` (range var‚á©C_of ‚à© mds‚á©C m))"

lemma low_mds_eq_from_conc_to_abs:
  "conc.low_mds_eq mds mem mem' ‚üπ abs.low_mds_eq (mds‚á©A_of mds) (mem‚á©A_of mem) (mem‚á©A_of mem')"
  apply(clarsimp simp: abs.low_mds_eq_def conc.low_mds_eq_def mem‚á©A_of_def mds‚á©A_of_def)
  using var‚á©C_of_inj 
  by (metis IntI control_vars_are_A_vars dma_consistent image_eqI inv_f_f rangeI)

definition
  var‚á©A_of :: "'Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Var‚á©A"
where
  "var‚á©A_of ‚â° inv var‚á©C_of"

lemma preserves_modes_mem_mem‚á©A_simp:
  "(‚àÄx‚á©A. (mem‚á©A x‚á©A) = (mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A))) ‚üπ
      mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C"
  unfolding mem‚á©A_of_def by blast


lemma preserves_modes_mem_mds‚á©A_simp:
  "(‚àÄm. var‚á©C_of ` mds‚á©A m = range (var‚á©C_of) ‚à© mds‚á©C m) ‚üπ
      mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C"
  unfolding mds‚á©A_of_def
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(drule_tac x=m in spec)
  apply(rule equalityI)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rename_tac x‚á©A)
   apply(drule equalityD1)
   apply(drule_tac c="var‚á©C_of x‚á©A" in subsetD)
    apply blast
   unfolding image_def
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rule_tac x="var‚á©C_of x‚á©A" in bexI)
    apply(rule sym)
    apply(rule inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
   apply(drule inj_onD[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
   apply blast+
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rename_tac x‚á©A)
  apply(simp add: inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  apply(drule equalityD2)
  apply(drule_tac c="var‚á©C_of x‚á©A" in subsetD)
   apply blast
  apply clarsimp
  apply(drule inj_onD[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  apply blast+
  done

text ‚Äπ
  This version might be more useful. Not sure yet.
‚Ä∫
lemma preserves_modes_mem_def2:
  "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ =
  (‚àÄ c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C. (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
      mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C ‚àß
      mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C)"
  unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def
  apply(rule iffI)
   apply(blast dest: preserves_modes_mem_mem‚á©A_simp preserves_modes_mem_mds‚á©A_simp)
  apply safe
     apply(elim allE impE, assumption, elim conjE)
     apply(simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
    apply blast
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rename_tac x‚á©A)
   apply(elim allE impE, assumption, elim conjE)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(clarsimp simp: mds‚á©A_of_def image_def)
   apply(simp add: inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rename_tac x‚á©A)
  apply(rule imageI)
  apply(elim allE impE, assumption, elim conjE)
  apply(clarsimp simp: mds‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(subst image_def)
  apply clarify
  apply(rule_tac x="var‚á©C_of x‚á©A" in bexI)
   apply(simp add: inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  apply blast
  done

definition
  closed_others :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚â° 
  (‚àÄ c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C mem‚á©C'. (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
   (‚àÄx. mem‚á©C x ‚â† mem‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x) ‚ü∂
   (‚àÄx. dma‚á©C mem‚á©C x ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x) ‚ü∂
         (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ)"

definition
  stops‚á©C :: "('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf ‚áí bool"
where
  "stops‚á©C c ‚â° ‚àÄc'. ¬¨ (c ‚Üù‚á©C c')"

lemmas neval_induct = abs.neval.induct[consumes 1, case_names Zero Suc]

(* FIXME: move to Security.thy or similar *)
lemma strong_low_bisim_neval':
  "abs.neval c‚á©1 n c‚á©n ‚üπ (c‚á©1,c‚á©1') ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ snd (fst c‚á©1) = snd (fst c‚á©1') ‚üπ abs.strong_low_bisim_mm ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ
  ‚àÉc‚á©n'. abs.neval c‚á©1' n c‚á©n' ‚àß (c‚á©n,c‚á©n') ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß snd (fst c‚á©n) = snd (fst (c‚á©n'))"
proof(induct  arbitrary: c‚á©1' rule: neval_induct)
  case (Zero c‚á©1 c‚á©n)
   hence "abs.neval c‚á©1' 0 c‚á©1' ‚àß (c‚á©n, c‚á©1') ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß snd (fst c‚á©n) = snd (fst c‚á©1')"
     by(blast intro: abs.neval.intros(1))
   thus ?case by blast
next
  case (Suc lc‚á©0 lc‚á©1 n lc‚á©n lc‚á©0')
  obtain c‚á©0 mds‚á©0 mem‚á©0 
  where [simp]: "lc‚á©0 = ‚ü®c‚á©0, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©0‚ü©‚á©A" by (case_tac lc‚á©0, auto)
  obtain c‚á©1 mds‚á©1 mem‚á©1 
  where [simp]: "lc‚á©1 = ‚ü®c‚á©1, mds‚á©1, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©A" by (case_tac lc‚á©1, auto)
  from ‚Äπsnd (fst lc‚á©0) = snd (fst lc‚á©0')‚Ä∫ obtain c‚á©0' mem‚á©0'
  where [simp]: "lc‚á©0' = ‚ü®c‚á©0', mds‚á©0, mem‚á©0'‚ü©‚á©A" by (case_tac lc‚á©0', auto)
  
  from ‚Äπ(lc‚á©0, lc‚á©0') ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A‚Ä∫[simplified] ‚Äπlc‚á©0 ‚Üù‚á©A lc‚á©1‚Ä∫[simplified] ‚Äπabs.strong_low_bisim_mm ‚Ñõ‚á©A‚Ä∫
  obtain c‚á©1' mem‚á©1' where a: "‚ü®c‚á©0',mds‚á©0, mem‚á©0'‚ü©‚á©A ‚Üù‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1',mds‚á©1, mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©A" and 
          b: "(‚ü®c‚á©1,mds‚á©1,mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1',mds‚á©1, mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
    unfolding abs.strong_low_bisim_mm_def
    by blast

  from this Suc.hyps Suc(6) obtain lc‚á©S' where "abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1',mds‚á©1,mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©A n lc‚á©S'" and "(lc‚á©n, lc‚á©S') ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A" and "snd (fst lc‚á©n) = snd (fst lc‚á©S')"
    by force
  with Suc this a b show ?case by(fastforce intro: abs.neval.intros(2))
qed

lemma strong_low_bisim_neval:
  "abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1,mds‚á©1,mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü®c‚á©n,mds‚á©n,mem‚á©n‚ü©‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©1,mds‚á©1,mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1',mds‚á©1,mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ abs.strong_low_bisim_mm ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ
  ‚àÉc‚á©n' mem‚á©n'. abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1',mds‚á©1,mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü®c‚á©n',mds‚á©n,mem‚á©n'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß (‚ü®c‚á©n,mds‚á©n,mem‚á©n‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©n',mds‚á©n,mem‚á©n'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  by(drule strong_low_bisim_neval', simp+)

lemma in_‚Ñõ_dma':
  assumes preserves: "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
  shows  "dma‚á©A mem‚á©A x‚á©A = dma‚á©C mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)"
proof -
  from assms have
    mds‚á©A_def: "mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C" and  
    mem‚á©A_def: "mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C"
    unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def2 by blast+
  
  have "dma‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) x‚á©A = dma‚á©C mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)"
    unfolding mem‚á©A_of_def
    by(rule dma_consistent)
  
  thus ?thesis
    by(simp add: mem‚á©A_def)
qed

lemma in_‚Ñõ_dma:
  assumes preserves: "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
  shows  "dma‚á©A mem‚á©A = (dma‚á©C mem‚á©C ‚àò var‚á©C_of)"
  unfolding o_def
  using assms by(blast intro: in_‚Ñõ_dma')


definition
  new_vars_private ::  "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "new_vars_private ‚Ñõ ‚â°
  (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C. 
   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
    (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
     (‚àÄv‚á©C. (mem‚á©1‚á©C' v‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©1‚á©C v‚á©C ‚à® dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' v‚á©C < dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C v‚á©C) ‚àß v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite) ‚àß
     (mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite - (range var‚á©C_of)) ‚äÜ (mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite - (range var‚á©C_of))))"

lemma not_less_eq_is_greater_Sec:
  "(¬¨ a ‚â§ (b::Sec)) = (a > b)"
  unfolding less_Sec_def less_eq_Sec_def using Sec.exhaust by blast

lemma doesnt_have_mode:
  "(x ‚àâ mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C m) = (var‚á©C_of x ‚àâ mds‚á©C m)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mds‚á©A_of_def image_def)
  apply(rule iffI)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(drule_tac x="var‚á©C_of x" in bspec)
    apply blast
   apply(simp add: inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  apply(clarify)
  apply(simp add: inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  done

lemma new_vars_private_does_the_thing:
  assumes nice: "new_vars_private ‚Ñõ"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ‚á©1: "(‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ‚á©2: "(‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
  assumes step‚á©1‚á©C: "‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C"
  assumes step‚á©2‚á©C: "‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C"
  assumes low_mds_eq‚á©C: "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C"
  assumes low_mds_eq‚á©A': "abs.low_mds_eq (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C') (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C') (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C')" 
  shows "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
  unfolding conc.low_mds_eq_def
proof(clarify)
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C"
  let ?mem‚á©2‚á©A = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©2‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
  let ?mds‚á©A = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  fix x‚á©C
  assume is_Low‚á©C': "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C = Low"
  assume is_readable‚á©C': "x‚á©C ‚àà ùíû‚á©C ‚à® x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
  show "mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C"
  proof(cases "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚â• dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß (x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂ x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite)")
    assume easy: "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚â• dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß (x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂ x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite)"
    with is_Low‚á©C' have is_Low‚á©C: "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C = Low" by (simp add: less_eq_Sec_def)
    from easy is_readable‚á©C' have is_readable‚á©C: "x‚á©C ‚àà ùíû‚á©C ‚à® x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite" by blast
    from is_Low‚á©C is_readable‚á©C low_mds_eq‚á©C have "mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C = mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C"
      unfolding conc.low_mds_eq_def by blast
    with easy show ?thesis by metis
  next
    assume a: "¬¨ (dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚â§ dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚àß
       mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß
       mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C ‚àß (x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂ x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite))"
    hence a_disj: "(dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C > dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚à®
       mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚à®
       mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C ‚à® (x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚àß x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite))"
       using not_less_eq_is_greater_Sec by blast
    show "mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C = mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C"
    proof(cases "x‚á©C ‚àà range var‚á©C_of")
      assume C_only_var: "x‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of"
      with in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 step‚á©1‚á©C nice
      have "(mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C ‚à® dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C' x‚á©C < dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C) ‚ü∂ x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
        unfolding new_vars_private_def  by blast
      moreover from C_only_var in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 step‚á©2‚á©C nice have "(mem‚á©2‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C) ‚ü∂ x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
        unfolding new_vars_private_def by blast
      moreover from C_only_var in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 step‚á©1‚á©C nice have "x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂ x‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite" unfolding new_vars_private_def by blast
      moreover from C_only_var is_readable‚á©C' have "x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
        using control_vars_are_A_vars by blast
      ultimately have False using a_disj by blast
      thus ?thesis by blast
    next
      assume in_val‚á©C_of: "x‚á©C ‚àà range var‚á©C_of"
      from this obtain x‚á©A where x‚á©C_def: "x‚á©C = var‚á©C_of x‚á©A" by blast
      from is_Low‚á©C' have is_Low‚á©A': "dma‚á©A ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' x‚á©A = Low"
        using dma_consistent unfolding mem‚á©A_of_def x‚á©C_def by force
      from is_readable‚á©C' have is_readable‚á©A': "x‚á©A ‚àà ùíû‚á©A ‚à® x‚á©A ‚àâ ?mds‚á©A' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
        using control_vars_are_A_vars x‚á©C_def doesnt_have_mode[symmetric] var‚á©C_of_inj inj_image_mem_iff by fast
      with is_Low‚á©A' low_mds_eq‚á©A' have x‚á©A_eq': "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' x‚á©A = ?mem‚á©2‚á©A' x‚á©A" 
        unfolding abs.low_mds_eq_def by blast
      thus ?thesis by(simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def x‚á©C_def)
    qed
  qed
qed

  
text ‚Äπ
  Perhaps surprisingly, we don't necessarily 
  care whether the refinement preserves
  termination or divergence behaviour from the source to the target program.
  It can do whatever it likes, so long as it transforms two source programs
  that are low bisimilar (i.e. perform the same low actions at the 
  same time), into two target ones that perform the same low actions at the
  same time.

  Having the concrete step correspond to zero abstract ones is like expanding
  abstract code out (think e.g. of side-effect free expression evaluation).
  Having the concrete step correspond to more than one abstract step is
  like optimising out abstract code. But importantly, the optimisation needs
  to look the same for abstract-bisimilar code.

  Additionally, we allow the instantiation of this theory to supply
  an arbitrary predicate that can be used to restrict our consideration to
  pairs of concrete steps that correspond to each other in terms of progress.
  This is particularly important for distinguishing between multiple concrete
  steps derived from the expansion of a single abstract step.
‚Ä∫
definition
  secure_refinement :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val) LocalConf rel ‚áí ('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí 
                          ('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf rel ‚áí bool"
where
  "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P ‚â°
  closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  new_vars_private ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  conc.closed_glob_consistent P ‚àß
  (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C. 
   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
    (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
     (‚àÉ n c‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A'. abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
       (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'. 
         (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
         (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
         (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P ‚àß
         abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A  ‚ü∂
           (‚àÉ c‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P)))))"

lemma preserves_modes_memD:
  "‚ü¶preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ; (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚üß ‚üπ mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C ‚àß mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C"
  using preserves_modes_mem_def2 by blast

lemma secure_refinement_def2:
  "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P ‚â°
  closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  new_vars_private ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  conc.closed_glob_consistent P ‚àß
  (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C. 
   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
    (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
     (‚àÉ n c‚á©1‚á©A'. abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
       (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'. 
         (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
         (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
         (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P ‚àß
         abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A  ‚ü∂
           (‚àÉ c‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P)))))"
  apply(rule eq_reflection)
  unfolding secure_refinement_def
  apply(rule conj_cong)
   apply(fastforce)
  apply(rule conj_cong)
   apply(fastforce)
  apply(rule conj_cong)
   apply(fastforce)
  apply(rule conj_cong, fastforce)
  apply(rule iffI)
   apply(intro allI conjI impI)
   apply((drule spec)+,erule (1) impE)
   apply((drule spec)+,erule (1) impE)
   using preserves_modes_memD apply metis
  apply(intro allI conjI impI)
  apply(frule (1) preserves_modes_memD, clarify)
  apply((drule spec)+,erule (1) impE)
  apply((drule spec)+,erule (1) impE)
  using preserves_modes_memD apply metis
  done

lemma extra_vars_are_not_control_vars:
  "x ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚üπ x ‚àâ ùíû‚á©C"
  proof(erule contrapos_nn)
    assume "x ‚àà ùíû‚á©C"
    from this obtain x‚á©A where "x = var‚á©C_of x‚á©A"
      using control_vars_are_A_vars by blast
    thus "x ‚àà range var‚á©C_of" by blast
  qed

definition
  R‚á©C_of :: 
 "((('Com‚á©A √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var‚á©A set)) √ó ('Var‚á©A ‚áí 'Val)) √ó
    ('Com‚á©A √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var‚á©A set)) √ó ('Var‚á©A ‚áí 'Val)) set ‚áí 
  ('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí
  ((('Com‚á©C √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var‚á©C set)) √ó ('Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Val)) √ó
    ('Com‚á©C √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var‚á©C set)) √ó ('Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Val)) set ‚áí
  ((('Com‚á©C √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var‚á©C set)) √ó ('Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Val)) √ó
    ('Com‚á©C √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var‚á©C set)) √ó ('Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Val)) set"
where
  "R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P ‚â° {(x,y). ‚àÉx‚á©A y‚á©A. (x‚á©A,x) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß (y‚á©A,y) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß (x‚á©A,y‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
     snd (fst x) = snd (fst y) ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO: annoying to have to say‚Ä∫ ‚àß
     conc.low_mds_eq (snd (fst x)) (snd x) (snd y) ‚àß
     (x,y) ‚àà P}"

lemma abs_low_mds_eq_dma‚á©C_eq:
  assumes "abs.low_mds_eq (mds‚á©A_of mds) (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C)  (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C)"
  shows "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C"
  proof(rule conc.dma_ùíû, rule ballI)
    fix x‚á©C
    assume "x‚á©C ‚àà ùíû‚á©C"
    from this obtain x‚á©A where "var‚á©C_of x‚á©A = x‚á©C" and "x‚á©A ‚àà ùíû‚á©A" using control_vars_are_A_vars by blast
    from assms ‚Äπx‚á©A ‚àà ùíû‚á©A‚Ä∫ have "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) x‚á©A = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) x‚á©A"
      unfolding abs.low_mds_eq_def
      using abs.ùíû_Low by blast
    thus "(mem‚á©1‚á©C x‚á©C) = (mem‚á©2‚á©C x‚á©C)"
      using ‚Äπvar‚á©C_of x‚á©A = x‚á©C‚Ä∫ unfolding mem‚á©A_of_def by blast
  qed

lemma R‚á©C_ofD:
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  shows
   "(‚àÉc‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A.  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
             (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A) ‚àß
    (mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C) ‚àß
    conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
  proof -
  have ‚Ñõ_preserves_modes_mem: "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ"
    using rr unfolding secure_refinement_def by blast

  from in_R obtain c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©1‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A mds‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A where
  in_‚Ñõ‚á©1: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©1‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
  in_‚Ñõ‚á©2: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©2‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
  in_‚Ñõ‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©1‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©2‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A" and
  pred_holds: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P" and
  mds_eq: "mds‚á©C = mds‚á©C'" and
  mds_eq: "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    unfolding R‚á©C_of_def by force+
  
  from this ‚Ñõ_preserves_modes_mem[simplified preserves_modes_mem_def2, rule_format, OF in_‚Ñõ‚á©1] ‚Ñõ_preserves_modes_mem[simplified preserves_modes_mem_def2, rule_format, OF in_‚Ñõ‚á©2]
    show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma R‚á©C_ofI:
   "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ
    conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P ‚üπ
     (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  unfolding R‚á©C_of_def by fastforce

lemma R‚á©C_of_sym:
  assumes "sym ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  assumes P_sym: "sym P"
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes mm: 
    "‚ãÄc‚á©1 mds mem‚á©1 c‚á©2 mds mem‚á©2. (‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ
    abs.low_mds_eq mds mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2"
  shows "sym (R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P)"
proof(rule symI, clarify)
  fix c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C  c‚á©2‚á©C mds‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C
  assume in_R‚á©C_of: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  from in_R‚á©C_of obtain c‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A where
  junk:
  "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
    (mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C) ‚àß conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
    using rr R‚á©C_ofD by fastforce+
  hence dma_eq: "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    using abs_low_mds_eq_dma‚á©C_eq[OF mm] by blast
  with junk have junk':
  "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
    (mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C) ‚àß
   conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
    using ‚Äπsym ‚Ñõ‚á©A‚Ä∫ P_sym unfolding sym_def using conc.low_mds_eq_sym by metis
   thus "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
   using R‚á©C_ofI by auto
qed

lemma R‚á©C_of_simp:
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  shows "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P =
   ((‚àÉc‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A.  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
             (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A) ‚àß
    conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P)"
  using assms by(blast dest: R‚á©C_ofD intro: R‚á©C_ofI)

definition
  A‚á©A_of :: "('Var‚á©C,'Val) adaptation ‚áí ('Var‚á©A,'Val) adaptation"
where
  "A‚á©A_of A ‚â° Œªx‚á©A. case A (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A) of None ‚áí None |
                  Some (v,v') ‚áí Some (v,v')"

lemma var_writable‚á©A:
  "¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x) ‚üπ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x"
  apply(simp add: var_asm_not_written_def mds‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(auto simp: inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  done

lemma A‚á©A_asm_mem:
  assumes A‚á©C_asm_mem: "‚àÄx. case A‚á©C x of None ‚áí True
           | Some (v, v') ‚áí
               mem‚á©1‚á©C x ‚â† v ‚à® mem‚á©2‚á©C x ‚â† v' ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
  shows "case (A‚á©A_of A‚á©C) x of None ‚áí True
           | Some (v, v') ‚áí
               (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) x ‚â† v ‚à® (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) x ‚â† v' ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x"
  apply(split option.splits, simp, intro allI impI)
  proof -
    fix v v'
    assume A‚á©A_not_None: "A‚á©A_of A‚á©C x = Some (v, v')"
    assume A‚á©A_updates_x: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C x = v ‚ü∂ mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C x ‚â† v'"
    from A‚á©A_not_None have
      A‚á©C_not_None: "A‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x) = Some (v, v')"
      unfolding A‚á©A_of_def by (auto split: option.splits)

    from A‚á©A_updates_x  have
      A‚á©C_updates_x: "mem‚á©1‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x) ‚â† v ‚à® mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x) ‚â† v'"
      unfolding mem‚á©A_of_def by fastforce

    from A‚á©C_not_None A‚á©C_updates_x A‚á©C_asm_mem have
      "¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x)" by (auto split: option.splits)

    thus "¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x"
      by(rule var_writable‚á©A)
  qed

lemma dma‚á©A_adaptation_eq:
  "dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]) x‚á©A = dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)"
  apply(subst dma_consistent[folded mem‚á©A_of_def, symmetric])
  apply(rule_tac x=x‚á©A in fun_cong)
  apply(rule_tac f="dma‚á©A" in arg_cong)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(clarsimp simp: apply_adaptation_def A‚á©A_of_def mem‚á©A_of_def split: option.splits)
  done

  
lemma A‚á©A_asm_dma:
  assumes A‚á©C_asm_dma: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) x ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
  shows "dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 (A‚á©A_of A‚á©C)]) x‚á©A ‚â† dma‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) x‚á©A ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x‚á©A"
proof(intro impI)
  assume A‚á©A_updates_dma: "dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]) x‚á©A ‚â† dma‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) x‚á©A"
 
  with dma_consistent[folded mem‚á©A_of_def] dma‚á©A_adaptation_eq
  have "dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A) ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)" by(metis)

  with A‚á©C_asm_dma have "¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)" by blast

  thus " ¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x‚á©A" by (rule  var_writable‚á©A)
qed

lemma var‚á©C_of_in_ùíû‚á©C: 
  assumes "x‚á©A ‚àà ùíû‚á©A"
  shows "var‚á©C_of x‚á©A ‚àà ùíû‚á©C"
proof -
  from assms obtain y‚á©A where "x‚á©A ‚àà ùíû_vars‚á©A y‚á©A"
  unfolding abs.ùíû_def by blast

  hence "var‚á©C_of x‚á©A ‚àà ùíû_vars‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y‚á©A)"
    using ùíû_vars_consistent by blast

  thus ?thesis using conc.ùíû_def by blast
qed

lemma doesnt_have_mode‚á©C:
  "x ‚àâ mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C m ‚üπ var‚á©C_of x ‚àâ mds‚á©C m"
  by(simp add: doesnt_have_mode)

lemma has_mode‚á©A: "var‚á©C_of x ‚àà mds‚á©C m ‚üπ x ‚àà mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C m"
  using doesnt_have_mode‚á©C
  by fastforce

lemma A‚á©A_sec:
  assumes A‚á©C_sec: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) x = Low ‚àß (x ‚àâ mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à® x ‚àà ùíû‚á©C) ‚ü∂
           mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C] x = mem‚á©2‚á©C [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©C] x"
  shows "dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]) x = Low ‚àß (x ‚àâ mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à® x ‚àà ùíû‚á©A) ‚ü∂
           (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] x = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] x"
proof(clarify)
  assume x_is_Low: "dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]) x = Low"
  assume x_is_readable: "x ‚àâ mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à® x ‚àà ùíû‚á©A"
    
  from x_is_Low have x_is_Low‚á©C: "dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) (var‚á©C_of x) = Low"
    using dma‚á©A_adaptation_eq by simp
  from x_is_readable have "var‚á©C_of x ‚àâ mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à® var‚á©C_of x ‚àà ùíû‚á©C"
    using doesnt_have_mode‚á©C  var‚á©C_of_in_ùíû‚á©C by blast
  with A‚á©C_sec x_is_Low‚á©C have "mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C] (var‚á©C_of x) = mem‚á©2‚á©C [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©C] (var‚á©C_of x)"
    by blast
  thus "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] x = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] x"
    by(auto simp: mem‚á©A_of_def apply_adaptation_def A‚á©A_of_def split: option.splits)
qed

lemma apply_adaptation‚á©A:
  "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] = mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C])"
  "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] = mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©C])"
  by(auto simp: mem‚á©A_of_def A‚á©A_of_def apply_adaptation_def split: option.splits)

 
lemma R‚á©C_of_closed_glob_consistent:
  assumes mm: 
    "‚ãÄc‚á©1 mds mem‚á©1 c‚á©2 mds mem‚á©2. (‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚üπ
    abs.low_mds_eq mds mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2"
  assumes cgc: "abs.closed_glob_consistent ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  shows "conc.closed_glob_consistent (R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P)"
  unfolding conc.closed_glob_consistent_def
proof(clarify)
  fix c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C A‚á©C
  assume "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  from this rr obtain c‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A where
       in_‚Ñõ‚á©A:  "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A" and
       in_‚Ñõ‚á©1:  "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
       in_‚Ñõ‚á©2:  "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
         and
       mds_eq: "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C"
         and
       P: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
      by (blast dest: R‚á©C_ofD)
  assume A‚á©C_asm_mem: "‚àÄx. case A‚á©C x of None ‚áí True
                                   | Some (v, v') ‚áí
                                      mem‚á©1‚á©C x ‚â† v ‚à® mem‚á©2‚á©C x ‚â† v' ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
  hence A‚á©A_asm_mem: "‚àÄx. case (A‚á©A_of A‚á©C) x of None ‚áí True
                                           | Some (v, v') ‚áí
               (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) x ‚â† v ‚à® (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) x ‚â† v' ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x"
    by(metis A‚á©A_asm_mem)

  assume A‚á©C_asm_dma: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) x ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
  hence A‚á©A_asm_dma: "‚àÄx‚á©A. dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 (A‚á©A_of A‚á©C)]) x‚á©A ‚â† dma‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) x‚á©A ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C) x‚á©A"
    by(metis A‚á©A_asm_dma)

  assume A‚á©C_sec: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C (mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C]) x = Low ‚àß (x ‚àâ mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à® x ‚àà ùíû‚á©C) ‚ü∂
         mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C] x = mem‚á©2‚á©C [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©C] x"
  hence A‚á©A_sec: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©A ((mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]) x = Low ‚àß (x ‚àâ mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à® x ‚àà ùíû‚á©A) ‚ü∂
         (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] x = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C] x"
    by(metis A‚á©A_sec)
    
  from rr have others: "closed_others ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_def by blast
  from rr have P_cgc: "conc.closed_glob_consistent P"
    unfolding secure_refinement_def by blast
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©C' = "(mem‚á©1‚á©C [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©C])" and
      ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "(mem‚á©2‚á©C [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©C])" and
      ?mem‚á©1‚á©A = "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C)" and
      ?mem‚á©2‚á©A = "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C)" and
      ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]" and
      ?mem‚á©2‚á©A' = "(mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]"

  have mem'_simps: 
    "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©1‚á©C'" 
    "?mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'" by(simp add: apply_adaptation‚á©A)+

  from cgc in_‚Ñõ‚á©A A‚á©A_asm_mem A‚á©A_asm_dma A‚á©A_sec have
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©A': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©1 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) [‚à•‚á©2 A‚á©A_of A‚á©C]‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A" unfolding abs.closed_glob_consistent_def by blast

  from A‚á©C_asm_mem A‚á©C_asm_dma have 
    A‚á©C_asm_mem‚á©1': "‚àÄx. mem‚á©1‚á©C x ‚â† ?mem‚á©1‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x" and
    A‚á©C_asm_dma‚á©1': "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C x ‚â† dma‚á©C ?mem‚á©1‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
    unfolding apply_adaptation_def by(force split: option.splits)+

  from A‚á©C_asm_mem have
    A‚á©C_asm_mem‚á©2': "‚àÄx. mem‚á©2‚á©C x ‚â† ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
    unfolding apply_adaptation_def by(force split: option.splits)

  from in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 A‚á©C_asm_mem‚á©1' A‚á©C_asm_dma‚á©1' others have
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©1':  "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding closed_others_def mem'_simps by blast

  from mm[OF in_‚Ñõ‚á©A] have 
    dma‚á©C_eq: "dma‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C" by(rule abs_low_mds_eq_dma‚á©C_eq)
  have dma‚á©C_eq': "dma‚á©C ?mem‚á©1‚á©C' = dma‚á©C ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
    apply(rule abs_low_mds_eq_dma‚á©C_eq[OF mm])
    apply(simp add: mem'_simps[symmetric])
    by(rule in_‚Ñõ‚á©A')
  from dma‚á©C_eq dma‚á©C_eq' A‚á©C_asm_dma‚á©1' have
    A‚á©C_asm_dma‚á©2': "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C x ‚â† dma‚á©C ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
    by simp

  from in_‚Ñõ‚á©2  A‚á©C_asm_mem‚á©2' A‚á©C_asm_dma‚á©2' others have
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©2':  "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding closed_others_def mem'_simps by blast

  have mds_eq': "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C ?mem‚á©1‚á©C' ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'" 
    using A‚á©C_sec unfolding conc.low_mds_eq_def by blast
   
 from P P_cgc A‚á©C_asm_mem A‚á©C_asm_dma A‚á©C_sec have P': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
   unfolding conc.closed_glob_consistent_def by blast 
  from in_‚Ñõ‚á©A' in_‚Ñõ‚á©1' in_‚Ñõ‚á©2' mem'_simps R‚á©C_ofI mds_eq' P' show
  "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
    by(metis)
qed

lemma R‚á©C_of_local_preservation:
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes bisim: "abs.strong_low_bisim_mm ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  assumes in_R‚á©C_of: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes step‚á©1‚á©C: "‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C"
  shows "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
          ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
          (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
proof -
  from rr in_R‚á©C_of have
    P: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
      by(blast dest: R‚á©C_ofD)

  let ?mds‚á©A = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C" and
      ?mem‚á©1‚á©A = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C" and
      ?mem‚á©2‚á©A = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" and
      ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'" and
      ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"

  from rr in_R‚á©C_of obtain c‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A where
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©1: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©2: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A" and
    low_mds_mds‚á©C: "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    by(blast dest: R‚á©C_ofD)+

  from rr in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©A in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 step‚á©1‚á©C obtain n c‚á©1‚á©A' where
     a: "(abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
         (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
       (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'. 
         (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P ‚àß
         abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©2‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A  ‚ü∂
           (‚àÉ c‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                   (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P)))"
  unfolding secure_refinement_def2
    by metis

  show ?thesis
  proof -
    from a have neval‚á©1‚á©A: "abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
                in_‚Ñõ‚á©1': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
           by blast+
    from  strong_low_bisim_neval[OF neval‚á©1‚á©A  in_‚Ñõ‚á©A bisim] obtain c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A' where
      neval‚á©2‚á©A: "abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, ?mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
      in_‚Ñõ‚á©A'_help: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
      unfolding abs.strong_low_bisim_mm_def
      by blast

    from a in_‚Ñõ‚á©A in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 neval‚á©2‚á©A P obtain c‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C' where
          step‚á©2‚á©C: "‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C" and
          in_‚Ñõ‚á©2'_help: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
          P': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
      by blast

    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
    from in_‚Ñõ‚á©2'_help rr preserves_modes_memD have "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = ?mem‚á©2‚á©A'" 
      unfolding secure_refinement_def by metis
    with in_‚Ñõ‚á©2'_help in_‚Ñõ‚á©A'_help have 
      in_‚Ñõ‚á©2': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
      in_‚Ñõ‚á©A': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
      by simp+

    have "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
      apply(rule new_vars_private_does_the_thing[where ‚Ñõ=‚Ñõ, OF _ in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 step‚á©1‚á©C step‚á©2‚á©C low_mds_mds‚á©C])
       using rr apply(fastforce simp: secure_refinement_def)
      using in_‚Ñõ‚á©A' bisim unfolding abs.strong_low_bisim_mm_def by blast

    with step‚á©2‚á©C in_‚Ñõ‚á©1' in_‚Ñõ‚á©2' in_‚Ñõ‚á©A' in_‚Ñõ‚á©2' P' show ?thesis
      by(blast intro: R‚á©C_ofI)
  qed
qed
  
text ‚Äπ
  Security of the concrete system should follow straightforwardly from
  security of the abstract one, via the compositionality theorem, presuming
  that the compiler also preserves the sound use of modes.
‚Ä∫
lemma R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm:
  assumes abs: "abs.strong_low_bisim_mm ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes P_sym: "sym P"
  shows "conc.strong_low_bisim_mm (R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P)"
  unfolding conc.strong_low_bisim_mm_def
  apply(intro conjI)
    apply(rule R‚á©C_of_sym)
    using abs rr P_sym unfolding abs.strong_low_bisim_mm_def apply blast+
   apply(rule R‚á©C_of_closed_glob_consistent)
    using abs unfolding abs.strong_low_bisim_mm_def apply blast+
   using rr apply blast
  apply safe
   apply(fastforce simp: R‚á©C_of_def)
  apply(rule R‚á©C_of_local_preservation)
     apply(rule rr)
    apply(rule abs)
   apply assumption+
  done

section "A Simpler Proof Principle for General Compositional Refinement"

text ‚Äπ
  Here we make use of the fact that the source language we are working
  in is assumed deterministic. This allows us to invert the direction
  of refinement and thereby to derive a simpler condition for secure
  compositional refinement.
  
  The simpler condition rests on an ordinary definition of refinement,
  and has the user prove separately that the coupling invariant @{term P}
  is self-preserving. This allows proofs about coupling invariant properties
  to be disentangled from the proof of refinement itself.
‚Ä∫
  
text ‚Äπ
  Given a  bisimulation @{term ‚Ñõ‚á©A}, this definition captures the essence of the extra
  requirements on a refinement relation~@{term ‚Ñõ} needed to ensure that the refined program is
  also secure. These requirements are essentially that:
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item The enabledness of the compiled code depends only on Low abstract data;
    \item The length of the abstract program to which a single step of the concrete program
          corresponds depends only on Low abstract data;
    \item The coupling invariant is maintained.
  \end{enumerate}
  
  The second requirement we express via the parameter~@{term abs_steps} that, given an
  abstract and corresponding concrete configuration, yields the number of execution steps of
  the abstract configuration to which a single step of the concrete configuration corresponds.
  
  Note that a more specialised version of this definition, fixing the coupling
  invariant @{term P} to be the one that relates all configurations with
  identical programs and mode states, appeared in Murray et al., CSF 2016.
  Here we generalise the theory to support a wider class of coupling invariants.
‚Ä∫
definition
  simpler_refinement_safe 
where
  "simpler_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P abs_steps ‚â° 
  ‚àÄc‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C. (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß 
      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
       (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P  ‚ü∂
           (stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àß
           (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àß
           (‚àÄmds‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C' c‚á©1‚á©C' c‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©1‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C  ‚àß
                                          ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©2‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
                                          (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©1‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©2‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P ‚àß
                                          mds‚á©1‚á©C' = mds‚á©2‚á©C')"

definition
  secure_refinement_simpler
where
  "secure_refinement_simpler ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P abs_steps ‚â°
  closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  new_vars_private ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  simpler_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P abs_steps ‚àß
  conc.closed_glob_consistent P ‚àß
  (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C. 
   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
    (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
     (‚àÉ c‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A'. abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ)))"
    
lemma secure_refinement_simpler:
  assumes rrs: "secure_refinement_simpler ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P abs_steps"
  shows "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  unfolding secure_refinement_def
proof(safe)
  from rrs show "closed_others ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
next
  from rrs show "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
next
  from rrs show "new_vars_private ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
next
  fix c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'
  let ?n = "abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
  assume in_‚Ñõ‚á©1: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
     and eval‚á©1‚á©C: "‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C"
  with rrs obtain c‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A' where
    neval‚á©1: "abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A ?n ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A" and
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©1': "(‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by metis
  have "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
                (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P ‚àß abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ?n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                    ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
                    (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß 
                    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume 
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A" and 
    in_‚Ñõ‚á©2: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
    neval‚á©2: "abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ?n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    in_P: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
    have "‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
    proof(clarify)
      fix c‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'
      assume eval‚á©2‚á©C: "‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C"
      from in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 eval‚á©2‚á©C in_P rrs obtain
      c‚á©2‚á©A'' mds‚á©A'' mem‚á©2‚á©A'' where 
      neval‚á©2': "abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A'', mds‚á©A'', mem‚á©2‚á©A'' ‚ü©‚á©A" and
      in_‚Ñõ‚á©2': "(‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A'', mds‚á©A'', mem‚á©2‚á©A'' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
        unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
      let ?n' = "(abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)"
      from rrs have pe: "simpler_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P abs_steps"
        unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
      with in_‚Ñõ‚á©A in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 in_P
      have "?n' = ?n"
        unfolding simpler_refinement_safe_def by fastforce
      with neval‚á©2 neval‚á©2' abs.neval_det 
      have [simp]: "c‚á©2‚á©A'' = c‚á©2‚á©A'"  and [simp]: "mds‚á©A'' = mds‚á©A'" and [simp]: "mem‚á©2‚á©A'' = mem‚á©2‚á©A'"
        by auto
      from in_‚Ñõ‚á©2' have in_‚Ñõ‚á©2': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" by simp
      from eval‚á©1‚á©C eval‚á©2‚á©C in_P have 
      in_P': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
        using rrs unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def
                            simpler_refinement_safe_def
        using in_‚Ñõ‚á©A in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 in_P by auto
      with in_‚Ñõ‚á©2'
      show "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
       (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P" by blast
    qed
    moreover have "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C"
    proof -
      from rrs have pe: "simpler_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P abs_steps"
        unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
      with in_‚Ñõ‚á©A in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 in_P have "stops‚á©C  ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = stops‚á©C  ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
        unfolding simpler_refinement_safe_def by blast
      moreover from eval‚á©1‚á©C have "¬¨ stops‚á©C  ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
        unfolding stops‚á©C_def by blast
      ultimately have "¬¨ stops‚á©C  ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
        by simp          
      from this obtain c‚á©2‚á©C' mds‚á©C'' mem‚á©2‚á©C'' where eval‚á©2‚á©C': "‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C',mds‚á©C'',mem‚á©2‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C"
        unfolding stops‚á©C_def by auto
      with pe eval‚á©1‚á©C in_‚Ñõ‚á©A in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©2 in_P have in_P': "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C',mds‚á©C'', mem‚á©2‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P"
                                             and [simp]: "mds‚á©C'' = mds‚á©C'"
        unfolding simpler_refinement_safe_def  by blast+
      from in_P' eval‚á©2‚á©C'
      show "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C"
        by fastforce
      qed
    ultimately show 
    "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
     ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C,
           ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
          ‚àà P"
      by blast
  qed
  with neval‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©1 in_‚Ñõ‚á©1' 
  show "‚àÉn c‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A'.
            abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
            (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
            (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
                (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                ‚àà P ‚àß
                abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                    ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
                    (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                    (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                    ‚àà P))"
    by auto
next
  show "conc.closed_glob_consistent P"
    using rrs unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def by blast
qed

section "Simple Bisimulations and Simple Refinement"

text ‚Äπ
  We derive the theory of simple refinements from Murray et al. CSF 2016 from the above
  \emph{simpler} theory of secure refinement.
‚Ä∫

definition
   bisim_simple
where
  "bisim_simple ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚â° ‚àÄc‚á©1‚á©A mds mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A. (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A,mds,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚ü∂ 
                                              c‚á©1‚á©A = c‚á©2‚á©A"
definition
  simple_refinement_safe
where
  "simple_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ abs_steps ‚â° 
  ‚àÄc‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C. (‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß 
      (‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß (‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
           (stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àß
           (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àß
           (‚àÄmds‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C' c‚á©1‚á©C' c‚á©2‚á©C'. ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©1‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C  ‚àß
                                          ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©2‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
                                          c‚á©1‚á©C' = c‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß mds‚á©1‚á©C' = mds‚á©2‚á©C')"

definition
  secure_refinement_simple
where
  "secure_refinement_simple ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ abs_steps ‚â°
  closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  new_vars_private ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  simple_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ abs_steps ‚àß
  bisim_simple ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
  (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C. 
   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
    (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'. ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
     (‚àÉ c‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A'. abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A,mds‚á©A,mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C,mds‚á©C,mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ)))"

definition
  ‚Ñêsimple
where
  "‚Ñêsimple ‚â° {(‚ü®c,mds,mem‚ü©‚á©C,‚ü®c',mds',mem'‚ü©‚á©C)| c mds mem c' mds' mem'. c = c'}"

lemma ‚Ñêsimple_closed_glob_consistent:
  "conc.closed_glob_consistent ‚Ñêsimple"
  by(auto simp: conc.closed_glob_consistent_def ‚Ñêsimple_def)
  
lemma secure_refinement_simple:
  assumes srs: "secure_refinement_simple ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ abs_steps"
  shows "secure_refinement_simpler ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ ‚Ñêsimple abs_steps"
unfolding secure_refinement_simpler_def
proof(safe | clarsimp)+
  from srs show "closed_others ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding secure_refinement_simple_def by blast
next
  from srs show "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding secure_refinement_simple_def by blast
next
  from srs show "new_vars_private ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding secure_refinement_simple_def by blast
next
  show "conc.closed_glob_consistent ‚Ñêsimple" by (rule ‚Ñêsimple_closed_glob_consistent)
next
  from srs have safe: "simple_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ abs_steps"
  unfolding secure_refinement_simple_def by blast
  from srs have simple: "bisim_simple ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  unfolding secure_refinement_simple_def by fastforce
  
  from safe simple show "simpler_refinement_safe ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ ‚Ñêsimple abs_steps"
  by(fastforce simp: simpler_refinement_safe_def ‚Ñêsimple_def simple_refinement_safe_def bisim_simple_def)
next
  fix c‚á©1‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C c‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C'
  show " (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
       ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚üπ
       ‚àÉc‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A'.
          abs.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
           ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
          (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
    using srs unfolding secure_refinement_simple_def by blast
qed
  
section "Sound Mode Use Preservation"

text ‚Äπ
  Prove that
  \begin{quote}
  acquiring a mode on the concrete version of an abstract
      variable~@{term x}, and then mapping the new concrete mode state to the
      corresponding abstract mode state,
  \end{quote}
   is equivalent to
   \begin{quote}
      first mapping the initial concrete mode
      state to its corresponding abstract mode state and then acquiring the mode
      on the abstract variable~@{term x}.
   \end{quote}

   This lemma essentially justifies why a concrete program doing
   @{term "Acq (var‚á©C_of x) SomeMode"}
   is a the right way to implement the abstract program doing
   @{term "Acq x SomeMode"}.
‚Ä∫

(* FIXME: There might be better names for these *)
lemma mode_acquire_refinement_helper:
  "mds‚á©A_of (mds‚á©C(SomeMode := insert (var‚á©C_of x) (mds‚á©C SomeMode))) =
   (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C)(SomeMode := insert x (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C SomeMode))"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mds‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply(force simp: image_def inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  done

lemma mode_release_refinement_helper:
  "mds‚á©A_of (mds‚á©C(SomeMode := {y ‚àà mds‚á©C SomeMode. y ‚â† (var‚á©C_of x)})) =
   (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C)(SomeMode := {y ‚àà (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C SomeMode). y ‚â† x})"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mds‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext)
  apply (force simp: image_def inv_f_f[OF var‚á©C_of_inj])
  done

definition
  preserves_locally_sound_mode_use :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "preserves_locally_sound_mode_use ‚Ñõ ‚â°
   ‚àÄlc‚á©A lc‚á©C.
      (abs.locally_sound_mode_use lc‚á©A ‚àß (lc‚á©A, lc‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
      conc.locally_sound_mode_use lc‚á©C)"

lemma secure_refinement_loc_reach:
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ:  "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
  assumes loc_reach‚á©C: "‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àà conc.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
  shows "‚àÉc‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©A'.
      (‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
      ‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A"
using loc_reach‚á©C proof(induct rule: conc.loc_reach.induct)
  case (refl) show ?case
    using in_‚Ñõ abs.loc_reach.refl by force
next
  case (step c‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' c‚á©C'' mds‚á©C'' mem‚á©C'')
  from step(2) obtain c‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' where 
    in_‚Ñõ': "(‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and 
    loc_reach‚á©A: "‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A "
    by blast
  from rr in_‚Ñõ' step(3)
  obtain n c‚á©A'' mds‚á©A'' mem‚á©A'' where 
    neval‚á©A: "abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A' ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©A'', mds‚á©A'', mem‚á©A'' ‚ü©‚á©A" and
    in_‚Ñõ'': "(‚ü® c‚á©A'', mds‚á©A'', mem‚á©A'' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C'', mds‚á©C'', mem‚á©C'' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_def by blast
  from neval‚á©A loc_reach‚á©A have "‚ü®c‚á©A'', mds‚á©A'', mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A"
    using abs.neval_loc_reach
    by blast
  with in_‚Ñõ'' show ?case by blast
next
  case (mem_diff c‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C'')
  from mem_diff(2) obtain c‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' where 
    in_‚Ñõ': "(‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and 
    loc_reach‚á©A: "‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A "
    by blast
  from rr have mm: "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ" and co: "closed_others ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding secure_refinement_def by blast+
  from preserves_modes_memD[OF mm in_‚Ñõ'] have 
    mem‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'" and mds‚á©A'_def: "mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
    by simp+
  hence in_‚Ñõ': "(‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
   and loc_reach‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A"
    using in_‚Ñõ' loc_reach‚á©A by simp+
  with mem_diff(3) co
  have "(‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
    unfolding closed_others_def by blast
  moreover have "‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©A ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A"
    apply(rule abs.loc_reach.mem_diff)
     apply(rule loc_reach‚á©A)
    using mem_diff(3)
    using calculation in_‚Ñõ' in_‚Ñõ_dma' mem‚á©A_of_def mm var_writable‚á©A by fastforce 
  ultimately show ?case by blast
qed

definition preserves_local_guarantee_compliance ::
  "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "preserves_local_guarantee_compliance ‚Ñõ ‚â°
    ‚àÄcm‚á©A mem‚á©A cm‚á©C mem‚á©C.
      abs.respects_own_guarantees cm‚á©A ‚àß
      ((cm‚á©A, mem‚á©A), (cm‚á©C, mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
        conc.respects_own_guarantees cm‚á©C"

lemma preserves_local_guarantee_compliance_def2:
  "preserves_local_guarantee_compliance ‚Ñõ ‚â°
    ‚àÄc‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C.
      abs.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A, mds‚á©A) ‚àß
      (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
        conc.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C)"
  unfolding preserves_local_guarantee_compliance_def
  by simp

(* This lemma proves it is sufficient to require a refinement relation to preserve
   guarantee compliance to ensure that it also preserves locally sound mode use.
  TODO: Should preserves_guarantee_compliance become part of secure_refinement's requirements? *)
lemma locally_sound_mode_use_preservation:
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes preserves_guarantee_compliance: "preserves_local_guarantee_compliance ‚Ñõ"
  shows "preserves_locally_sound_mode_use ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding preserves_locally_sound_mode_use_def
proof(clarsimp)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C
  assume locally_sound‚á©A: "abs.locally_sound_mode_use ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A" and
         in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
 
  show "conc.locally_sound_mode_use ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
    unfolding conc.locally_sound_mode_use_def2
    proof(clarsimp)
      fix c‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C'
      assume loc_reach‚á©C: "‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àà conc.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"

      from rr in_‚Ñõ loc_reach‚á©C
      obtain c‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' where
        in_‚Ñõ': "(‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ" and
        loc_reach‚á©A: "‚ü®c‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àà abs.loc_reach ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A"
        using secure_refinement_loc_reach by blast

      from locally_sound‚á©A loc_reach‚á©A
      have respects_guarantees‚á©A': "abs.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A', mds‚á©A')"
        unfolding abs.locally_sound_mode_use_def2 by auto

      with preserves_guarantee_compliance in_‚Ñõ'
      show "conc.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©C', mds‚á©C')"
        unfolding preserves_local_guarantee_compliance_def by blast
    qed
qed

end

section "Refinement without changing the Memory Model"

text ‚Äπ
  Here we define a locale which restricts the refinement to be between an abstract and
  concrete programs that share identical memory models: i,e. have the same set of variables.
  This allows us to derive simpler versions of the conditions that are likely to be easier
  to work with for initial experimentation.
‚Ä∫
locale sifum_refinement_same_mem = 
  abs: sifum_security dma ùíû_vars ùíû eval‚á©A some_val +
  conc: sifum_security dma ùíû_vars ùíû eval‚á©C some_val
  for dma :: "('Var,'Val) Mem ‚áí 'Var ‚áí Sec"
  and ùíû_vars :: "'Var ‚áí 'Var set"
  and ùíû :: "'Var set"
  and eval‚á©A :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and eval‚á©C :: "('Com‚á©C, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and some_val :: "'Val" 

sublocale sifum_refinement_same_mem ‚äÜ 
          gen_refine: sifum_refinement dma dma ùíû_vars ùíû_vars ùíû ùíû eval‚á©A eval‚á©C some_val id
  by(unfold_locales, simp_all)

context sifum_refinement_same_mem begin

lemma [simp]:
  "gen_refine.new_vars_private ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding gen_refine.new_vars_private_def
  by simp

definition
  preserves_modes_mem :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚â° 
  (‚àÄ c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C. (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
      mem‚á©A = mem‚á©C ‚àß mds‚á©A = mds‚á©C)"


definition
  closed_others :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var) state_relation ‚áí bool"
where
  "closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚â° 
  (‚àÄ c‚á©A mds mem c‚á©C mem'. (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds, mem ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds, mem ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
   (‚àÄx. mem x ‚â† mem' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds x) ‚ü∂
   (‚àÄx. dma mem x ‚â† dma mem' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds x) ‚ü∂
         (‚ü® c‚á©A, mds, mem' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds, mem' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ)"

lemma [simp]:
  "gen_refine.mds‚á©A_of x = x"
  by(simp add: gen_refine.mds‚á©A_of_def)

lemma [simp]:
  "gen_refine.mem‚á©A_of x = x"
  by(simp add: gen_refine.mem‚á©A_of_def)

lemma [simp]:
  "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
  gen_refine.closed_others ‚Ñõ = closed_others ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding closed_others_def
            gen_refine.closed_others_def
            preserves_modes_mem_def
  by auto

lemma [simp]:
  "gen_refine.preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ = preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ"
  unfolding gen_refine.preserves_modes_mem_def2 preserves_modes_mem_def
  by simp

definition
  secure_refinement :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel ‚áí ('Com‚á©A, 'Var, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var) state_relation ‚áí 
                          ('Com‚á©C, 'Var, 'Val) LocalConf rel ‚áí bool"
where
  "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P ‚â°
  closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚àß
  conc.closed_glob_consistent P ‚àß
  (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©A mds mem‚á©1 c‚á©1‚á©C. 
   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©1 ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1 ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚ü∂
    (‚àÄ c‚á©1‚á©C' mds' mem‚á©1'. ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1 ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
     (‚àÉ n c‚á©1‚á©A'. abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©1 ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©1' ‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©1' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
       (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2 c‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2'. 
         (‚ü® c‚á©1‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©1 ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2 ‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚àß
         (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2 ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2 ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P  ‚àß
         abs.neval ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2 ‚ü©‚á©A n ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©2' ‚ü©‚á©A  ‚ü∂
           (‚àÉ c‚á©2‚á©C' . ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2 ‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2' ‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
                   (‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©2' ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2' ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚àß
                   (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P )))))"

lemma preserves_modes_memD:
  "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
(‚ü® c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A ‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü® c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C ‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
      mem‚á©A = mem‚á©C ‚àß mds‚á©A = mds‚á©C"
  by(auto simp: preserves_modes_mem_def)

lemma [simp]:
  "gen_refine.secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P = secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  unfolding gen_refine.secure_refinement_def secure_refinement_def
  apply safe
         apply fastforce
        apply fastforce
       defer
       apply fastforce
      apply fastforce
     apply fastforce
    defer
   apply ((drule spec)+, erule (1) impE)
   apply ((drule spec)+, erule (1) impE)
   apply (clarify)
   apply(rename_tac  n c‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A')
   apply(rule_tac x=n in exI)
   apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1‚á©A' in exI)
   apply(fastforce dest: preserves_modes_memD)
  apply (frule (1) preserves_modes_memD)
  apply clarify
  apply ((drule spec)+, erule (1) impE)
  apply ((drule spec)+, erule (1) impE)
  apply clarify
  apply(blast dest: preserves_modes_memD)
  done
  
lemma R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm:
  assumes abs: "abs.strong_low_bisim_mm ‚Ñõ‚á©A"
  assumes rr: "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P"
  assumes P_sym: "sym P"
  shows "conc.strong_low_bisim_mm (gen_refine.R‚á©C_of ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P)"
  using abs rr gen_refine.R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm[OF _ _ P_sym]
  by simp

end

context sifum_refinement begin
lemma use_secure_refinement_helper:
  "secure_refinement ‚Ñõ‚á©A ‚Ñõ P ‚üπ
   ((cm‚á©A,mem‚á©A),(cm‚á©C,mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚üπ (cm‚á©C,mem‚á©C) ‚Üù‚á©C (cm‚á©C',mem‚á©C') ‚üπ
   (‚àÉcm‚á©A' mem‚á©A' n. abs.neval (cm‚á©A,mem‚á©A) n (cm‚á©A',mem‚á©A') ‚àß
                 ((cm‚á©A',mem‚á©A'), (cm‚á©C',mem‚á©C')) ‚àà ‚Ñõ)"
  apply(case_tac cm‚á©A, case_tac cm‚á©C)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(clarsimp simp: secure_refinement_def)
  by (metis surjective_pairing)
  
lemma closed_othersD:
  "closed_others ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
   (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ ‚üπ
   (‚ãÄx. mem‚á©C' x ‚â† mem‚á©C x ‚à® dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' x ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©C x ‚üπ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x) ‚üπ
   (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ"
   unfolding closed_others_def
   by auto
end

record ('a, 'Val, 'Var‚á©C, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©A, 'Com‚á©A) componentwise_refinement =
  priv_mem :: "'Var‚á©C set" (* private variables *)
  ‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val) LocalConf rel" (* abstract bisimulation *)
  ‚Ñõ_rel :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C) state_relation" (* refinement relation *)
  P_rel :: "('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf rel"

section "Whole System Refinement"

text ‚Äπ
  A locale to capture componentwise refinement of an entire system.
‚Ä∫
locale sifum_refinement_sys = 
  sifum_refinement dma‚á©A dma‚á©C ùíû_vars‚á©A ùíû_vars‚á©C ùíû‚á©A ùíû‚á©C eval‚á©A eval‚á©C some_val var‚á©C_of
  for dma‚á©A :: "('Var‚á©A,'Val) Mem ‚áí 'Var‚á©A ‚áí Sec"
  and dma‚á©C :: "('Var‚á©C,'Val) Mem ‚áí 'Var‚á©C ‚áí Sec"
  and ùíû_vars‚á©A :: "'Var‚á©A ‚áí 'Var‚á©A set"
  and ùíû_vars‚á©C :: "'Var‚á©C ‚áí 'Var‚á©C set"
  and ùíû‚á©A :: "'Var‚á©A set"
  and ùíû‚á©C :: "'Var‚á©C set"
  and eval‚á©A :: "('Com‚á©A, 'Var‚á©A, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and eval‚á©C :: "('Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©C, 'Val) LocalConf rel"
  and some_val :: "'Val"
  and var‚á©C_of :: "'Var‚á©A ‚áí 'Var‚á©C" +
  fixes cms :: "('a::wellorder, 'Val, 'Var‚á©C, 'Com‚á©C, 'Var‚á©A, 'Com‚á©A) componentwise_refinement list" 
  fixes priv_mem‚á©C :: "'Var‚á©C set list"
  defines priv_mem‚á©C_def: "priv_mem‚á©C ‚â° map priv_mem cms"
  assumes priv_mem_disjoint: "i < length cms ‚üπ j < length cms ‚üπ i ‚â† j ‚üπ priv_mem‚á©C ! i ‚à© priv_mem‚á©C ! j = {}"
  assumes new_vars_priv: "- range var‚á©C_of = ‚ãÉ (set priv_mem‚á©C)"
  assumes new_privs_preserved: "‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C ‚üπ x ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚üπ
                                 (x ‚àà mds m) = (x ‚àà mds' m)"
  assumes secure_refinements: 
    "i < length cms ‚üπ secure_refinement (‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel (cms ! i)) (‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)) (P_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes local_guarantee_preservation:
    "i < length cms ‚üπ preserves_local_guarantee_compliance (‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes bisims:
    "i < length cms ‚üπ abs.strong_low_bisim_mm (‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes Ps_sym:
    "‚ãÄa b. i < length cms ‚üπ sym (P_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes Ps_refl_on_low_mds_eq:
