    "i < length cms ‚üπ conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©C mem‚á©C mem‚á©C' ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà (P_rel (cms ! i))" 

(* FIXME: move to a parent theory? *)
context sifum_security begin
lemma neval_modifies_helper:
  assumes nevaln: "neval lcn m lcn'"
  assumes lcn_def: "lcn = (cms ! n, mem)"
  assumes lcn'_def: "lcn' = (cmn', mem')"
  assumes len: "n < length cms"
  assumes modified: "mem x ‚â† mem' x ‚à® dma mem x ‚â† dma mem' x"
  shows "‚àÉk cmn'' mem'' cmn''' mem'''. k < m ‚àß neval (cms ! n,mem) k (cmn'',mem'') ‚àß
                           (cmn'',mem'') ‚Üù (cmn''', mem''') ‚àß
                           (mem'' x ‚â† mem''' x ‚à® dma mem'' x ‚â† dma mem''' x)"
using nevaln lcn_def lcn'_def modified len
proof(induct arbitrary: cms cmn' mem mem' rule: neval.induct)
  case (neval_0 lcn lcn')
    from neval_0 show ?case by simp
  next
  case (neval_S_n lcn lcn'' m lcn')
  obtain cmn'' mem'' where lcn''_def: "lcn'' = (cmn'', mem'')" by fastforce
  show ?case
  proof(cases "mem x ‚â† mem'' x ‚à® dma mem x ‚â† dma mem'' x")    
    assume a: "mem x ‚â† mem'' x ‚à® dma mem x ‚â† dma mem'' x"
    let ?k = "0::nat"
    let ?cmn'' = "cms ! n"
    let ?mem'' = "mem"
    have "?k < Suc m ‚àß
    neval (cms ! n, mem) ?k (?cmn'', ?mem'') ‚àß
    (?cmn'', ?mem'') ‚Üù (cmn'', mem'') ‚àß (?mem'' x ‚â† mem'' x ‚à®
    dma ?mem'' x ‚â† dma mem'' x)"
      apply (rule conjI, simp add: neval.neval_0)+
      apply (simp only: a)
      by (simp add: neval_S_n(1)[simplified neval_S_n lcn''_def])
    thus ?case by blast
  next
    assume a: "¬¨ (mem x ‚â† mem'' x ‚à® dma mem x ‚â† dma mem'' x)"
    hence unchanged: "mem'' x = mem x ‚àß dma mem'' x = dma mem x"
      by (blast intro: sym)
    define cms'' where "cms'' = cms[n := cmn'']"
    have len'': "n < length cms''"
      by(simp add: cms''_def neval_S_n)
    hence lcn''_def2: "lcn'' = (cms'' ! n, mem'')"
      by(simp add: lcn''_def cms''_def)
    from
    neval_S_n(3)[OF lcn''_def2 neval_S_n(5), simplified unchanged neval_S_n len'']
    obtain k cmn''' mem''' cmn'''' mem'''' where
      hyp:    "k < m ‚àß
          neval (cms'' ! n, mem'') k (cmn''', mem''') ‚àß
          (cmn''', mem''') ‚Üù (cmn'''', mem'''') ‚àß
          (mem''' x ‚â† mem'''' x ‚à® dma mem''' x ‚â† dma mem'''' x)"
      by blast
    have "neval (cms ! n, mem) (Suc k) (cmn''', mem''')"           
      apply(rule neval.neval_S_n)  
       prefer 2
       using hyp apply fastforce 
      apply(simp add: cms''_def neval_S_n)
      by(rule neval_S_n(1)[simplified neval_S_n lcn''_def])
    moreover have "Suc k < Suc m" using hyp by auto
    ultimately show ?case using hyp by fastforce
  qed
qed

lemma neval_sched_Nil [simp]:
  "(cms, mem) ‚Üí‚áò[]‚áô (cms, mem)"
  by simp
  
lemma reachable_mode_states_refl:
  "map snd cms ‚àà reachable_mode_states (cms, mem)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: reachable_mode_states_def)
  using neval_sched_Nil by blast
  
lemma neval_reachable_mode_states:
  assumes neval: "neval lc n lc'"
  assumes lc_def: "lc = (cms ! k, mem)" 
  assumes len: "k < length cms"
  shows "map snd (cms[k := (fst lc')]) ‚àà reachable_mode_states (cms, mem)"
using neval lc_def len proof(induct arbitrary: cms mem rule: neval.induct)
case (neval_0 x y)
  thus ?case
  apply simp
  apply(drule sym, simp add: len reachable_mode_states_refl)
  done
next
case (neval_S_n x y n z)
  define cms' where "cms' = cms[k := fst y]"
  define mem' where "mem' = snd y"
  have y_def: "y = (cms' ! k, mem')"
    by(simp add: cms'_def mem'_def neval_S_n)
  moreover have len': "k < length cms'"
    by(simp add: cms'_def neval_S_n)
  ultimately have hyp: "map snd (cms'[k := fst z]) ‚àà reachable_mode_states (cms', mem')"
    using neval_S_n by metis
  have "map snd (cms'[k := fst z]) = map snd (cms[k := fst z])"
    unfolding cms'_def
    by simp
  moreover have "(cms, mem) ‚Üù‚áòk‚áô (cms', mem')"
    using meval_intro neval_S_n y_def cms'_def mem'_def len' by fastforce 
  ultimately show ?case
  using reachable_modes_subset subsetD hyp by fastforce
qed


lemma meval_sched_sound_mode_use:
  "sound_mode_use gc ‚üπ meval_sched sched gc gc' ‚üπ sound_mode_use gc'"
proof(induct rule: meval_sched.induct)
case (1 gc)
  thus ?case by simp
next
case (2 n ns gc gc')
  from 2(3) obtain gc'' where "meval_abv gc n gc''" and a: "meval_sched ns gc'' gc'" by force
  with 2(2) sound_modes_invariant have b: "sound_mode_use gc''" by (metis surjective_pairing)
  show ?case by (rule 2(1)[OF b a])
qed

lemma neval_meval:
  "neval lcn k lcn' ‚üπ n < length cms ‚üπ lcn = (cms ! n,mem) ‚üπ lcn' = (cmn', mem') ‚üπ
  meval_sched (replicate k n) (cms,mem) (cms[n := cmn'],mem')"
proof(induct arbitrary: cms mem cmn' mem' rule: neval.induct)
case (neval_0 lcn lcn')  
  thus ?case by fastforce
next
case (neval_S_n lcn lcn'' k lcn')
  define cms'' where [simp]: "cms'' = cms[n := fst lcn'']"
  define mem'' where [simp]: "mem'' = snd lcn''"
  have len'' [simp]: "n < length cms''" by(simp add: neval_S_n(4))
  have lcn''_def: "lcn'' = (cms'' ! n, mem'')" using len'' by simp
  have hyp: "(cms'', mem'') ‚Üí‚áòreplicate k n‚áô (cms''[n := cmn'], mem')"
    by (rule neval_S_n(3)[OF len'' lcn''_def neval_S_n(6)])
  have meval: "(cms, mem) ‚Üù‚áòn‚áô (cms'', mem'')"
    using cms''_def neval_S_n.hyps(1) neval_S_n.prems(1) neval_S_n.prems(2) by fastforce
  from hyp meval show ?case
    by fastforce
qed

lemma meval_sched_app:
  "meval_sched as gc gc' ‚üπ meval_sched bs gc' gc'' ‚üπ meval_sched (as@bs) gc gc''"
proof(induct as arbitrary: gc gc' bs)
case Nil thus ?case by simp
next
case (Cons a as)
  from Cons(2) 
  obtain gc''' where a: "meval_abv gc a gc'''" and as: "meval_sched as gc''' gc'" by force
  from Cons(1)[OF as Cons(3)] a
  have "gc ‚Üí‚áòa # (as @ bs)‚áô gc''"
    by (metis meval_sched.simps)
  thus ?case by simp
qed

end

context sifum_refinement_sys begin

lemma conc_respects_priv:
  assumes xnin: "x‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of"
  assumes modified‚á©C: "mem‚á©C x‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚à® dma‚á©C mem‚á©C x‚á©C ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' x‚á©C"
  assumes eval‚á©C: "(cms‚á©C ! n, mem‚á©C) ‚Üù‚á©C (cm‚á©Cn', mem‚á©C')"
  assumes in_‚Ñõn: "((cms‚á©A ! n, mem‚á©A), cms‚á©C ! n, mem‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõn"
  assumes preserves: "preserves_local_guarantee_compliance ‚Ñõn"
  assumes sound_mode_use‚á©A: "abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A)"
  assumes nlen: "n < length cms"
  assumes len_eq: "length cms‚á©A = length cms"
  assumes len_eq': "length cms‚á©C = length cms"
  shows "x‚á©C ‚àâ (snd (cms‚á©C ! n)) GuarNoWrite ‚àß x‚á©C ‚àâ (snd (cms‚á©C ! n)) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
proof -
  from sound_mode_use‚á©A have "abs.respects_own_guarantees (cms‚á©A ! n)"
    using nlen len_eq abs.locally_sound_respects_guarantees 
    unfolding abs.sound_mode_use_def list_all_length
    by fastforce
  with in_‚Ñõn have 1: "conc.respects_own_guarantees (cms‚á©C ! n)"
    using preserves
    unfolding preserves_local_guarantee_compliance_def
    by metis
  with eval‚á©C modified‚á©C have 2: "¬¨ conc.doesnt_modify (fst (cms‚á©C ! n)) x‚á©C"
    unfolding conc.doesnt_modify_def
    by (metis surjective_pairing)
  then have "¬¨ conc.doesnt_read_or_modify (fst (cms‚á©C ! n)) x‚á©C"
    using conc.doesnt_read_or_modify_doesnt_modify by metis
  with 1 2 show ?thesis
    unfolding conc.respects_own_guarantees_def 
    by metis
qed

lemma modified_variables_are_not_assumed_not_written:
  fixes cms‚á©A mem‚á©A cms‚á©C mem‚á©C cm‚á©Cn' mem‚á©C' ‚Ñõn cm‚á©An' mem‚á©A' m‚á©A ‚Ñõi
  assumes sound_mode_use‚á©A: "abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A)"
  assumes pmmn: "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõn"
  assumes in_‚Ñõn: "((cms‚á©A ! n, mem‚á©A), (cms‚á©C ! n, mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõn"
  assumes pmmi: "preserves_modes_mem ‚Ñõi"
  assumes in_‚Ñõi: "((cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A), (cms‚á©C ! i, mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõi"
  assumes nlen: "n < length cms"
  assumes len‚á©A: "length cms‚á©A = length cms"
  assumes len‚á©C: "length cms‚á©C = length cms"
  assumes priv_is_asm_priv: "‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ priv_mem‚á©C ! i ‚äÜ snd (cms‚á©C ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite"
  assumes priv_is_guar_priv: "‚ãÄi j. i < length cms ‚üπ j < length cms ‚üπ i ‚â† j ‚üπ priv_mem‚á©C ! i ‚äÜ snd (cms‚á©C ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
  assumes new_asms_only_for_priv: "‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ 
                                           (snd (cms‚á©C ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à™ snd (cms‚á©C ! i) AsmNoWrite) ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of) ‚äÜ priv_mem‚á©C ! i"
  assumes eval‚á©Cn: "(cms‚á©C ! n,mem‚á©C) ‚Üù‚á©C (cm‚á©Cn', mem‚á©C')"
  assumes neval‚á©An: "abs.neval (cms‚á©A ! n,mem‚á©A) m‚á©A (cm‚á©An', mem‚á©A')"
  assumes in_‚Ñõn': "((cm‚á©An', mem‚á©A'), (cm‚á©Cn', mem‚á©C')) ‚àà ‚Ñõn"
  assumes modified‚á©C: "mem‚á©C x‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©C' x‚á©C ‚à® dma‚á©C mem‚á©C x‚á©C ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' x‚á©C"
  assumes neq: "i ‚â† n"
  assumes ilen: "i < length cms"
  assumes preserves: "preserves_local_guarantee_compliance ‚Ñõn"
  shows "¬¨ var_asm_not_written (snd (cms‚á©C ! i)) x‚á©C"
proof(cases "x‚á©C ‚àà range var‚á©C_of")
  assume "x‚á©C ‚àà range var‚á©C_of"
  from this obtain x‚á©A where x‚á©C_def: "x‚á©C = var‚á©C_of x‚á©A" by blast
  obtain c‚á©An mds‚á©An where [simp]: "cms‚á©A ! n = (c‚á©An, mds‚á©An)" by fastforce
  obtain c‚á©Cn mds‚á©Cn where [simp]: "cms‚á©C ! n = (c‚á©Cn, mds‚á©Cn)" by fastforce
  obtain c‚á©Cn' mds‚á©Cn' where [simp]: "cm‚á©Cn' = (c‚á©Cn', mds‚á©Cn')" by fastforce
  obtain c‚á©An' mds‚á©An' where [simp]: "cm‚á©An' = (c‚á©An', mds‚á©An')" by fastforce

  from in_‚Ñõn pmmn have [simp]: "mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C" and [simp]: "mds‚á©An = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©Cn"
    using preserves_modes_memD by auto
  from in_‚Ñõn' pmmn have [simp]: "mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'" and [simp]: "mds‚á©An' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©Cn'"
    using preserves_modes_memD by auto
  
  from modified‚á©C dma_consistent have 
    modified‚á©A: "mem‚á©A x‚á©A ‚â† mem‚á©A' x‚á©A ‚à® dma‚á©A mem‚á©A x‚á©A ‚â† dma‚á©A mem‚á©A' x‚á©A"
    by (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def x‚á©C_def)
    
  from len‚á©A nlen have nlen‚á©A: "n < length cms‚á©A" by simp
  from len‚á©A ilen have ilen‚á©A: "i < length cms‚á©A" by simp

  from abs.neval_modifies_helper[OF neval‚á©An HOL.refl HOL.refl nlen‚á©A modified‚á©A]
  obtain k‚á©A cm‚á©An'' mem‚á©A'' cm‚á©An''' mem‚á©A''' 
  where "k‚á©A < m‚á©A" 
    and neval‚á©An'': "abs.neval (cms‚á©A ! n, mem‚á©A) k‚á©A (cm‚á©An'', mem‚á©A'')"
    and eval‚á©An'': "(cm‚á©An'', mem‚á©A'') ‚Üù‚á©A (cm‚á©An''', mem‚á©A''')"
    and modified‚á©A'': "(mem‚á©A'' x‚á©A ‚â† mem‚á©A''' x‚á©A ‚à® dma‚á©A mem‚á©A'' x‚á©A ‚â† dma‚á©A mem‚á©A''' x‚á©A)" by blast
  let ?c‚á©An'' = "fst cm‚á©An''"
  let ?mds‚á©An'' = "snd cm‚á©An''"
  from eval‚á©An'' modified‚á©A'' have modifies‚á©A'': "¬¨ abs.doesnt_modify ?c‚á©An'' x‚á©A"
    unfolding abs.doesnt_modify_def
    by (metis surjective_pairing)
  have loc_reach‚á©A'': "(cm‚á©An'', mem‚á©A'') ‚àà abs.loc_reach (cms‚á©A ! n, mem‚á©A)"
    apply(rule abs.neval_loc_reach)
     apply(rule neval‚á©An'')
    using abs.loc_reach.refl by simp
  have locally_sound_mode_use‚á©An: "abs.locally_sound_mode_use  (cms‚á©A ! n, mem‚á©A)"
    using sound_mode_use‚á©A nlen‚á©A
    unfolding abs.sound_mode_use_def
    using list_all_length by fastforce
  from modifies‚á©A'' loc_reach‚á©A'' locally_sound_mode_use‚á©An abs.doesnt_read_or_modify_doesnt_modify
  have no_guar‚á©An: "x‚á©A ‚àâ ?mds‚á©An'' GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚àß x‚á©A ‚àâ ?mds‚á©An'' GuarNoWrite"
    unfolding abs.locally_sound_mode_use_def
    by (metis surjective_pairing)
  let ?mdss‚á©A'' = "map snd (cms‚á©A[n := fst (cm‚á©An'',mem‚á©A'')])"
  have "?mdss‚á©A'' ‚àà abs.reachable_mode_states (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A)"
    apply(rule abs.neval_reachable_mode_states)
      apply(rule neval‚á©An'')
     apply(rule HOL.refl)
    by(rule nlen‚á©A)
  hence compat: "abs.compatible_modes ?mdss‚á©A''"
    using sound_mode_use‚á©A
    by(simp add: abs.globally_sound_mode_use_def)
  have n: "?mdss‚á©A'' ! n = ?mds‚á©An''"
    by(simp add: nlen‚á©A)
  let ?mds‚á©Ai = "snd (cms‚á©A ! i)"
  have i: "?mdss‚á©A'' ! i = ?mds‚á©Ai"
    apply(simp add: ilen‚á©A)
    by(metis nth_list_update_neq neq)
  from nlen‚á©A have nlen‚á©A'': "n < length ?mdss‚á©A''" by simp
  from ilen‚á©A have ilen‚á©A'': "i < length ?mdss‚á©A''" by simp
  with compat n i nlen‚á©A'' ilen‚á©A'' no_guar‚á©An neq
  have no_asm‚á©Ai: "x‚á©A ‚àâ ?mds‚á©Ai AsmNoWrite ‚àß x‚á©A ‚àâ ?mds‚á©Ai AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    unfolding abs.compatible_modes_def
    by metis

  obtain c‚á©Ai mds‚á©Ai where [simp]: "cms‚á©A ! i = (c‚á©Ai, mds‚á©Ai)" by fastforce
  obtain c‚á©Ci mds‚á©Ci where [simp]: "cms‚á©C ! i = (c‚á©Ci, mds‚á©Ci)" by fastforce

  from in_‚Ñõi pmmi have [simp]: "mds‚á©Ai = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©Ci"
    using preserves_modes_memD by auto
  have [simp]: "?mds‚á©Ai = mds‚á©Ai" by simp
  from no_asm‚á©Ai have no_asm‚á©Ci: "x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©Ci AsmNoWrite ‚àß x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©Ci AsmNoReadOrWrite"
    using x‚á©C_def mds‚á©A_of_def
    using doesnt_have_mode by auto
  thus ?thesis
    unfolding var_asm_not_written_def
    by simp
next
  let ?mds‚á©Cn = "snd (cms‚á©C ! n)"
  let ?mds‚á©Ci = "snd (cms‚á©C ! i)"

  assume new_var: "x‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of"
  from conc_respects_priv[OF new_var modified‚á©C eval‚á©Cn in_‚Ñõn preserves sound_mode_use‚á©A nlen len‚á©A len‚á©C] 
  have "x‚á©C ‚àâ ?mds‚á©Cn GuarNoWrite ‚àß x‚á©C ‚àâ ?mds‚á©Cn GuarNoReadOrWrite" .
  with priv_is_guar_priv nlen ilen neq
  have "x‚á©C ‚àâ priv_mem‚á©C ! i"
    by blast
  with new_var new_asms_only_for_priv ilen
  have "x‚á©C ‚àâ ?mds‚á©Ci AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à™ ?mds‚á©Ci AsmNoWrite"
    by blast
  thus ?thesis
    unfolding var_asm_not_written_def
    by simp
qed

definition
  priv_is_asm_priv :: "'Var‚á©C Mds list ‚áí bool"
where
  "priv_is_asm_priv mdss‚á©C ‚â°  ‚àÄi < length cms. priv_mem‚á©C ! i ‚äÜ (mdss‚á©C ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite"

definition
  priv_is_guar_priv :: "'Var‚á©C Mds list ‚áí bool"
where
  "priv_is_guar_priv mdss‚á©C ‚â° 
    ‚àÄi < length cms. (‚àÄj < length cms. i ‚â† j ‚ü∂ priv_mem‚á©C ! i ‚äÜ (mdss‚á©C ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite)"
 
definition
  new_asms_only_for_priv :: "'Var‚á©C Mds list ‚áí bool"
where
  "new_asms_only_for_priv mdss‚á©C ‚â° 
    ‚àÄ i < length cms. 
      ((mdss‚á©C ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚à™ (mdss‚á©C ! i) AsmNoWrite) ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of) ‚äÜ priv_mem‚á©C ! i"

definition
  new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only :: "'Var‚á©C Mds list ‚áí bool"
where
  "new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only mdss‚á©C ‚â° 
    ‚àÄ i < length cms. 
      (mdss‚á©C ! i) AsmNoWrite ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of) = {}"

definition
  modes_respect_priv :: "'Var‚á©C Mds list ‚áí bool"
where
  "modes_respect_priv mdss‚á©C  ‚â° priv_is_asm_priv mdss‚á©C ‚àß priv_is_guar_priv mdss‚á©C ‚àß
                               new_asms_only_for_priv mdss‚á©C ‚àß
                               new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only mdss‚á©C"

definition
  ignores_old_vars :: "('Var‚á©C Mds list ‚áí bool) ‚áí bool"
where
  "ignores_old_vars P ‚â° ‚àÄmdss mdss'. length mdss = length mdss' ‚àß length mdss' = length cms ‚ü∂ 
    (map (Œªx m. x m ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of)) mdss) = (map (Œªx m. x m ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of)) mdss') ‚ü∂ 
  P mdss = P mdss'"

lemma ignores_old_vars_conj:
  assumes Rdef: "(‚ãÄx. R x = (P x ‚àß Q x))"
  assumes iP: "ignores_old_vars P" 
  assumes iQ: "ignores_old_vars Q" 
  shows "ignores_old_vars R"
  unfolding ignores_old_vars_def
  apply(simp add: Rdef)
  apply(intro impI allI)
  apply(rule conj_cong)
   apply(erule (1) iP[unfolded ignores_old_vars_def, rule_format])
  apply(erule (1) iQ[unfolded ignores_old_vars_def, rule_format])
  done

  
lemma nth_map_eq': 
  "length xs = length ys ‚üπ map f xs = map g ys ‚üπ i < length xs ‚üπ f (xs ! i) = g (ys ! i)"  
  apply(induct xs ys rule: list_induct2)
   apply simp
  apply(case_tac i)
   apply force
  by (metis length_map nth_map)

lemma nth_map_eq: 
  "map f xs = map g ys ‚üπ i < length xs ‚üπ f (xs ! i) = g (ys ! i)"
  apply(rule nth_map_eq')
    apply(erule map_eq_imp_length_eq)
   apply assumption+
  done

lemma nth_in_Union_over_set: 
  "i < length xs ‚üπ xs ! i ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ(set xs)"
  by (simp add: Union_upper)

lemma priv_are_new_vars: 
  "x ‚àà priv_mem‚á©C ! i ‚üπ i < length cms ‚üπ x ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of"
  using new_vars_priv nth_in_Union_over_set subsetD
  using priv_mem‚á©C_def by fastforce
  
lemma priv_is_asm_priv_ignores_old_vars:
  "ignores_old_vars priv_is_asm_priv"
  apply(clarsimp simp: ignores_old_vars_def priv_is_asm_priv_def)
  apply(rule all_cong)
  apply(drule nth_map_eq)
   apply simp
  apply(blast dest: priv_are_new_vars fun_cong)
  done
  
lemma priv_is_guar_priv_ignores_old_vars:
  "ignores_old_vars priv_is_guar_priv"
  apply(clarsimp simp: ignores_old_vars_def priv_is_guar_priv_def)
  apply(rule all_cong)
  apply(rule all_cong)
  apply(rule imp_cong)
   apply(rule HOL.refl)
  apply(frule nth_map_eq)
   apply simp
  apply(drule_tac i=j in nth_map_eq)
   apply simp
  apply(blast dest: priv_are_new_vars fun_cong)
  done

lemma new_asms_only_for_priv_ignores_old_vars:
  "ignores_old_vars new_asms_only_for_priv"
  apply(clarsimp simp: ignores_old_vars_def new_asms_only_for_priv_def)
  apply(rule all_cong)
  apply(drule nth_map_eq)
   apply simp
  apply(blast dest: priv_are_new_vars fun_cong)
  done

lemma new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only_ignores_old_vars:
  "ignores_old_vars new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only"
  apply(clarsimp simp: ignores_old_vars_def new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only_def)
  apply(rule all_cong)
  apply(drule nth_map_eq)
   apply simp
  apply(blast dest: priv_are_new_vars fun_cong)
  done
  
lemma modes_respect_priv_ignores_old_vars:
   "ignores_old_vars modes_respect_priv"
   apply(rule ignores_old_vars_conj)
     apply(subst modes_respect_priv_def)
     apply(rule HOL.refl)
    apply(rule priv_is_asm_priv_ignores_old_vars)
   apply(rule ignores_old_vars_conj)
    apply(rule HOL.refl)
   apply(rule priv_is_guar_priv_ignores_old_vars)
  apply(rule ignores_old_vars_conj)
    apply(rule HOL.refl)
   apply(rule new_asms_only_for_priv_ignores_old_vars)
  apply(rule new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only_ignores_old_vars)
  done
  
lemma ignores_old_varsD:
  "ignores_old_vars P ‚üπ length mdss = length mdss' ‚üπ length mdss' = length cms ‚üπ
  (map (Œªx m. x m ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of)) mdss) = (map (Œªx m. x m ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of)) mdss') ‚üπ 
  P mdss = P mdss'"
  unfolding ignores_old_vars_def
  by force
  
lemma new_privs_preserved':
  "‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C ‚Üù‚á©C ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C ‚üπ (mds m ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of)) = (mds' m ‚à© (- range var‚á©C_of))"
  using new_privs_preserved by blast

lemma map_nth_eq:
  "length xs = length ys ‚üπ (‚ãÄi. i < length xs ‚üπ f (xs ! i) = g (ys ! i)) ‚üπ
  map f xs = map g ys"
  apply(induct xs ys rule: list_induct2)
   apply simp
  apply force
  done
  
lemma ignores_old_vars_conc_meval:
  assumes ignores: "ignores_old_vars P"
  assumes meval:  "conc.meval_abv gc‚á©C n gc‚á©C'"
  assumes len_eq: "length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms"
  shows "P (map snd (fst gc‚á©C)) = P (map snd (fst gc‚á©C'))"
proof -
  obtain cms‚á©C mem‚á©C where [simp]: "gc‚á©C = (cms‚á©C, mem‚á©C)" by fastforce
  obtain cms‚á©C' mem‚á©C' where [simp]: "gc‚á©C' = (cms‚á©C', mem‚á©C')" by fastforce
  from meval obtain cmn' mem‚á©C' where
    eval‚á©Cn: "(cms‚á©C ! n, mem‚á©C) ‚Üù‚á©C (cmn', mem‚á©C')" and len: "n < length cms‚á©C" and cms‚á©C'_def: "cms‚á©C' = cms‚á©C[n := cmn']"
    using conc.meval.cases by fastforce
  have
    "P (map snd cms‚á©C) = P (map snd cms‚á©C')"
    apply(rule ignores_old_varsD[OF ignores])
      apply(simp add: cms‚á©C'_def)
     using len_eq apply (simp add: cms‚á©C'_def)
    apply(rule map_nth_eq)
     apply (simp add: cms‚á©C'_def)
    apply(case_tac "i = n")
     apply simp
     apply(rule ext)
     apply(simp add: cms‚á©C'_def)
     using eval‚á©Cn new_privs_preserved' apply(metis surjective_pairing)
    by (simp add: cms‚á©C'_def)
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma ignores_old_vars_conc_meval_sched:
  assumes ignores: "ignores_old_vars P"
  assumes meval_sched:  "conc.meval_sched sched gc‚á©C gc‚á©C'"
  assumes len_eq: "length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms"
  shows "P (map snd (fst gc‚á©C)) = P (map snd (fst gc‚á©C'))"
using meval_sched len_eq proof(induct rule: conc.meval_sched.induct)
  case (1 gc gc')
  thus ?case by simp
next
  case (2 n ns gc gc')
  from 2(2) obtain gc'' where b: "conc.meval_abv gc n gc''" and a: "conc.meval_sched ns gc'' gc'" by force
  with 2 have "length (fst gc'') = length cms"
    using conc.meval.cases 
    by (metis length_list_update surjective_pairing)
  with 2 a b show ?case
  using ignores_old_vars_conc_meval ignores by metis 
qed

lemma meval_sched_modes_respect_priv:
  "conc.meval_sched sched gc‚á©C gc‚á©C' ‚üπ   length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms ‚üπ
  modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C)) ‚üπ
  modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C'))"
  by(blast dest!: ignores_old_vars_conc_meval_sched[OF modes_respect_priv_ignores_old_vars])

lemma meval_modes_respect_priv:
  "conc.meval_abv gc‚á©C n gc‚á©C' ‚üπ   length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms ‚üπ
  modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C)) ‚üπ
  modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C'))"
  by(blast dest!: ignores_old_vars_conc_meval[OF modes_respect_priv_ignores_old_vars])
  
(* I think this lemma would guarantee globally sound mode use for all of the
  var‚á©C_of variables. It should also hold for all of the non var‚á©C_of variables by
  the locale assumptions above *)
lemma traces_refinement:
  "‚ãÄgc‚á©C gc‚á©C' sched‚á©C gc‚á©A. conc.meval_sched sched‚á©C gc‚á©C gc‚á©C' ‚üπ
    length (fst gc‚á©A) = length cms ‚üπ length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms  ‚üπ
    (‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ ((fst gc‚á©A ! i, snd gc‚á©A), (fst gc‚á©C ! i, snd gc‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)) ‚üπ
    abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A ‚üπ modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C)) ‚üπ
   ‚àÉsched‚á©A gc‚á©A'. abs.meval_sched sched‚á©A gc‚á©A gc‚á©A' ‚àß
          (‚àÄi. i < length cms ‚ü∂ ((fst gc‚á©A' ! i, snd gc‚á©A'), (fst gc‚á©C' ! i, snd gc‚á©C')) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)) ‚àß
          abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A'"
proof -
  fix gc‚á©C gc‚á©C' sched‚á©C gc‚á©A
  assume meval‚á©C: "conc.meval_sched sched‚á©C gc‚á©C gc‚á©C'"
     and len_eq [simp]: "length (fst gc‚á©A) = length cms"
     and len_eq'[simp]: "length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms"
     and in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ ((fst gc‚á©A ! i, snd gc‚á©A), (fst gc‚á©C ! i, snd gc‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
     and sound_mode_use‚á©A: "abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A"
     and modes_respect_priv: "modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C))"
  thus
    "‚àÉsched‚á©A gc‚á©A'. abs.meval_sched sched‚á©A gc‚á©A gc‚á©A' ‚àß
          (‚àÄi. i < length cms ‚ü∂ ((fst gc‚á©A' ! i, snd gc‚á©A'), (fst gc‚á©C' ! i, snd gc‚á©C')) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)) ‚àß
          abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A'"
  proof(induct  arbitrary: gc‚á©A rule: conc.meval_sched.induct)
  case (1 cms‚á©C cms‚á©C')
    from 1(1) have cms‚á©C'_def [simp]: "cms‚á©C' = cms‚á©C" by simp
    with 1 have "abs.meval_sched [] gc‚á©A gc‚á©A ‚àß
    (‚àÄi<length cms.
        ((fst gc‚á©A ! i, snd gc‚á©A), fst cms‚á©C' ! i, snd cms‚á©C') ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)) ‚àß
        abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A"
      by simp
    thus ?case by blast
  next
  case (2 n ns gc‚á©C gc‚á©c')
    obtain cms‚á©C mem‚á©C where gc‚á©C_def [simp]: "gc‚á©C = (cms‚á©C, mem‚á©C)" by force
    obtain cms‚á©A mem‚á©A where gc‚á©A_def [simp]: "gc‚á©A = (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A)" by force
    from 2(2) gc‚á©C_def obtain cms‚á©C'' mem‚á©C'' where
      meval‚á©C: "((cms‚á©C,mem‚á©C), n, (cms‚á©C'',mem‚á©C'')) ‚àà conc.meval" and 
      meval_sched‚á©C: "conc.meval_sched ns (cms‚á©C'',mem‚á©C'') gc‚á©c'" 
      by force
  
    let ?cm‚á©Cn = "cms‚á©C ! n"
    let ?cm‚á©An = "cms‚á©A ! n"
    let ?‚Ñõn = "‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! n)"
    from meval‚á©C obtain cm‚á©Cn'' where
      eval‚á©Cn: "(?cm‚á©Cn, mem‚á©C) ‚Üù‚á©C (cm‚á©Cn'', mem‚á©C'')" and
      len: "n < length cms‚á©C" and
      cms‚á©C''_def: "cms‚á©C'' = cms‚á©C [n := cm‚á©Cn'']" by (blast elim: conc.meval.cases)
    from len have len [simp]: "n < length cms" by (simp add: 2[simplified])
    from cms‚á©C''_def 2 have 
      len_cms‚á©C'' [simp]: "length cms‚á©C'' = length cms" by simp
    from 2 len have 
      in_‚Ñõn: "((?cm‚á©An,mem‚á©A), (?cm‚á©Cn,mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ?‚Ñõn"
      by simp
    
    with eval‚á©Cn use_secure_refinement_helper[OF secure_refinements[OF len]]  
    obtain cm‚á©An'' mem‚á©A'' m‚á©A where
      neval‚á©An: "abs.neval (?cm‚á©An, mem‚á©A) m‚á©A (cm‚á©An'', mem‚á©A'')" and
      in_‚Ñõn'': "((cm‚á©An'',mem‚á©A''),(cm‚á©Cn'',mem‚á©C'')) ‚àà ?‚Ñõn"
      by blast+
      
    define cms‚á©A'' where "cms‚á©A'' = cms‚á©A [n := cm‚á©An'']" 
    define gc‚á©A'' where [simp]: "gc‚á©A'' = (cms‚á©A'', mem‚á©A'')"
    have len_cms‚á©A'' [simp]: "length cms‚á©A'' = length cms" by(simp add: cms‚á©A''_def 2[simplified])
  
    have in_‚Ñõ'': "(‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ ((cms‚á©A'' ! i, mem‚á©A''), cms‚á©C'' ! i, mem‚á©C'') ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
    proof -
      fix i
      assume "i < length cms"
      show "?thesis i"
      proof(cases "i = n")
        assume "i = n"
        hence "cms‚á©A'' ! i = cm‚á©An''"
          using cms‚á©A''_def len_cms‚á©A'' len by simp
        moreover from ‚Äπi = n‚Ä∫ have "cms‚á©C'' ! i = cm‚á©Cn''"
          using cms‚á©C''_def len_cms‚á©C'' len by simp
        ultimately  show ?thesis 
          using in_‚Ñõn'' ‚Äπi = n‚Ä∫
          by simp
      next
        obtain c‚á©Ai mds‚á©Ai where cms‚á©Ai_def [simp]: "(cms‚á©A ! i) = (c‚á©Ai, mds‚á©Ai)" by fastforce 
        obtain c‚á©Ci mds‚á©Ci where cms‚á©Ci_def [simp]: "(cms‚á©C ! i) = (c‚á©Ci, mds‚á©Ci)" by fastforce 
        hence mds‚á©Ci_def: "mds‚á©Ci = snd (cms‚á©C ! i)" by simp
        
        from 2(5) ‚Äπi < length cms‚Ä∫ have 
          in_‚Ñõi: "((cms‚á©A ! i,mem‚á©A), (cms‚á©C ! i,mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)"
          by force
          
        from in_‚Ñõn'' secure_refinements len preserves_modes_memD
        have mem‚á©A''_def [simp]: "mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''"
          unfolding secure_refinement_def
          by (metis surjective_pairing)
          
        from in_‚Ñõi secure_refinements  ‚Äπi < length cms‚Ä∫ preserves_modes_memD
             cms‚á©Ai_def cms‚á©Ci_def
        have mem‚á©A_def [simp]: "mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C" and
             mds‚á©Ai_def [simp]: "mds‚á©Ai = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©Ci"
          unfolding secure_refinement_def
          by metis+
          
        assume "i ‚â† n"
        hence "cms‚á©A'' ! i = cms‚á©A ! i"
          using cms‚á©A''_def len_cms‚á©A'' len by simp
        moreover from ‚Äπi ‚â† n‚Ä∫ have "cms‚á©C'' ! i = cms‚á©C ! i"
          using cms‚á©C''_def len_cms‚á©C'' len by simp
        ultimately  show ?thesis 
        
          using 2(5)[of i] ‚Äπi ‚â† n‚Ä∫ ‚Äπi < length cms‚Ä∫
          apply simp
          apply(rule closed_othersD)
            apply(rule secure_refinements[OF ‚Äπi < length cms‚Ä∫, unfolded secure_refinement_def, THEN conjunct1])
           apply assumption
          apply(simp only: mds‚á©Ci_def)  
          apply(rule_tac ‚Ñõn="‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! n)"  and ‚Ñõi="‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)" in modified_variables_are_not_assumed_not_written)
                           apply(rule 2(6)[unfolded gc‚á©A_def])
                          using secure_refinements len secure_refinement_def apply blast
                         apply(rule in_‚Ñõn)
                        using secure_refinements secure_refinement_def apply blast
                       apply(rule in_‚Ñõi)
                      apply(rule len)
                      using 2 apply simp
                    using 2 apply simp
                   using 2(7) unfolding modes_respect_priv_def priv_is_asm_priv_def gc‚á©C_def 
                   using "2.prems"(3) apply auto[1]
                  using 2(7) unfolding modes_respect_priv_def priv_is_guar_priv_def gc‚á©C_def 
                  using "2.prems"(3) apply auto[1]
                 using 2(7) unfolding modes_respect_priv_def new_asms_only_for_priv_def gc‚á©C_def 
                 using "2.prems"(3) apply auto[1]
                apply(rule eval‚á©Cn)
               apply(rule neval‚á©An)
              apply(rule in_‚Ñõn'')
             apply fastforce
            apply assumption
           apply assumption
          apply(rule local_guarantee_preservation)
          by simp
      qed
    qed
  
    have meval_sched‚á©A: "abs.meval_sched (replicate m‚á©A n) gc‚á©A (cms‚á©A'', mem‚á©A'')"
      apply(simp add: cms‚á©A''_def)
      apply(rule abs.neval_meval[OF _ _ HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply(rule neval‚á©An)
      using "2.prems"(2) by auto
  
    have sound_mode_use‚á©A'': "abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A'', mem‚á©A'')"
      apply(rule abs.meval_sched_sound_mode_use)
       apply(rule 2(6))
      by(rule meval_sched‚á©A)
   
    have respects'': "modes_respect_priv (map snd cms‚á©C'')"
      apply(rule meval_modes_respect_priv[where gc‚á©C'="(cms‚á©C'',mem‚á©C'')", simplified])
        apply(rule meval‚á©C)
       using "2.prems"(3) gc‚á©C_def apply blast
      using 2 by simp

    from respects'' 2(1)[OF meval_sched‚á©C, where gc‚á©A7 = gc‚á©A''] in_‚Ñõ'' sound_mode_use‚á©A''
    obtain sched‚á©A gc‚á©A' 
    where  meval_sched‚á©A'': "abs.meval_sched sched‚á©A gc‚á©A'' gc‚á©A'" and
           in_‚Ñõ': "(‚àÄi<length cms. ((fst gc‚á©A' ! i, snd gc‚á©A'), fst gc‚á©c' ! i, snd gc‚á©c') ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))" and
           sound_mode_use‚á©A': "abs.sound_mode_use  gc‚á©A'" by fastforce
    define final_sched‚á©A where "final_sched‚á©A = (replicate m‚á©A n) @ sched‚á©A"
    have meval_final_sched‚á©A: "abs.meval_sched final_sched‚á©A gc‚á©A gc‚á©A'"
      using meval_sched‚á©A'' meval_sched‚á©A abs.meval_sched_app final_sched‚á©A_def gc‚á©A''_def by blast
    
    from meval_final_sched‚á©A in_‚Ñõ' sound_mode_use‚á©A'
    show ?case by blast
  qed
qed

end

context sifum_security begin

definition
  restrict_modes :: "'Var Mds list ‚áí 'Var set ‚áí 'Var Mds list"
where
  "restrict_modes mdss X ‚â° map (Œªmds m. mds m ‚à© X) mdss"

lemma restrict_modes_length [simp]:
  "length (restrict_modes mdss X) = length mdss"
  by(auto simp: restrict_modes_def)
  
lemma compatible_modes_by_case_distinction:
  assumes compat_X: "compatible_modes (restrict_modes mdss X)"
  assumes compat_compX: "compatible_modes (restrict_modes mdss (-X ))"
  shows "compatible_modes mdss"
unfolding compatible_modes_def
proof(safe)
  fix i x j
  assume ilen: "i < length mdss"
  assume jlen: "j < length mdss"
  assume neq: "j ‚â† i"
  assume asm: "x ‚àà (mdss ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite"
  show "x ‚àà (mdss ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
  proof(cases "x ‚àà X")
    assume xin: "x ‚àà X"
    let ?mdss‚á©X = "restrict_modes mdss X"
    from asm xin have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite"
      unfolding restrict_modes_def
      using ilen by auto
    
    with compat_X jlen ilen neq 
    have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
      unfolding compatible_modes_def
      by auto
    with xin jlen show ?thesis
      unfolding restrict_modes_def by auto
  next
    assume xnin: "x ‚àâ X"
    let ?mdss‚á©X = "restrict_modes mdss (- X)"
    from asm xnin have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite"
      unfolding restrict_modes_def
      using ilen by auto
    
    with compat_compX jlen ilen neq 
    have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
      unfolding compatible_modes_def
      by auto
    with xnin jlen show ?thesis
      unfolding restrict_modes_def by auto
  qed
next
  fix i x j
  assume ilen: "i < length mdss"
  assume jlen: "j < length mdss"
  assume neq: "j ‚â† i"
  assume asm: "x ‚àà (mdss ! i) AsmNoWrite"
  show "x ‚àà (mdss ! j) GuarNoWrite"
  proof(cases "x ‚àà X")
    assume xin: "x ‚àà X"
    let ?mdss‚á©X = "restrict_modes mdss X"
    from asm xin have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! i) AsmNoWrite"
      unfolding restrict_modes_def
      using ilen by auto
    
    with compat_X jlen ilen neq 
    have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! j) GuarNoWrite"
      unfolding compatible_modes_def
      by auto
    with xin jlen show ?thesis
      unfolding restrict_modes_def by auto
  next
    assume xnin: "x ‚àâ X"
    let ?mdss‚á©X = "restrict_modes mdss (- X)"
    from asm xnin have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! i) AsmNoWrite"
      unfolding restrict_modes_def
      using ilen by auto
    
    with compat_compX jlen ilen neq 
    have "x ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! j) GuarNoWrite"
      unfolding compatible_modes_def
      by auto
    with xnin jlen show ?thesis
      unfolding restrict_modes_def by auto
  qed
qed

lemma in_restrict_modesD:
  "i < length mdss ‚üπ x ‚àà ((restrict_modes mdss X) ! i) m ‚üπ x ‚àà X ‚àß x ‚àà (mdss ! i) m"
  by(auto simp: restrict_modes_def)

lemma in_restrict_modesI:
  "i < length mdss ‚üπ x ‚àà X ‚üπ x ‚àà (mdss ! i) m ‚üπ x ‚àà ((restrict_modes mdss X) ! i) m "
  by(auto simp: restrict_modes_def)
  
lemma meval_sched_length:
  "meval_sched sched gc gc' ‚üπ length (fst gc') = length (fst gc)"
  apply(induct sched arbitrary: gc gc')
  by auto
  
  
end

context sifum_refinement_sys begin

lemma compatible_modes_old_vars:
  assumes compatible_modes‚á©A: "abs.compatible_modes (map snd cms‚á©A)" 
  assumes len‚á©A: "length cms‚á©A = length cms"
  assumes len‚á©C: "length cms‚á©C = length cms"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ: "(‚àÄi<length cms. ((cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A), cms‚á©C ! i, mem‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
  shows "conc.compatible_modes (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of))"
unfolding conc.compatible_modes_def
proof(clarsimp)
  fix i x
  assume i_len: "i < length cms‚á©C"
  let ?cms = "cms ! i" and
      ?c‚á©A = "fst (cms‚á©A ! i)" and ?mds‚á©A = "snd (cms‚á©A ! i)" and
      ?c‚á©C = "fst (cms‚á©C ! i)" and ?mds‚á©C = "snd (cms‚á©C ! i)"

  from in_‚Ñõ i_len len‚á©C
  have in_‚Ñõ_i: "((cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A), cms‚á©C ! i, mem‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel ?cms" by simp

  from i_len have "i < length (map snd cms‚á©C)" by simp
  hence m_x_range: "‚ãÄm. x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) m ‚üπ x ‚àà range var‚á©C_of ‚àß x ‚àà (map snd cms‚á©C ! i) m"
    using conc.in_restrict_modesD i_len by blast+
  hence m_x‚á©C_i: "‚ãÄm. x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) m ‚üπ x ‚àà ?mds‚á©C m"
    by (simp add: i_len)

  from secure_refinements i_len len‚á©C
  have "secure_refinement (‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel ?cms) (‚Ñõ_rel ?cms) (P_rel ?cms)" by simp
  hence preserves_modes_mem_‚Ñõ_i: "preserves_modes_mem (‚Ñõ_rel ?cms)"
    unfolding secure_refinement_def by simp

  from in_‚Ñõ_i have "(‚ü®?c‚á©A, ?mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©C, ?mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel ?cms" by clarsimp
  with preserves_modes_mem_‚Ñõ_i
  have "(‚àÄx‚á©A. mem‚á©A x‚á©A = mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)) ‚àß (‚àÄm. var‚á©C_of ` ?mds‚á©A m = range var‚á©C_of ‚à© ?mds‚á©C m)"
    unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def by blast
  with m_x‚á©C_i have m_x‚á©A: "‚ãÄm. x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) m ‚üπ var‚á©A_of x ‚àà ?mds‚á©A m"
    unfolding var‚á©A_of_def using m_x_range inj_image_mem_iff var‚á©C_of_inj by fastforce

  show "(x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂
          (‚àÄj<length cms‚á©C. j ‚â† i ‚ü∂
            x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite)) ‚àß
        (x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) AsmNoWrite ‚ü∂
          (‚àÄj<length cms‚á©C. j ‚â† i ‚ü∂
            x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! j) GuarNoWrite))"
    proof(safe)
      fix j
      assume AsmNoRW_x‚á©C: "x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite" and
        j_len: "j < length cms‚á©C" and
        j_not_i: "j ‚â† i"
      let ?cms' = "cms ! j" and
          ?c‚á©A' = "fst (cms‚á©A ! j)" and ?mds‚á©A' = "snd (cms‚á©A ! j)" and
          ?c‚á©C' = "fst (cms‚á©C ! j)" and ?mds‚á©C' = "snd (cms‚á©C ! j)"

      from AsmNoRW_x‚á©C m_x_range
      have x_range: "x ‚àà range var‚á©C_of" by simp

      from AsmNoRW_x‚á©C m_x‚á©A
      have "var‚á©A_of x ‚àà ?mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite" by simp
      with compatible_modes‚á©A
      have GuarNoRW_x‚á©A: "var‚á©A_of x ‚àà ?mds‚á©A' GuarNoReadOrWrite"
        unfolding abs.compatible_modes_def using i_len len‚á©A len‚á©C j_len j_not_i by clarsimp

      from in_‚Ñõ j_len len‚á©C
      have in_‚Ñõ_j: "((cms‚á©A ! j, mem‚á©A), cms‚á©C ! j, mem‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel ?cms'" by simp

      from j_len have j_len': "j < length (map snd cms‚á©C)" by simp

      from secure_refinements j_len len‚á©C
      have "secure_refinement (‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel ?cms') (‚Ñõ_rel ?cms') (P_rel ?cms')" by simp
      hence preserves_modes_mem_‚Ñõ_j: "preserves_modes_mem (‚Ñõ_rel ?cms')"
        unfolding secure_refinement_def by simp

      from in_‚Ñõ_j have "(‚ü®?c‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©C', ?mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel ?cms'" by clarsimp
      with preserves_modes_mem_‚Ñõ_j
      have "(‚àÄx‚á©A. mem‚á©A x‚á©A = mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)) ‚àß (‚àÄm. var‚á©C_of ` ?mds‚á©A' m = range var‚á©C_of ‚à© ?mds‚á©C' m)"
        unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def by blast

      with GuarNoRW_x‚á©A j_len j_len' mds‚á©A_of_def x_range conc.in_restrict_modesI var‚á©C_of_inj
      show "x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
        unfolding var‚á©A_of_def
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) doesnt_have_mode f_inv_into_f image_inv_f_f nth_map)
    next
      (* This argument is identical to that for AsmNoReadOrWrite *)
      fix j
      assume AsmNoWrite_x‚á©C: "x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! i) AsmNoWrite" and
        j_len: "j < length cms‚á©C" and
        j_not_i: "j ‚â† i"
      let ?cms' = "cms ! j" and
          ?c‚á©A' = "fst (cms‚á©A ! j)" and ?mds‚á©A' = "snd (cms‚á©A ! j)" and
          ?c‚á©C' = "fst (cms‚á©C ! j)" and ?mds‚á©C' = "snd (cms‚á©C ! j)"

      from AsmNoWrite_x‚á©C m_x_range
      have x_range: "x ‚àà range var‚á©C_of" by simp

      from AsmNoWrite_x‚á©C m_x‚á©A
      have "var‚á©A_of x ‚àà ?mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite" by simp
      with compatible_modes‚á©A
      have GuarNoWrite_x‚á©A: "var‚á©A_of x ‚àà ?mds‚á©A' GuarNoWrite"
        unfolding abs.compatible_modes_def using i_len len‚á©A len‚á©C j_len j_not_i by clarsimp

      from in_‚Ñõ j_len len‚á©C
      have in_‚Ñõ_j: "((cms‚á©A ! j, mem‚á©A), cms‚á©C ! j, mem‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel ?cms'" by simp

      from j_len have j_len': "j < length (map snd cms‚á©C)" by simp

      from secure_refinements j_len len‚á©C
      have "secure_refinement (‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel ?cms') (‚Ñõ_rel ?cms') (P_rel ?cms')" by simp
      hence preserves_modes_mem_‚Ñõ_j: "preserves_modes_mem (‚Ñõ_rel ?cms')"
        unfolding secure_refinement_def by simp

      from in_‚Ñõ_j have "(‚ü®?c‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©C', ?mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel ?cms'" by clarsimp
      with preserves_modes_mem_‚Ñõ_j
      have "(‚àÄx‚á©A. mem‚á©A x‚á©A = mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x‚á©A)) ‚àß (‚àÄm. var‚á©C_of ` ?mds‚á©A' m = range var‚á©C_of ‚à© ?mds‚á©C' m)"
        unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def by blast

      with GuarNoWrite_x‚á©A j_len j_len' mds‚á©A_of_def x_range conc.in_restrict_modesI var‚á©C_of_inj
      show "x ‚àà (conc.restrict_modes (map snd cms‚á©C) (range var‚á©C_of) ! j) GuarNoWrite"
        unfolding var‚á©A_of_def
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) doesnt_have_mode f_inv_into_f image_inv_f_f nth_map)
    qed
qed

lemma compatible_modes_new_vars:
  "length mdss = length cms ‚üπ modes_respect_priv mdss ‚üπ conc.compatible_modes (conc.restrict_modes mdss (- range var‚á©C_of))"
unfolding conc.compatible_modes_def
proof(safe)
  let ?X = "- range var‚á©C_of"
  let ?mdss‚á©X = "conc.restrict_modes mdss ?X"
  assume respect: "modes_respect_priv mdss"
  assume len_eq: "length mdss = length cms"
  fix i x‚á©C j
  assume ilen: "i < length ?mdss‚á©X"
  assume jlen: "j < length ?mdss‚á©X"
  assume neq: "j ‚â† i"
  assume asm‚á©X: "x‚á©C ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! i) AsmNoWrite"
  from conc.in_restrict_modesD ilen asm‚á©X conc.restrict_modes_length have 
    xin: "x‚á©C ‚àà ?X" and
    asm: "x‚á©C ‚àà (mdss ! i) AsmNoWrite" by metis+
  from asm have "False"
    using respect xin ilen conc.restrict_modes_length len_eq
    unfolding modes_respect_priv_def new_asms_NoReadOrWrite_only_def
    by force
  thus "x‚á©C ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! j) GuarNoWrite" by blast
next
  let ?X = "- range var‚á©C_of"
  let ?mdss‚á©X = "conc.restrict_modes mdss ?X"
  assume respect: "modes_respect_priv mdss"
  assume len_eq: "length mdss = length cms"
  fix i x‚á©C j
  assume ilen: "i < length ?mdss‚á©X"
  assume jlen: "j < length ?mdss‚á©X"
  assume neq: "j ‚â† i"
  assume asm‚á©X: "x‚á©C ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite"
  from conc.in_restrict_modesD ilen asm‚á©X conc.restrict_modes_length have 
    xin: "x‚á©C ‚àà ?X" and
    asm: "x‚á©C ‚àà (mdss ! i) AsmNoReadOrWrite" by metis+
  from respect asm xin ilen conc.restrict_modes_length len_eq have
    "x‚á©C ‚àà priv_mem‚á©C ! i"
    unfolding modes_respect_priv_def new_asms_only_for_priv_def
    by force
  with respect ilen jlen neq conc.restrict_modes_length len_eq have
    "x‚á©C ‚àà (mdss ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite"
    unfolding modes_respect_priv_def priv_is_guar_priv_def
    by force
  with jlen xin conc.in_restrict_modesI show
    "x‚á©C ‚àà (?mdss‚á©X ! j) GuarNoReadOrWrite" by force
qed

    
lemma sound_mode_use_preservation:
  "‚ãÄgc‚á©C gc‚á©A. 
    length (fst gc‚á©A) = length cms ‚üπ length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms  ‚üπ
    (‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ ((fst gc‚á©A ! i, snd gc‚á©A), (fst gc‚á©C ! i, snd gc‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)) ‚üπ
    abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A ‚üπ modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C)) ‚üπ
    conc.sound_mode_use gc‚á©C"
proof -
  fix gc‚á©C gc‚á©A
  assume len_eq [simp]: "length (fst gc‚á©A) = length cms"
     and len_eq'[simp]: "length (fst gc‚á©C) = length cms"
     and in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ãÄi. i < length cms ‚üπ ((fst gc‚á©A ! i, snd gc‚á©A), (fst gc‚á©C ! i, snd gc‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
     and sound_mode_use‚á©A: "abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A"
     and modes_respect_priv: "modes_respect_priv (map snd (fst gc‚á©C))"
  have "conc.globally_sound_mode_use gc‚á©C"
  unfolding conc.globally_sound_mode_use_def
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix mdss‚á©C'
    assume in_reachable_modes: "mdss‚á©C' ‚àà conc.reachable_mode_states gc‚á©C"
    from this obtain cms‚á©C' mem‚á©C' sched‚á©C where
      meval_sched‚á©C: "conc.meval_sched sched‚á©C gc‚á©C (cms‚á©C', mem‚á©C')" and
      mdss‚á©C'_def: "mdss‚á©C' = map snd cms‚á©C'"
      unfolding conc.reachable_mode_states_def by blast
    from traces_refinement[OF meval_sched‚á©C, OF len_eq len_eq' in_‚Ñõ sound_mode_use‚á©A modes_respect_priv] 
    obtain sched‚á©A gc‚á©A' cms‚á©A' mem‚á©A' where gc‚á©A'_def [simp]: "gc‚á©A' = (cms‚á©A', mem‚á©A')"  and
      meval_sched‚á©A: "abs.meval_sched sched‚á©A gc‚á©A gc‚á©A'" and
      in_‚Ñõ: "(‚àÄi<length cms.
              ((cms‚á©A' ! i, mem‚á©A'), cms‚á©C' ! i, mem‚á©C') ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
      and sound_mode_use‚á©A': "abs.sound_mode_use gc‚á©A'"
        by fastforce
    let ?mdss‚á©A' = "map snd cms‚á©A'"
    have "?mdss‚á©A' ‚àà abs.reachable_mode_states gc‚á©A"
      unfolding abs.reachable_mode_states_def
      using meval_sched‚á©A by fastforce
    hence compatible_modes‚á©A': "abs.compatible_modes ?mdss‚á©A'"
      using sound_mode_use‚á©A unfolding abs.sound_mode_use_def abs.globally_sound_mode_use_def
      by fastforce
    let ?X = "range var‚á©C_of"
    show "conc.compatible_modes mdss‚á©C'"
    proof(rule conc.compatible_modes_by_case_distinction[where X="?X"])
      show "conc.compatible_modes (conc.restrict_modes mdss‚á©C' ?X)"
        apply(simp add: mdss‚á©C'_def)
        apply(rule compatible_modes_old_vars[OF _ _ _ in_‚Ñõ])
          apply(rule compatible_modes‚á©A')
         using len_eq abs.meval_sched_length[OF meval_sched‚á©A] gc‚á©A'_def apply simp
        using len_eq' conc.meval_sched_length[OF meval_sched‚á©C] by simp
    next
      show "conc.compatible_modes (conc.restrict_modes mdss‚á©C' (- ?X))"
        apply(rule compatible_modes_new_vars)
         using len_eq' conc.meval_sched_length[OF meval_sched‚á©C] mdss‚á©C'_def apply simp
        apply(simp add: mdss‚á©C'_def)
        apply(rule meval_sched_modes_respect_priv[OF meval_sched‚á©C, simplified])
        using modes_respect_priv by simp
    qed
  qed
  
  moreover have "list_all (Œª cm. conc.locally_sound_mode_use (cm, (snd gc‚á©C))) (fst gc‚á©C)"
  unfolding list_all_length
  proof(clarify)
    fix i
    assume "i < length (fst gc‚á©C)"
    hence len: "i < length cms" by simp
    have preserves: "preserves_locally_sound_mode_use (‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
      apply(rule locally_sound_mode_use_preservation)
       using secure_refinements len apply blast
      using local_guarantee_preservation len by blast
    have "abs.locally_sound_mode_use (fst gc‚á©A ! i, snd gc‚á©A)"
      using sound_mode_use‚á©A ‚Äπi < length cms‚Ä∫ len_eq
      unfolding abs.sound_mode_use_def list_all_length
      by (simp add: case_prod_unfold)
    
    from this in_‚Ñõ[OF len] preserves[unfolded preserves_locally_sound_mode_use_def]
    show "conc.locally_sound_mode_use (fst gc‚á©C ! i, snd gc‚á©C)"
      by blast
  qed
      
  ultimately show "?thesis gc‚á©C gc‚á©A" unfolding conc.sound_mode_use_def 
  by (simp add: case_prod_unfold)
qed     
      
lemma refined_prog_secure:
  assumes len‚á©A [simp]: "length cms‚á©C = length cms"
  assumes len‚á©C [simp]: "length cms‚á©A = length cms"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ãÄi mem‚á©C. i < length cms ‚üπ  ((cms‚á©A ! i,mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C),(cms‚á©C ! i, mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ‚á©A: "(‚ãÄi mem‚á©C mem‚á©C'. ‚ü¶i < length cms; conc.low_mds_eq (snd (cms‚á©C ! i)) mem‚á©C mem‚á©C'‚üß
       ‚üπ ((cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C), (cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C')) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes sound_mode_use‚á©A: "(‚ãÄ mem‚á©A.  abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A))"
  assumes modes_respect_priv: "modes_respect_priv (map snd cms‚á©C)"
  shows "conc.prog_sifum_secure_cont cms‚á©C"
  apply(rule conc.sifum_compositionality_cont)
   apply(clarsimp simp: list_all_length)
   apply(clarsimp simp: conc.com_sifum_secure_def conc.low_indistinguishable_def)
   apply(rule conc.mm_equiv.intros)
    apply(rule R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm)
      apply(fastforce intro: bisims)
     apply(fastforce intro: secure_refinements)
    apply(fastforce simp: Ps_sym)
   apply(clarsimp simp: R‚á©C_of_def)
   apply(rename_tac i c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C mem‚á©C')
   apply(rule_tac x="fst (cms‚á©A ! i)" in exI)
   apply(rule_tac x="snd (cms‚á©A ! i)" in exI)
   apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C" in exI)
   apply(rule conjI)
    using in_‚Ñõ apply fastforce
   apply(rule_tac x="fst (cms‚á©A ! i)" in exI)
   apply(rule_tac x="snd (cms‚á©A ! i)" in exI)
   apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'" in exI)
   apply(rule conjI)
    using in_‚Ñõ apply fastforce
   apply(fastforce simp: in_‚Ñõ‚á©A Ps_refl_on_low_mds_eq)
  apply(clarify)
  apply(rename_tac mem‚á©C)
  apply(rule_tac gc‚á©A="(cms‚á©A,mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C)" in sound_mode_use_preservation)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    using in_‚Ñõ apply fastforce
   apply(rule sound_mode_use‚á©A)
  apply clarsimp
  by(rule modes_respect_priv)

lemma refined_prog_secure':
  assumes len‚á©A [simp]: "length cms‚á©C = length cms"
  assumes len‚á©C [simp]: "length cms‚á©A = length cms"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ãÄi mem‚á©C. i < length cms ‚üπ ((cms‚á©A ! i,mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C),(cms‚á©C ! i, mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ‚á©A: "(‚ãÄi mem‚á©A mem‚á©A'. ‚ü¶i < length cms;  abs.low_mds_eq (snd (cms‚á©A ! i)) mem‚á©A mem‚á©A'‚üß
       ‚üπ ((cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A), (cms‚á©A ! i, mem‚á©A')) ‚àà ‚Ñõ‚á©A_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes sound_mode_use‚á©A: "(‚ãÄ mem‚á©A.  abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A))"
  assumes modes_respect_priv: "modes_respect_priv (map snd cms‚á©C)"
  shows "conc.prog_sifum_secure_cont cms‚á©C"
  apply(rule refined_prog_secure)
       apply(rule len‚á©A)
      apply(rule len‚á©C)
     apply(blast intro: in_‚Ñõ)
    apply(rule in_‚Ñõ‚á©A)
     apply assumption
    apply(subgoal_tac "snd (cms‚á©A ! i) = mds‚á©A_of (snd (cms‚á©C ! i))")
     using low_mds_eq_from_conc_to_abs apply fastforce
    apply(rule_tac ‚Ñõ1="‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)" and c‚á©A1="fst (cms‚á©A ! i)" and c‚á©C1="fst (cms‚á©C ! i)" in preserves_modes_memD[THEN conjunct2])
     using secure_refinements unfolding secure_refinement_def apply fast
    apply clarsimp
    using in_‚Ñõ apply fastforce
   apply(blast intro: sound_mode_use‚á©A)
  by(rule modes_respect_priv)
    
end
  
context sifum_security begin

definition
  reachable_mems :: "('Com √ó (Mode ‚áí 'Var set)) list ‚áí ('Var,'Val) Mem ‚áí ('Var,'Val) Mem set"
where
  "reachable_mems cms mem ‚â° {mem'. ‚àÉsched cms'. meval_sched sched (cms,mem) (cms',mem')}"

lemma reachable_mems_refl:
  "mem ‚àà reachable_mems cms mem"
  apply(clarsimp simp: reachable_mems_def)
  apply(rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
  apply fastforce
  done
  
end

context sifum_refinement_sys begin

lemma reachable_mems_refinement:
  assumes sys_nonempty: "length cms > 0"
  assumes len‚á©A [simp]: "length cms‚á©C = length cms"
  assumes len‚á©C [simp]: "length cms‚á©A = length cms"
  assumes in_‚Ñõ: "(‚ãÄi mem‚á©C. i < length cms ‚üπ ((cms‚á©A ! i,mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C),(cms‚á©C ! i, mem‚á©C)) ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
  assumes sound_mode_use‚á©A: "(‚ãÄ mem‚á©A. abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A, mem‚á©A))"
  assumes modes_respect_priv: "modes_respect_priv (map snd cms‚á©C)"
  assumes reachable‚á©C: "mem‚á©C' ‚àà conc.reachable_mems cms‚á©C mem‚á©C"
  shows "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àà abs.reachable_mems cms‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C)"
proof -
  from reachable‚á©C obtain sched‚á©C cms‚á©C' where
    meval_sched‚á©C: "conc.meval_sched sched‚á©C (cms‚á©C, mem‚á©C) (cms‚á©C', mem‚á©C')"
    by (fastforce simp: conc.reachable_mems_def)
  
  let ?mem‚á©A = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C"
  
  have sound_mode_use‚á©A: "abs.sound_mode_use (cms‚á©A, ?mem‚á©A)"  
    by(rule sound_mode_use‚á©A)

  from traces_refinement[where gc‚á©A="(cms‚á©A,?mem‚á©A)", OF meval_sched‚á©C, OF _ _ _ sound_mode_use‚á©A]
       in_‚Ñõ[of _ mem‚á©C]
       modes_respect_priv
  obtain sched‚á©A cms‚á©A' mem‚á©A' where
    meval_sched‚á©A: "abs.meval_sched sched‚á©A (cms‚á©A, ?mem‚á©A) (cms‚á©A', mem‚á©A')" and
    in_‚Ñõ': "(‚àÄi<length cms.
               ((cms‚á©A' ! i, mem‚á©A'), cms‚á©C' ! i, mem‚á©C') ‚àà ‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i))"
    by fastforce
  hence reachable‚á©A: "mem‚á©A' ‚àà abs.reachable_mems cms‚á©A ?mem‚á©A"
    by(fastforce simp: abs.reachable_mems_def)
  from sys_nonempty obtain i where ilen: "i < length cms" by blast
  let ?‚Ñõi = "‚Ñõ_rel (cms ! i)"
  from ilen secure_refinements have "preserves_modes_mem ?‚Ñõi"
    unfolding secure_refinement_def by blast
  from ilen in_‚Ñõ' preserves_modes_memD[OF this] have
    mem‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'"
    by(metis surjective_pairing)
  with reachable‚á©A show ?thesis by simp
qed

end

end

Theory Eg1

theory Eg1
imports Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.Compositionality
        Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.Language
        Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.TypeSystemTactics
begin

datatype var = control_var | buffer | high_var | low_var | temp

type_synonym addr = var
type_synonym val = nat
type_synonym mem = "addr ‚áí val"

(* Address expression evaluation *)
datatype aexp = Const "val" |
                Load "addr"

fun 
  ev‚á©A :: "mem ‚áí aexp ‚áí val"
where
  "ev‚á©A mem (Const v) = v" |
  "ev‚á©A mem (Load x) = mem x"

(* Boolean expression evaluation *)
datatype bexp = Same "addr" "addr" |
                NotSame "addr" "addr" |
                Eq "addr" "val" |
                Neq "addr" "val" | TT | FF

fun
  ev‚á©B :: "mem ‚áí bexp ‚áí bool"
where
  "ev‚á©B mem (Same x y) = ((mem x) = (mem y))" | 
  "ev‚á©B mem (NotSame x y) = ((mem x) ‚â† (mem y))" |
  "ev‚á©B mem (Eq x c) = ((mem x) = c)" | 
  "ev‚á©B mem (Neq x c) = ((mem x) ‚â† c)" |
  "ev‚á©B mem TT = True" |
  "ev‚á©B mem FF = False"


(* NB: dma ~ "domain assignment"
 * Domain assignment function based on the value of a control variable,
 * Low if 0, High otherwise. *)
definition
  dma_control_var :: "val ‚áí Sec"
where
  "dma_control_var v ‚â° if v = 0 then Low else High"

(* buffer's security level is controlled by control_var.
 * high_var's is High.
 * All other memory's security level is Low. *)
definition
  dma :: "mem ‚áí addr ‚áí Sec"
where
  "dma m x ‚â° if x = buffer then dma_control_var (m control_var) else if x = high_var then High else Low"

(* Function that gives the control variables of a given variable.
 * Only buffer is controlled by a control variable, control_var *)
definition
  ùíû_vars :: "addr ‚áí addr set"
where
  "ùíû_vars x ‚â° if x = buffer then {control_var} else {}"

(* NB: mds ~ "mode state"
 * mds‚á©s is the initial mode state - start with it empty. *)
definition
  mds‚á©s :: "Mode ‚áí var set"
where 
  "mds‚á©s ‚â° Œªm. {}"

primrec
  aexp_vars :: "aexp ‚áí var set"
where
  "aexp_vars (Const _) = {}" |
  "aexp_vars (Load v) = {v}"
  
fun
  bexp_vars :: "bexp ‚áí addr set"
where
  "bexp_vars (Neq x c) = {x}" |
  "bexp_vars (Eq x c) = {x}" |
  "bexp_vars (Same x y) = {x,y}" |
  "bexp_vars (NotSame x y) = {x,y}" |
  "bexp_vars _ = {}"

  
fun
  bexp_neg :: "bexp ‚áí bexp"
where
  "bexp_neg (Neq x y) = (Eq x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Eq x y) = (Neq x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Same x y) = (NotSame x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (NotSame x y) = (Same x y)" |
  "bexp_neg TT = FF" |
  "bexp_neg FF = TT"


fun
  bexp_assign :: "addr ‚áí aexp ‚áí bexp"
where
  "bexp_assign x (Const y) = (Eq x y)" |
  "bexp_assign x (Load y)  = (Same x y)"

locale sifum_example =
  sifum_lang_no_dma ev‚á©A ev‚á©B aexp_vars bexp_vars +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚üπ (lc, lc'') ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚üπ lc' = lc''"

definition
  ùíû :: "addr set"
where
  "ùíû ‚â° ‚ãÉx. ùíû_vars x"

fun
  dma_type :: "addr ‚áí bexp set"
where
  "dma_type high_var = {FF}" |
  "dma_type buffer = {Eq control_var 0}" |
  "dma_type _ = {}"


sublocale sifum_example ‚äÜ  sifum_types_assign ev‚á©A ev‚á©B aexp_vars bexp_vars dma ùíû_vars ùíû  bexp_neg dma_type FF bexp_assign
  apply(unfold_locales)
              apply(blast intro: eval_det)
             apply(rule Var_finite)
            apply(auto simp: ùíû_vars_def dma_def ùíû_def split: if_splits)[3]
         apply(rename_tac mem e, case_tac e, auto)[1]
        apply(case_tac x, auto simp: dma_def dma_control_var_def)[1]
       apply(case_tac x, auto simp: ùíû_vars_def)[1]
      apply(simp+)[2]
    apply(case_tac e, auto)[1]
   apply(case_tac e, simp+)
  apply(auto simp: ùíû_def)
  done

sublocale sifum_example ‚äÜ  sifum_security dma ùíû_vars ùíû eval‚á©w undefined
  by (unfold_locales)


context sifum_example begin


definition
  read_buffer :: "(addr, aexp, bexp) Stmt"
where
  "read_buffer ‚â° 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_var AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign temp (Load buffer) ;;
     If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)) ;;
     Assign temp (Const 0) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel temp AsmNoReadOrWrite)"
thm read_buffer_def

(* PROOF VIA TYPESYSTEM BELOW - adapted from Example_TypeSystem *)

lemma ùíû_simp[simp]:
  "ùíû = {control_var}"
  by(auto simp: ùíû_def ùíû_vars_def split: if_splits)
  
lemma type_aexpr_Load:
  "v ‚àâ dom Œì ‚üπ type_aexpr Œì (Load v) (dma_type v)"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Œì "Load v", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Load':
  "v ‚àà dom Œì ‚üπ t = (the (Œì v)) ‚üπ type_aexpr Œì (Load v) t"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Œì "Load v", simplified])
  apply(simp add: to_total_def)
  done

lemma type_aexpr_Const:
  "type_aexpr Œì (Const c) {}"
  apply(insert type_aexpr[of Œì "Const c", simplified])
  apply(simp)
  done


declare restrict_preds_to_vars_def [simp]
declare add_pred_def [simp]
declare stable_def [simp]
declare to_total_def [simp]
declare ùíû_vars_def [simp]
declare anno_type_stable_def [simp]
declare anno_type_sec_def [simp]

lemma [simp]: "pred_entailment P {}" by(simp add: pred_entailment_def pred_def)
lemma [simp]: "e ‚àà P ‚üπ pred_entailment P {e}" by(blast intro: subset_entailment)
lemma [simp]: "FF ‚àà P ‚üπ pred_entailment P Q" by(auto simp: pred_entailment_def pred_def)

lemma read_buffer_typed:
  "Œì = (Œª_. None) ‚üπ ùíÆ = ({},{}) ‚üπ P = {} ‚üπ 
  ‚àÉŒì' ùíÆ' P'. has_type Œì ùíÆ P read_buffer Œì' ùíÆ' P'"
  apply(intro exI)
  apply(simp add: read_buffer_def)
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule skip_type)
      apply simp
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assign‚á©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Load)
     apply simp
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule if_type')
       apply(rule type_bexprI)
       apply simp
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule assign‚á©1)
         apply simp
        apply(simp)
       apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
        apply simp
       apply simp
      apply(clarsimp simp: subtype_def pred_def)
     apply(simp)
    apply(rule assign‚á©1)
        apply simp
       apply simp
      apply(rule type_aexpr_Load')
       apply simp
      apply simp
     apply(clarsimp simp: subtype_def pred_def)
    apply(simp)
   apply clarsimp
  apply fastforce
  apply(rule seq_type)
   apply(rule assign‚á©2[OF _ _ _ HOL.refl])
      apply simp
     apply(rule type_aexpr_Const)
    apply simp
   apply simp
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rule anno_type[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
      apply clarsimp
      apply(rule skip_type)
     apply simp
    apply(clarsimp simp: add_anno_def subtype_def pred_def bot_Sec_def[symmetric] pred_entailment_def)
   apply simp
  apply simp
  done



lemma read_buffer_typed_auto:
  "Œì = (Œª_. None) ‚üπ ùíÆ = ({},{}) ‚üπ P = {} ‚üπ 
  ‚àÉŒì' ùíÆ' P'. has_type Œì ùíÆ P read_buffer Œì' ùíÆ' P'"
  by (has_type_tac 
            prog: read_buffer_def 
            aexpr: type_aexpr_Load type_aexpr_Load' type_aexpr_Const
            bexpr: type_bexprI)


lemma read_buffer_com_sifum_secure:
  "com_sifum_secure (read_buffer,(Œªm. {}))"
  apply(insert read_buffer_typed[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
  apply clarify
  apply(rule typed_secure)
   apply(fastforce simp: Œì_of_mds_def ùíÆ_of_mds_def)
  apply(auto simp: mds_yields_stable_types_def)
  done

(* Toby: removed manual bisimulation proof since we now use the type system
   and the manual proofs take quite a while to process. See git log to recover them. *)
end
end

Theory Eg1RefinementTrivial

theory Eg1RefinementTrivial
imports Eg1
        "../CompositionalRefinement"
        Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.TypeSystem
begin

sublocale sifum_example ‚äÜ
    sifum_refinement_same_mem dma ùíû_vars ùíû eval‚á©w eval‚á©w
      by(unfold_locales)

context sifum_example begin

text ‚ÄπThis predicate can be used to express arbitrary relational invariants for
  compiler-specific features, but for this trivial case the vacuous one is fine.
‚Ä∫
definition P_true :: "('a √ó 'a) set"
where
  "P_true  ‚â° UNIV"

lemma Id_secure_refinement:
  "secure_refinement R Id P_true"
  unfolding secure_refinement_def
  proof(safe)
    show "closed_others Id"
    unfolding closed_others_def Id_def by blast
  next
    show "preserves_modes_mem Id"
    unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def Id_def by blast
  next
    fix c‚á©1‚á©A mds mem‚á©1 c‚á©1‚á©C c‚á©1‚á©C' mds' mem‚á©1'
    assume step: "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà eval‚á©w"
    show
      "‚àÉn c‚á©1‚á©A'.
          neval ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C n ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
          (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà Id ‚àß
          (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2 c‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2'.
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà Id ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P_true ‚àß
              neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
              (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà Id ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P_true))"
    proof -
      let ?n = "Suc 0"
      let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = c‚á©1‚á©C'
      from step have "neval ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C ?n ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C"
        by simp
      moreover have "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà Id"
        by simp
      moreover have "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A mem‚á©2 c‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2'.
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà R ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà Id ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P_true ‚àß
              neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C ?n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C ‚ü∂
              (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà Id ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà P_true))"
        using step
        unfolding P_true_def
        by clarsimp
      ultimately show ?thesis by blast
    qed
  next
    show "closed_glob_consistent P_true"
      by(auto simp: closed_glob_consistent_def P_true_def)
  qed

text ‚Äπ
  This doesn't really mean much, but shows the lemmas in action.
  (I suspect that @{term "R‚á©C_of R Id"} is equivalent to @{term R}. But who cares?)
‚Ä∫
lemma "strong_low_bisim_mm (gen_refine.R‚á©C_of (‚Ñõ Œì ùíÆ P) Id P_true)"
  apply(rule R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm)
   apply(rule ‚Ñõ_bisim)
  apply(rule Id_secure_refinement)
  unfolding P_true_def sym_def apply blast
  done

end

end

Theory Eg2

theory Eg2
imports Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.Language
begin

datatype var‚á©C = control_var‚á©C | buffer‚á©C | high_var‚á©C | low_var‚á©C | temp‚á©C | reg‚á©C

type_synonym addr‚á©C = var‚á©C
type_synonym val = nat
type_synonym mem‚á©C = "addr‚á©C ‚áí val"

(* Address expression evaluation *)
datatype aexp‚á©C = Const "val" |
                 Load "addr‚á©C"

fun 
  ev‚á©A‚á©C :: "mem‚á©C ‚áí aexp‚á©C ‚áí val"
where
  "ev‚á©A‚á©C mem (Const v) = v" |
  "ev‚á©A‚á©C mem (Load x) = mem x"

(* Boolean expression evaluation *)
datatype bexp‚á©C = Eq "addr‚á©C" "val"

fun
  ev‚á©B‚á©C :: "mem‚á©C ‚áí bexp‚á©C ‚áí bool"
where
  "ev‚á©B‚á©C mem (Eq x v) = ((mem x) = v)"

(* NB: dma ~ "domain assignment"
 * Domain assignment function based on the value of a control variable,
 * Low if 0, High otherwise. *)
definition
  dma_control_var‚á©C :: "val ‚áí Sec"
where
  "dma_control_var‚á©C v ‚â° if v = 0 then Low else High"

(* buffer's security level is controlled by control_var.
 * high_var's is High.
 * All other memory's security level is Low. *)
definition
  dma‚á©C :: "mem‚á©C ‚áí addr‚á©C ‚áí Sec"
where
  "dma‚á©C m x ‚â° if x = buffer‚á©C then dma_control_var‚á©C (m control_var‚á©C) else if x = high_var‚á©C then High else Low"

(* Function that gives the control variables of a given variable.
 * Only buffer is controlled by a control variable, control_var *)
definition
  ùíû_vars‚á©C :: "addr‚á©C ‚áí addr‚á©C set"
where
  "ùíû_vars‚á©C x ‚â° if x = buffer‚á©C then {control_var‚á©C} else {}"

primrec
  aexp_vars‚á©C :: "aexp‚á©C ‚áí var‚á©C set"
where
  "aexp_vars‚á©C (Const _) = {}" |
  "aexp_vars‚á©C (Load v) = {v}"
  
primrec
  bexp_vars‚á©C :: "bexp‚á©C ‚áí var‚á©C set"
where
  "bexp_vars‚á©C (Eq v w) = {v}"

locale sifum_example2 =
  sifum_lang_no_dma ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C aexp_vars‚á©C bexp_vars‚á©C +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚üπ (lc, lc'') ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚üπ lc' = lc''"

definition
  ùíû‚á©C :: "addr‚á©C set"
where
  "ùíû‚á©C ‚â° ‚ãÉx. ùíû_vars‚á©C x"

context sifum_example2 begin

definition
  read_buffer‚á©C :: "(var‚á©C, aexp‚á©C, bexp‚á©C) Stmt"
where
  "read_buffer‚á©C ‚â° 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq control_var‚á©C AsmNoWrite) ;; 
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;;
     Assign temp‚á©C (Load buffer‚á©C) ;;
     Assign reg‚á©C (Load control_var‚á©C);;
     If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) (Assign low_var‚á©C (Load temp‚á©C)) (Assign high_var‚á©C (Load temp‚á©C)) ;;
     Assign temp‚á©C (Const 0) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Rel temp‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite)"

end

end

Theory Eg1Eg2

theory Eg1Eg2
imports Eg1
        Eg2
        "../CompositionalRefinement"
begin

locale sifum_refinement_eg1_eg2 =
  A: sifum_example +
  C: sifum_example2

primrec Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 :: "Eg1.var ‚áí Eg2.var‚á©C"
where
  "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 control_var = control_var‚á©C" |
  "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 buffer = buffer‚á©C" |
  "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 high_var = high_var‚á©C" |
  "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 low_var = low_var‚á©C" |
  "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 temp = temp‚á©C"

sublocale sifum_refinement_eg1_eg2 ‚äÜ sifum_refinement dma dma‚á©C ùíû_vars ùíû_vars‚á©C ùíû ùíû‚á©C A.eval‚á©w C.eval‚á©w undefined Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1
  supply image_cong_simp [cong del] INF_cong_simp [cong] SUP_cong_simp [cong] subst_all [simp del]
  apply(unfold_locales)
           apply(erule C.eval_det, simp)
          apply(rule C.Var_finite)
         apply(simp add:ùíû_vars‚á©C_def split:if_splits)
        apply(simp add:ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def)
       apply(simp add:ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def)
      apply(rule inj_onI, simp)
      apply(case_tac x)
          apply(case_tac y, simp+)
         apply(case_tac y, simp+)
        apply(case_tac y, simp+)
       apply(case_tac y, simp+)
      apply(case_tac y, simp+)
     apply(case_tac x‚á©A)
         apply(clarsimp simp:dma‚á©C_def dma_def dma_control_var_def dma_control_var‚á©C_def)+
    apply(case_tac x‚á©A)
        apply(clarsimp simp:ùíû_vars‚á©C_def ùíû_vars_def)+
   apply(rule set_eqI, clarsimp)
   apply(case_tac x, clarsimp)
        apply(rule_tac x=control_var in rev_image_eqI, clarsimp+)
       apply(case_tac xa, clarsimp+)
          apply(case_tac xb, clarsimp+)
      apply(case_tac xa, clarsimp+)
         apply(case_tac xb, clarsimp+)
     apply(case_tac xa, clarsimp+)
        apply(case_tac xb, clarsimp+)
    apply(case_tac xa, clarsimp+)
       apply(case_tac xb, clarsimp+)
   apply(case_tac xa, clarsimp+)
  apply(simp add:ùíû‚á©C_def)
  done

context sifum_refinement_eg1_eg2
begin


lemma bisim_simple_‚Ñõ:
  "bisim_simple (A.‚Ñõ Œì ùíÆ P)"
  unfolding bisim_simple_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply(drule_tac lc="‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A" and lc'="‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A" in A.bisim_simple_‚Ñõ‚á©u)
  by simp

(* Don't know to what extent these helpers can be made generic enough to go into any parent theories.
   Again, mightn't be able to (or bother to) make some generic considering the aexp evaluator
   is going to be specific to each language. *)

lemma conc_only_vars_not_visible_abs:
  "(‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àà range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ mem‚á©C v‚á©C = mem‚á©C' v‚á©C) ‚üπ mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'"
  by (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)

lemma conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs:
  "‚àÄv‚á©C e. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C = mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C(v‚á©C := e))"
  using conc_only_vars_not_visible_abs
  by simp

lemma reg‚á©C_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything:
  "reg‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ False"
  by (induct x, clarsimp+)

lemma reg‚á©C_not_visible_abs:
  "reg‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1"
  using reg‚á©C_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything
  by blast

(* This one's pretty specific to this refinement... *)
lemma reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var:
  "v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚üπ v‚á©C = reg‚á©C"
  apply(case_tac v‚á©C)
       apply(erule rev_notE, clarsimp, rule_tac x=control_var in range_eqI, clarsimp)
      apply(erule rev_notE, clarsimp, rule_tac x=buffer in range_eqI, clarsimp)
     apply(erule rev_notE, clarsimp, rule_tac x=high_var in range_eqI, clarsimp)
    apply(erule rev_notE, clarsimp, rule_tac x=low_var in range_eqI, clarsimp)
   apply(erule rev_notE, clarsimp, rule_tac x=temp in range_eqI, clarsimp)
  apply clarsimp
  done

lemma NoRW‚á©A_implies_NoRW‚á©C:
  "x ‚àà mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚üπ
   Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite"
  unfolding mds‚á©A_of_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp only: Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1_def)
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp add: f_inv_into_f)
  done

lemma NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C:
  "x ‚àà mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoWrite ‚üπ
   Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoWrite"
  unfolding mds‚á©A_of_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp only: Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1_def)
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp add: f_inv_into_f)
  done

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Eg1.Load y, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := mem y)‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
  by (metis A.assign_eval‚á©w ev‚á©A.simps(2))

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Load y, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := mem y)‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.unannotated[OF C.assign, where E="[]", simplified]
  apply(drule_tac x=x in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x="Load y" in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mds in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mem in meta_spec)
  apply clarsimp
  done

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©A:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Eg1.Const c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := c)‚ü©) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
  by (metis A.assign_eval‚á©w ev‚á©A.simps(1))

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Const c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := c)‚ü©) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.unannotated[OF C.assign, where E="[]", simplified]
  apply(drule_tac x=x in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x="Const c" in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mds in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mem in meta_spec)
  apply clarsimp
  done

lemma if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©A:
  "(‚ü®If B T E, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B mem B then T else E, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w
    ‚üπ
   (‚ü®If B T E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B mem B then T ;; TAIL else E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
  using A.eval‚á©w.seq
  by auto

lemma if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©C:
  "(‚ü®If B T E, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B‚á©C mem B then T else E, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
    ‚üπ
   (‚ü®If B T E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B‚á©C mem B then T ;; TAIL else E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.eval‚á©w.seq
  by auto

lemma mem_assign_refinement_helper_var:
  "mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x := mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y)))
       = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) (x := (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) y)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mem‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext, clarsimp)
  apply(cases x)
      apply(case_tac x‚á©A, clarsimp+)+
  done

lemma mem_assign_refinement_helper_const:
  "mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x := c))
       = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) (x := c)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mem‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext, clarsimp)
  apply(cases x)
      apply(case_tac x‚á©A, clarsimp+)+
  done

lemma if_true_eval‚á©w‚á©C:
  shows "mem‚á©C x = 0 ‚ü∂
     (‚ü®(If (Eq x 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
      ‚ü®(c‚á©C_then ;; c‚á©C_tail), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.if_eval‚á©w C.eval‚á©w.seq ev‚á©B‚á©C.simps by presburger

lemma if_false_eval‚á©w‚á©C:
  shows "mem‚á©C x ‚â† 0 ‚ü∂
     (‚ü®(If (Eq x 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
      ‚ü®(c‚á©C_else ;; c‚á©C_tail), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.if_eval‚á©w C.eval‚á©w.seq ev‚á©B‚á©C.simps by presburger


end

end

Theory Eg1Eg2RefinementSimple

theory Eg1Eg2RefinementSimple
imports Eg1Eg2
begin

context sifum_refinement_eg1_eg2
begin

inductive_set RelS_Eg1Eg2 :: "(
    (((var, aexp, bexp) Stmt √ó (Mode ‚áí var set)) √ó (var ‚áí val)) √ó
     ((var‚á©C, aexp‚á©C, bexp‚á©C) Stmt √ó (Mode ‚áí var‚á©C set)) √ó (var‚á©C ‚áí val)
    ) set"
where
  acq_mode_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = ModeDecl Skip (Acq x SomeMode) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = ModeDecl Skip (Acq (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) SomeMode) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  rel_mode_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = ModeDecl Skip (Rel x SomeMode);
    c‚á©C = ModeDecl Skip (Rel (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) SomeMode);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  assign_load_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x ‚Üê aexp.Load y) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = ((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) ‚Üê aexp‚á©C.Load (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y)) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπWith this requirement it is possible to establish ‚Äπx ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite‚Ä∫.‚Ä∫
    ‚å¶‚Äπx ‚â† y;‚Ä∫
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπHowever since we've deemed it reasonable to require ‚Äπx ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoWrite‚Ä∫,‚Ä∫
    ‚Äï ‚Äπit makes little sense not to just require ‚Äπx ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite‚Ä∫ as well.‚Ä∫
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπWithout this requirement, we would have to prove preservation of ‚Äπdoesnt_modify c x‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    ‚Äï ‚Äπbecause ‚Äπx ‚àà mds‚á©A GuarNoWrite‚Ä∫ holds in the case where ‚Äπmem‚á©A x = mem‚á©A y‚Ä∫.‚Ä∫
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπIt makes more sense just to assume a blanket ban on this guarantee for this instruction,‚Ä∫
    ‚Äï ‚Äπseeing as it is clearly a write operation to ‚Äπx‚Ä∫.‚Ä∫
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπThis command loads from ‚Äπy‚Ä∫, so it makes little sense to guarantee we're not reading it‚Ä∫
    y ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπRequirements for sound mode use preservation for variables other than ‚Äπx‚Ä∫ and ‚Äπy‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    x ‚àâ ùíû;
    y ‚àâ ùíû;
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  assign_const_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x ‚Üê aexp.Const z) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = ((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) ‚Üê aexp‚á©C.Const z) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoWrite;
    x ‚àâ ùíû;
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  if_reg_load_rel: "‚ü¶
    c‚á©A = (If (Eg1.Eq x 0) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = (reg‚á©C ‚Üê (Load (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x))) ;; ((If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    reg‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    reg‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNope: need to make this one versatile enough to allow ‚Äπc = control_var‚Ä∫ for our example‚Ä∫
    ‚å¶‚Äπx ‚àâ ùíû;‚Ä∫
    ‚àÄx'. x ‚àà ùíû_vars x' ‚ü∂ x' ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    (‚àÄmem‚á©A' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©A'' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe change in ‚Äπmem‚á©C‚Ä∫ does not affect ‚Äπmem‚á©A‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe concrete and abstract versions of the bool condition must become consistent‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C' (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A' (Eg1.Eq x 0) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; (If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; (If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2)
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  if_reg_stop_rel: "‚ü¶
    c‚á©A = (If (Eg1.Eq x 0) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; ((If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß x ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπLikely we will need to carry this through to the ‚Äπif_reg_rel‚Ä∫ case.‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A (Eg1.Eq x 0);
