    (‚àÄmem‚á©A' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©A'' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe change in ‚Äπmem‚á©C‚Ä∫ does not affect ‚Äπmem‚á©A‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe concrete and abstract versions of the bool condition must remain consistent‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C' (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A' (Eg1.Eq x 0) ‚àß
         ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C'' (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Eg1.Eq x 0) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®(If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A,
          ‚ü®(If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2)
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  if_reg_rel: "‚ü¶
‚Äï ‚ÄπIs a more generic version possible for an arbitrary ‚Äπb‚á©A‚Ä∫?‚Ä∫
    ‚å¶‚Äπc‚á©A = (If b‚á©A c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else) ;; c‚á©A_tail;‚Ä∫
    ‚å¶‚Äπb‚á©A = Eg1.Eq x 0;‚Ä∫  ‚Äï ‚Äπ‚Äπev‚á©B mem‚á©A b‚á©A‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    c‚á©A = (If (Eg1.Eq x 0) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = (If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß x ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe concrete and abstract versions of the bool condition must have remained consistent‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A (Eg1.Eq x 0);
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAs for ‚Äπif_reg_load_rel‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    reg‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    reg‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚àÄx'. x ‚àà ùíû_vars x' ‚ü∂ x' ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    (‚àÄmem‚á©A' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©A'' mem‚á©C''.
       mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
       mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
       ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C'' (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Eg1.Eq x 0) ‚àß
       ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C' (Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A' (Eg1.Eq x 0) ‚àß
       (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A,
        ‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Eg1.Eq x 0)) then c‚á©A_then else c‚á©A_else) ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
       (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
        ‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C'' (Eq reg‚á©C 0)) then c‚á©C_then else c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
       ‚ü∂
       (‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Eg1.Eq x 0)) then c‚á©A_then else c‚á©A_else) ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,
        ‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C'' (Eq reg‚á©C 0)) then c‚á©C_then else c‚á©C_else) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2);
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπDisallow branching on variables that can potentially be in the high domain‚Ä∫
    x ‚â† buffer ‚àß x ‚â† high_var
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  stop_seq_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚ü®c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" |

  stop_rel:
    "(‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"


definition abs_steps' :: "(_,_,_) Stmt ‚áí (_,_,_) Stmt ‚áí nat" where
  "abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C ‚â°
    (if (‚àÉx m c‚á©A_tail. c‚á©A = ((Skip@[x +=‚á©m m]) ;; c‚á©A_tail)) ‚àß
        (‚àÉx m c‚á©C_tail. c‚á©C = ((Skip@[Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x +=‚á©m m]) ;; c‚á©C_tail)) then (Suc 0)
     else if (‚àÉ c‚á©A_tail c‚á©C_tail. c‚á©A = (Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail) ‚àß c‚á©C = (Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail)) then (Suc 0)
     else if (‚àÉ x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C.
        c‚á©A = (Stmt.If (bexp.Eq x 0) then‚á©A else‚á©A ;; tail‚á©A) ‚àß
        (c‚á©C = ((reg‚á©C ‚Üê aexp‚á©C.Load (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x)) ;; Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C)) ‚à®
         c‚á©C = (Stop ;; Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C))
        then 0
     else (Suc 0))"

fun abs_steps
where
"abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©A, _, _‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©C, _, _‚ü©‚á©C = abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C"

lemma closed_others_RelS_Eg1Eg2:
  "closed_others RelS_Eg1Eg2"
unfolding closed_others_def
proof(clarify)
fix c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C mem‚á©C'
assume
  in_rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
    ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" and
  vars: " ‚àÄx. mem‚á©C x ‚â† mem‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
and  dmas: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C mem‚á©C x ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
from in_rel vars dmas
show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
  proof (induct rule: RelS_Eg1Eg2.induct)
  case (acq_mode_rel c‚á©A x SomeMode tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using acq_mode_rel
    by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.acq_mode_rel)
  next
  case (rel_mode_rel c‚á©A x SomeMode c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using rel_mode_rel
    by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.rel_mode_rel)
  next
  case (assign_load_rel c‚á©A x y tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using assign_load_rel
    by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.assign_load_rel)
  next
  case (assign_const_rel c‚á©A x z tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using assign_const_rel
    by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.assign_const_rel)
  next
  case (if_reg_load_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using if_reg_load_rel
    by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.if_reg_load_rel)
  next
  case (if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using if_reg_stop_rel
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_reg_stop_rel.hyps(3,5,6) if_reg_stop_rel.prems(1)
      have reg‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg‚á©C = mem‚á©C' reg‚á©C" and
        x‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) = mem‚á©C' (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x)" and
        x‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C x = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x"
        using reg‚á©C_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C
        by (clarsimp simp:var_asm_not_written_def, blast)+
      with if_reg_stop_rel.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "(mem‚á©C' reg‚á©C = 0) = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x = 0)"
        by simp
      with if_reg_stop_rel RelS_Eg1Eg2.if_reg_stop_rel
      show "(‚ü®Stmt.If (bexp.Eq x 0) then‚á©A else‚á©A ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
        by clarsimp
    qed
  next
  case (if_reg_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using if_reg_rel
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_reg_rel.hyps(3,5,6) if_reg_rel.prems(1)
      have reg‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg‚á©C = mem‚á©C' reg‚á©C" and
        x‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) = mem‚á©C' (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x)" and
        x‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C x = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x"
        using reg‚á©C_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C
        by (clarsimp simp:var_asm_not_written_def, blast)+
      with if_reg_rel.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "(mem‚á©C' reg‚á©C = 0) = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x = 0)"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®Stmt.If (bexp.Eq x 0) then‚á©A else‚á©A ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
        apply (rule RelS_Eg1Eg2.if_reg_rel, simp+)
            using if_reg_rel apply simp
           using if_reg_rel apply simp
          using conds_still_match apply simp
         using if_reg_rel apply blast+
        done
    qed
  next
  case (stop_seq_rel c‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using stop_seq_rel
    by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.stop_seq_rel)
  next
  case (stop_rel mds‚á©C mem‚á©C)
  show ?case by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.stop_rel)
  qed
qed

lemma preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2:
  "preserves_modes_mem RelS_Eg1Eg2"
unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def2
proof(clarsimp)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C
  assume in_rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
  thus "mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C ‚àß mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C"
    by (cases rule:RelS_Eg1Eg2.cases, blast+)
qed

(* Just some exploration to see what's likely to be needed *)

lemma mem_twist_other: "z ‚â† x ‚üπ z ‚â† y ‚üπ mem (x := mem y, z := v) = mem (z := v, x := (mem (z := v)) y)"
  by (simp add: fun_upd_other fun_upd_twist)

lemma reg‚á©C_load_helper:
  "x‚á©C ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ
   (‚ü®reg‚á©C ‚Üê aexp‚á©C.Load (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x), mds, mem(x‚á©C := v)‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem
            (x‚á©C := v, reg‚á©C := mem (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x))‚ü©‚á©C) =
   (‚ü®reg‚á©C ‚Üê aexp‚á©C.Load (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x), mds, mem(x‚á©C := v)‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem
            (x‚á©C := v, reg‚á©C := (mem(x‚á©C := v)) (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x))‚ü©‚á©C)"
  using fun_upd_other by simp

lemma preserves_local_guarantee_compliance_RelS_Eg1Eg2:
  "preserves_local_guarantee_compliance RelS_Eg1Eg2"
proof(clarsimp simp:preserves_local_guarantee_compliance_def2)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C
  assume in_RelS: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" and
    respects‚á©A: "A.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A, mds‚á©A)"
  thus "conc.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C)"
  unfolding conc.respects_own_guarantees_def conc.doesnt_read_or_modify_def conc.doesnt_read_or_modify_vars_def conc.doesnt_modify_def
  proof(induct rule:RelS_Eg1Eg2.induct)
    case (acq_mode_rel c‚á©A x m tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from acq_mode_rel.hyps(2-3)
      show ?case using C.decl_eval‚á©w' C.eval‚á©w.seq C.seq_decl_elim by fastforce+
    next
    case (rel_mode_rel c‚á©A x m c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from rel_mode_rel.hyps(2-3)
      show ?case using C.decl_eval‚á©w' C.eval‚á©w.seq C.seq_decl_elim by fastforce+
    next
    case (assign_load_rel c‚á©A x y tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      hence in_RelS: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
        by (simp add:RelS_Eg1Eg2.intros(3))

      from assign_load_rel.prems show ?case
      proof (clarify)
        assume respects‚á©A: "A.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A, mds‚á©A)"
        fix x‚á©C
        let ?case_x‚á©C = "(x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   (‚àÄx‚àà{x‚á©C} ‚à™ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C.
                       ‚àÄv. (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C)
                           ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C))) ‚àß
              (x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   mem x‚á©C = mem' x‚á©C ‚àß dma‚á©C mem x‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem' x‚á©C))"

        (* For x‚á©C = x, we have to argue that the abstract version of x‚á©C must have the same
           guarantees as for x‚á©C, which yields contradictions in both cases. *)
        from assign_load_rel(3,6,7) preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2 has_mode‚á©A
        have notGuarNoRW_x‚á©C: "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite" and
             notGuarNoWrite_x‚á©C: "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite" by clarsimp+

        (* For x‚á©C = y, waive doesnt_read_or_modify using ¬¨ GuarNoRW y from refinement relation,
           and the proof for doesnt_modify is straightforward *)
        from assign_load_rel(3,8) preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2 has_mode‚á©A
        have "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite" by clarsimp
        with assign_load_rel(2)
        have "‚ü¶x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y; Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C‚üß ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          apply clarsimp
          apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
          using ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def by auto

        (* For all other x‚á©C, the proof should be straightforward because c‚á©C does not touch x‚á©C,
           and we've required that x and y cannot potentially be the control var of x‚á©C *)
        moreover have "‚ü¶x‚á©C ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x; x‚á©C ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y;
               Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C; Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C‚üß
              ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          using assign_load_rel(2,6) apply safe
             apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
             apply(simp add: mem_twist_other C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C del:fun_upd_apply)
            apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
            apply(subgoal_tac "xa ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àß xa ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y")
             apply(simp add: mem_twist_other C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C del:fun_upd_apply)
            apply blast
           apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
          apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
          using ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def by auto

        moreover have "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C" and "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C"
          using assign_load_rel(9-10) unfolding ùíû_vars‚á©C_def
          by (metis Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1.simps(1) A.ùíû_simp empty_iff insert_iff inv_f_eq var‚á©C_of_inj)+
        moreover note notGuarNoRW_x‚á©C notGuarNoWrite_x‚á©C
        moreover have "x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C" by auto
        ultimately show ?case_x‚á©C by fastforce
      qed
    next
    case (assign_const_rel c‚á©A x z tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from assign_const_rel.prems show ?case
      proof (clarify)
        assume respects‚á©A: "A.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A, mds‚á©A)"
        fix x‚á©C
        let ?case_x‚á©C = "(x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   (‚àÄx‚àà{x‚á©C} ‚à™ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C.
                       ‚àÄv. (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C)
                           ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C))) ‚àß
              (x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   mem x‚á©C = mem' x‚á©C ‚àß dma‚á©C mem x‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem' x‚á©C))"
        from assign_const_rel(3,6,7) preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2 has_mode‚á©A
        have notGuarNoRW_x‚á©C: "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite" and
             notGuarNoWrite_x‚á©C: "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite" by clarsimp+

        moreover have "‚ü¶x‚á©C ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x; Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C‚üß ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          using assign_const_rel(2,8) apply safe
             apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
             apply(simp add: fun_upd_twist C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)
            apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
            apply(subgoal_tac "xa ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x")
             apply(simp add: fun_upd_twist C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)
            apply blast
           apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
          apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
          using ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def by auto

        moreover have "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C"
          using assign_const_rel(8) unfolding ùíû_vars‚á©C_def
          by (metis Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1.simps(1) A.ùíû_simp empty_iff insert_iff inv_f_eq var‚á©C_of_inj)
        moreover note notGuarNoRW_x‚á©C notGuarNoWrite_x‚á©C
        moreover have "x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C" by auto
        ultimately show ?case_x‚á©C by fastforce
      qed
    next
    case (if_reg_load_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from if_reg_load_rel.prems show ?case
      proof (clarify)
        assume respects‚á©A: "A.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A, mds‚á©A)"
        fix x‚á©C
        let ?case_x‚á©C = "(x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   (‚àÄx‚àà{x‚á©C} ‚à™ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C.
                       ‚àÄv. (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C)
                           ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C))) ‚àß
              (x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   mem x‚á©C = mem' x‚á©C ‚àß dma‚á©C mem x‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem' x‚á©C))"
        (* For x‚á©C = x, waive doesnt_read_or_modify using ¬¨ GuarNoRW x from refinement relation
           (makes sense because it's being read), then doesnt_modify is straightforward *)
        from if_reg_load_rel(3,8) preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2 has_mode‚á©A
        have "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite" by clarsimp
        with if_reg_load_rel(2)
        have "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          apply clarsimp
          apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
          using ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def by auto

        moreover from if_reg_load_rel(2)
        have "‚ü¶x‚á©C ‚â† reg‚á©C; x‚á©C ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x; reg‚á©C ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C;
               Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àà ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite‚üß ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          apply safe
             apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
             apply(simp add:fun_upd_twist del:fun_upd_apply)
             apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq, clarsimp)
             apply(simp add:reg‚á©C_load_helper del:fun_upd_apply)
             apply(rule assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
            apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
            apply(simp add:fun_upd_twist del:fun_upd_apply)
            apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq, clarsimp)
            apply(subgoal_tac "xa ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àß xa ‚â† reg‚á©C")
             apply clarsimp
             apply(simp add:fun_upd_twist reg‚á©C_load_helper assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C del:fun_upd_apply)
            apply blast
           apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
          apply(clarsimp, drule C.seq_assign_elim)
          using ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def by auto
        moreover from if_reg_load_rel(3,9)
        have "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àà ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite"
          by (metis Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1.simps(1-2) ùíû_vars‚á©C_def ùíû_vars_def empty_iff has_mode‚á©A insert_iff inv_f_f var‚á©C_of_inj)

        (* We waive cases where x‚á©C = reg‚á©C by requiring ¬¨ GuarNoRW reg‚á©C and ¬¨ GuarNoWrite reg‚á©C
           which makes sense if we consider concrete-only variables like reg‚á©C to be private.
           Furthermore we establish that reg‚á©C cannot be a control var.  *)
        moreover have "x‚á©C = reg‚á©C ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          using if_reg_load_rel(6-7) by clarsimp
        moreover have "reg‚á©C ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C"
          using reg‚á©C_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything ùíû_vars‚á©C_def by clarsimp
        ultimately show ?case_x‚á©C by fastforce
      qed
    next
    case (if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from if_reg_stop_rel(2) show ?case
        by (metis C.seq_stop_elim C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w fst_conv)
    next
    case (if_reg_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from if_reg_rel.prems show ?case
      proof (clarify)
        assume respects‚á©A: "A.respects_own_guarantees (c‚á©A, mds‚á©A)"
        fix x‚á©C
        let ?case_x‚á©C = "(x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   (‚àÄx‚àà{x‚á©C} ‚à™ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C.
                       ‚àÄv. (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'(x := v)‚ü©‚á©C)
                           ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C))) ‚àß
              (x‚á©C ‚àà snd (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C) GuarNoWrite ‚ü∂
               (‚àÄmds mem c' mds' mem'.
                   (‚ü®fst (c‚á©C, mds‚á©C), mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
                   mem x‚á©C = mem' x‚á©C ‚àß dma‚á©C mem x‚á©C = dma‚á©C mem' x‚á©C))"
        from if_reg_rel(3,10) preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2 has_mode‚á©A
        have "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite" by clarsimp
        with if_reg_rel(2)
        have "x‚á©C = Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          apply clarsimp
          apply(drule C.seq_elim, clarsimp)
          using ùíû_vars‚á©C_def dma‚á©C_def by auto
        moreover from if_reg_rel(2)
        have "‚ü¶x‚á©C ‚â† reg‚á©C; x‚á©C ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x; reg‚á©C ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C;
            Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àà ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite‚üß ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          apply safe
             apply(subgoal_tac "(mem(x‚á©C := v)) reg‚á©C = mem reg‚á©C")
              apply clarsimp
              apply(drule C.seq_elim, clarsimp+)
              apply(erule C.if_elim, clarsimp)
               apply(simp add: if_true_eval‚á©w‚á©C if_false_eval‚á©w‚á©C)+
            apply(subgoal_tac "xa ‚â† Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àß xa ‚â† reg‚á©C")
             apply(drule C.seq_elim, clarsimp+)
             apply(erule C.if_elim, clarsimp)
              apply(simp add: if_true_eval‚á©w‚á©C if_false_eval‚á©w‚á©C)+
            apply blast
           apply clarsimp
           apply(drule C.seq_elim, clarsimp+)
           apply(erule C.if_elim, clarsimp+)
          apply(drule C.seq_elim, clarsimp+)
          apply(erule C.if_elim, clarsimp+)
          done
        moreover from if_reg_rel(3,11)
        have "Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x ‚àà ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C ‚üπ x‚á©C ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite"
          by (metis Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1.simps(1-2) ùíû_vars‚á©C_def ùíû_vars_def empty_iff has_mode‚á©A insert_iff inv_f_f var‚á©C_of_inj)
        moreover have "x‚á©C = reg‚á©C ‚üπ ?case_x‚á©C"
          using if_reg_rel(8-9) by clarsimp
        moreover have "reg‚á©C ‚àâ ùíû_vars‚á©C x‚á©C"
          using reg‚á©C_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything ùíû_vars‚á©C_def by clarsimp
        ultimately show ?case_x‚á©C by fastforce
      qed
    next
    case (stop_seq_rel c‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
      from stop_seq_rel(2)
      show ?case by (metis C.seq_stop_elim C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w fst_conv)
    next
    case stop_rel
      thus ?case by (simp add: C.stop_no_eval)
  qed
qed

definition mdss‚á©A_of :: "((var‚á©C Mds) list) ‚áí ((var Mds) list)"
where
  "mdss‚á©A_of mdss‚á©C = map mds‚á©A_of mdss‚á©C"

lemma new_vars_private_RelS_Eg1Eg2:
  "sifum_refinement.new_vars_private dma‚á©C C.eval‚á©w Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 RelS_Eg1Eg2"
unfolding new_vars_private_def
(* Slightly more intuitive goals without simp converting ‚à® to ‚ü∂ *)
proof(clarify)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C c‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C'
  assume in_rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" and
      does_eval: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  let "?diff_mem v‚á©C" = "mem‚á©C' v‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©C v‚á©C"
  let "?diff_dma v‚á©C" = "dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' v‚á©C < dma‚á©C mem‚á©C v‚á©C"
  let "?conc_only v‚á©C" = "v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1"
  show "(‚àÄv‚á©C. (?diff_mem v‚á©C ‚à® ?diff_dma v‚á©C) ‚àß ?conc_only v‚á©C ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite) ‚àß
         mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite - range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1
         ‚äÜ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite - range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1" (* not sure what to call this one *)
  using in_rel does_eval
  proof(cases rule:RelS_Eg1Eg2.cases)
  case (acq_mode_rel x SomeMode tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    moreover with does_eval
    have "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C (SomeMode := insert (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) (mds‚á©C SomeMode))"
      by (metis (mono_tags) C.seq_decl_elim C.update_modes.simps(1))
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
  case (rel_mode_rel x SomeMode)
    moreover with does_eval
    have "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C (SomeMode := {y. y ‚àà (mds‚á©C SomeMode) ‚àß y ‚â† (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x)})"
      by (metis (mono_tags) C.upd_elim C.skip_elim C.update_modes.simps(2))
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by auto
  next
  case (assign_load_rel x y tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(14) set_eq_subset)
  next
  case (assign_const_rel x z tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(14) set_eq_subset)
  next
  case (if_reg_load_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(14) set_eq_subset)
  next
  case (if_reg_stop_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.seq_stop_elim subset_refl)
  next
  case (if_reg_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    have mds‚á©C_unchanged: "mds‚á©C = mds‚á©C'"
      by (metis C.if_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(50))
    moreover with if_reg_rel(5)
    have "‚àÄv‚á©C. (?diff_mem v‚á©C ‚à® ?diff_dma v‚á©C) ‚àß ?conc_only v‚á©C ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
      by simp
    moreover from mds‚á©C_unchanged
    have "mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite - range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚äÜ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite - range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1"
      by clarify
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
  case (stop_seq_rel tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval C.seq_stop_elim
    show ?thesis
      by blast
  next
  case (stop_rel)
    with does_eval C.stop_no_eval have False by simp
    thus ?thesis by simp
  qed
qed

lemma simple_refinement_safe_RelS_Eg1Eg2:
assumes R_low_mds_eq:
  "‚ãÄc mds mem mem'. (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c, mds, mem'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà Some_R ‚üπ A.low_mds_eq mds mem mem'"
shows
  "sifum_refinement.simple_refinement_safe C.eval‚á©w Some_R RelS_Eg1Eg2 abs_steps"
unfolding simple_refinement_safe_def
proof(clarsimp)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C
  assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà Some_R" and
       in_RelS_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" and
       in_RelS_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
  show "stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C ‚àß
       (‚àÄmds‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C' c‚á©1‚á©C' c‚á©2‚á©C'.
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©1‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©2‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w  ‚ü∂
           c‚á©1‚á©C' = c‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß mds‚á©1‚á©C' = mds‚á©2‚á©C')"
  using in_RelS_1 in_RelS_2
  proof(cases rule:RelS_Eg1Eg2.cases)
  case (acq_mode_rel x m tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    let ?mds‚á©C' = "mds‚á©C(m := insert (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) (mds‚á©C m))"
    from acq_mode_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, ?mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, ?mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: C.decl_eval‚á©w' C.eval‚á©w.seq)+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case (rel_mode_rel x m)
    let ?mds‚á©C' = "mds‚á©C(m := {y. y ‚àà (mds‚á©C m) ‚àß y ‚â† (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x)})"
    from rel_mode_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, ?mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, ?mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: C.decl_eval‚á©w')+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case (assign_load_rel x y tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    from assign_load_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C,
               mem‚á©1‚á©C((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) := mem‚á©1‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y))‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C,
               mem‚á©2‚á©C((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) := mem‚á©2‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y))‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C C.eval‚á©w.seq)+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case (assign_const_rel x z tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    from assign_const_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C,
               mem‚á©1‚á©C((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) := z)‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C,
               mem‚á©2‚á©C((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) := z)‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C C.eval‚á©w.seq)+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case (if_reg_load_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C)
    from if_reg_load_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C,
               mem‚á©1‚á©C(reg‚á©C := mem‚á©1‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x))‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C,
               mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg‚á©C := mem‚á©2‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x))‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C C.eval‚á©w.seq)+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case (if_reg_stop_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C)
    from if_reg_stop_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
              ‚ü®Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
              ‚ü®Stmt.If (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w)+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case (if_reg_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C)
    from if_reg_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
              ‚ü®(if ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then then‚á©C else else‚á©C) ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
              ‚ü®(if ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) then then‚á©C else else‚á©C) ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: if_true_eval‚á©w‚á©C if_false_eval‚á©w‚á©C)+
    hence stops_eq: "stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C = stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
      unfolding stops‚á©C_def by blast
    (* Side-conditions ensure both programs take the same branch *)
    from in_R R_low_mds_eq
    have "A.low_mds_eq mds‚á©A mem‚á©1‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©A" by clarsimp
    with if_reg_rel(6,13) dma_def
    have "ev‚á©B mem‚á©1‚á©A (bexp.Eq x 0) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©A (bexp.Eq x 0)"
      by (simp add:A.low_mds_eq_def)
    with if_reg_rel(1,2,7) in_RelS_2
    have "ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©1‚á©C (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0) = ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0)"
      apply clarsimp
      by (cases rule:RelS_Eg1Eg2.cases, simp+)
    with if_reg_rel(1,2) eval_1 eval_2 C.eval_det have
      "(‚àÄmds‚á©1‚á©C' mds‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©1‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C' c‚á©1‚á©C' c‚á©2‚á©C'.
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©1‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©2‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A‚á©C ev‚á©B‚á©C ‚ü∂
           c‚á©1‚á©C' = c‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß mds‚á©1‚á©C' = mds‚á©2‚á©C')"
      by (clarsimp, blast)
    thus ?thesis using stops_eq by simp
  next
  case (stop_seq_rel tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    from stop_seq_rel have
    eval_1: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w" and
    eval_2: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp add: C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w)+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def using C.eval_det by blast
  next
  case stop_rel
    with C.stop_no_eval have
      stops_1: "stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C" and
      stops_2: "stops‚á©C ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C"
      unfolding stops‚á©C_def by simp+
    thus ?thesis unfolding stops‚á©C_def by auto
  qed
qed

lemma induction_RelS_Eg1Eg2:
notes A.update_modes.simps[simp del]
shows
"(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2 ‚üπ
       (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w ‚üπ
       ‚àÉc‚á©1‚á©A' mds‚á©A' mem‚á©1‚á©A'.
          A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A
           (abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©1‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
           ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
          (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', mds‚á©A', mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
proof(induct rule: RelS_Eg1Eg2.induct)
case (acq_mode_rel c‚á©A x m tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
  from acq_mode_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_acq: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  moreover from acq_mode_rel.prems acq_mode_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C(m := insert (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) (mds‚á©C m))" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    by (metis (mono_tags) C.seq_decl_elim C.update_modes.simps(1))+
  moreover from mds‚á©C'_def
  have mds‚á©A'_def: "?mds‚á©A' = A.update_modes (x +=‚á©m m) (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C)"
    unfolding A.update_modes.simps
    by(blast intro: mode_acquire_refinement_helper)
  moreover with mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def acq_mode_rel A.eval‚á©w.seq A.decl_eval‚á©w
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    by clarsimp
  moreover from acq_mode_rel(5)
  have mds‚á©C'_concrete_vars_unwritable:
    "(‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite)"
    by(auto simp: mds‚á©C'_def)
  moreover with acq_mode_rel(6)[simplified] acq_mode_rel.hyps(4) neval‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    by (metis A.neval_Suc_simp One_nat_def acq_mode_rel.prems)
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) One_nat_def abs_steps.simps n_not_Suc_n)
next
case (rel_mode_rel c‚á©A x m c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop"
  from rel_mode_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_acq: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  moreover from rel_mode_rel.prems rel_mode_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = Stop" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C(m := {y. y ‚àà (mds‚á©C m) ‚àß y ‚â† (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x)})" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    by (metis (mono_tags) C.upd_elim C.skip_elim C.update_modes.simps(2))+
  moreover from mds‚á©C'_def
  have mds‚á©A'_def: "?mds‚á©A' = A.update_modes (x -=‚á©m m) (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C)"
    unfolding A.update_modes.simps
    by(blast intro: mode_release_refinement_helper)
  moreover with mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_mode_rel A.eval‚á©w.seq A.decl_eval‚á©w
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    by clarsimp
  moreover from rel_mode_rel(5)
  have mds‚á©C'_concrete_vars_unwritable:
    "(‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite)"
    by(auto simp: mds‚á©C'_def)
  moreover with rel_mode_rel(6)[simplified] rel_mode_rel.hyps(4) neval‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    by (metis A.neval_Suc_simp One_nat_def rel_mode_rel.prems)
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) One_nat_def abs_steps.simps n_not_Suc_n)
next
case (assign_load_rel c‚á©A x y tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from assign_load_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_load: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from assign_load_rel.prems assign_load_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) := mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 y))"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim C.skip_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(14))+
  from assign_load_rel(1,3,4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w" and
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using A.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_var by simp+
  with assign_load_rel(11)[simplified] assign_load_rel.prems c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using assign_load_rel.hyps(4-5) mds‚á©C'_def by blast
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_load neval‚á©A by auto
next
case (assign_const_rel c‚á©A x z tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from assign_const_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_const: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from assign_const_rel.prems assign_const_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C((Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x) := z)"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim C.skip_elim assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(14))+
  from assign_const_rel(1,3,4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w" and
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using A.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_const by simp+
  with assign_const_rel(9)[simplified] assign_const_rel.prems c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using assign_const_rel.hyps(4) by blast
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_const neval‚á©A by auto
next
case (if_reg_load_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_reg_load_rel.hyps(1,2)
  have abs_steps_if_reg_load: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_reg_load_rel.prems if_reg_load_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(reg‚á©C := mem‚á©C (Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1 x))"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim C.skip_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(14))+
  from if_reg_load_rel(1-4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using reg‚á©C_not_visible_abs conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs A.neval.intros(1) by simp+
  with if_reg_load_rel c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    apply clarsimp
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©1‚á©C' in allE)
    apply(erule_tac impE)
     apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©C in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply clarsimp
      apply (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
     using if_reg_load_rel.prems mem‚á©A_of_def apply blast
    apply clarsimp
    done
  show ?case using rel' abs_steps_if_reg_load neval‚á©A by auto
next
case (if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_reg_stop_rel.hyps(1,2)
  have abs_steps_if_reg_stop: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_reg_stop_rel.prems if_reg_stop_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (If (Eq reg‚á©C 0) then‚á©C else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by simp+
  from if_reg_stop_rel(1-4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using reg‚á©C_not_visible_abs conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs A.neval.intros(1) by simp+
  with if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2" by blast
  show ?case using rel' abs_steps_if_reg_stop neval‚á©A by auto
next
case (if_reg_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©A (bexp.Eq x 0)) then (then‚á©A ;; tail‚á©A) else (else‚á©A ;; tail‚á©A)"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_reg_rel(1) if_reg_rel(2)
  have abs_steps_if_reg: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = Suc 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_reg_rel.prems if_reg_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (if (ev‚á©B‚á©C mem‚á©C (bexp‚á©C.Eq reg‚á©C 0)) then (then‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C) else (else‚á©C ;; tail‚á©C))" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    apply simp_all
    by (drule C.seq_elim, simp, erule exE, clarsimp, erule C.if_elim, clarsimp+)+
  from if_reg_rel(1,3,4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    using if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©A A.if_eval‚á©w by presburger
  hence neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A (abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using abs_steps_if_reg by (simp only:A.neval_Suc_simp)
  from if_reg_rel(3,4,7,12) if_reg_rel.prems c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def eval‚á©A
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    by (clarify, presburger)
  show ?case using rel' abs_steps_if_reg neval‚á©A by auto
next
case (stop_seq_rel c‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "tail‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from stop_seq_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_stop: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from stop_seq_rel
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by auto
  hence
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
    using stop_seq_rel A.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by auto
  thus ?case using abs_steps_stop by auto
next
case stop_rel
  with C.stop_no_eval have False by simp
  thus ?case by simp
qed

definition
  mds‚á©0 :: "Mode ‚áí var‚á©C set"
where
  "mds‚á©0 ‚â° Œªm. case m of AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚áí {reg‚á©C} | _ ‚áí {}"

lemma read_buffer_assign_temp_onwards_RelS:
  "(‚ü®(temp ‚Üê aexp.Const 0) ;; (Skip@[temp -=‚á©m AsmNoReadOrWrite]),
         mds‚á©A_of ((case_Mode {reg‚á©C} {} {} {}) (AsmNoWrite := {control_var‚á©C},
                  AsmNoReadOrWrite := {temp‚á©C, reg‚á©C})),
         mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
        ‚ü®(temp‚á©C ‚Üê aexp‚á©C.Const 0) ;; (Skip@[temp‚á©C -=‚á©m AsmNoReadOrWrite]),
                  (case_Mode {reg‚á©C} {} {} {}) (AsmNoWrite := {control_var‚á©C},
                  AsmNoReadOrWrite := {temp‚á©C, reg‚á©C}),
                  mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
  (* Assign temp (Const 0) ;; *)
  apply(rule assign_const_rel, simp+)
   apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var doesnt_have_mode)+
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
  (* ModeDecl Skip (Rel temp AsmNoReadOrWrite)" *)
  apply(rule rel_mode_rel, simp+)
   apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var)+
  apply(rule stop_rel)
  done

lemma read_buffer_RelS:
  "(‚ü®A.read_buffer, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®C.read_buffer‚á©C, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RelS_Eg1Eg2"
  unfolding A.read_buffer_def C.read_buffer‚á©C_def mds‚á©0_def
  (* ModeDecl Skip (Acq buffer AsmNoWrite) ;; *)
  apply(rule acq_mode_rel, simp+)
   apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var)+
  apply(drule C.seq_decl_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
  (* ModeDecl Skip (Acq temp AsmNoReadOrWrite) ;; *)
  apply(rule acq_mode_rel, simp+)
   apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var)+
  apply(drule C.seq_decl_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
  (* Assign temp (Load buffer) ;; *)
  apply(rule assign_load_rel, simp+)
   apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var doesnt_have_mode)+
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
  (* If (Eq control_var 0) (Assign low_var (Load temp)) (Assign high_var (Load temp)) ;; *)
  apply(rule if_reg_load_rel, simp+)
   apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var doesnt_have_mode)+
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule if_reg_stop_rel, simp+)
     apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var)
    using has_mode‚á©A NoRW‚á©A_implies_NoRW‚á©C apply fastforce
   apply(clarsimp simp: has_mode‚á©A)+
  apply(rule if_reg_rel, simp+)
     apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var has_mode‚á©A doesnt_have_mode)+
   apply(rule conjI)
    (* (Assign low_var (Load temp)) ;; *)
    apply clarsimp
    apply(rule assign_load_rel, simp+)
     apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var doesnt_have_mode)+
     apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
    apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
    apply(rule read_buffer_assign_temp_onwards_RelS)
   (* (Assign high_var (Load temp)) ;; *)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rule assign_load_rel, simp+)
    apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_the_only_concrete_only_var doesnt_have_mode)+
    apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
   apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
   apply(rule read_buffer_assign_temp_onwards_RelS)
  apply simp
  done

lemma control_var_visible:
  "control_var‚á©C ‚àà range Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1"
  apply(unfold Eg2_var‚á©C_of_Eg1_def)
  apply(rule_tac x=control_var in range_eqI)
  apply clarsimp
  done

lemma mds‚á©s_A_of_mds‚á©0:
  "mds‚á©s = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0"
  apply(rule preserves_modes_mem_mds‚á©A_simp)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(case_tac m)
     unfolding mds‚á©s_def mds‚á©0_def mds‚á©A_of_def
     apply(clarsimp simp: reg‚á©C_not_visible_abs control_var_visible)+
  done

lemma A_of_mds‚á©0_is_mds‚á©s:
  "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0 = mds‚á©s"
  by (simp add: mds‚á©s_A_of_mds‚á©0)

(* using the bisimulation established by the type system *)

lemma RelS_Eg1Eg2_secure_refinement_simple_‚Ñõ:
  "secure_refinement_simple (A.‚Ñõ Œì ùíÆ P) RelS_Eg1Eg2 abs_steps"
  apply(unfold secure_refinement_simple_def)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule closed_others_RelS_Eg1Eg2)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule preserves_modes_mem_RelS_Eg1Eg2)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule new_vars_private_RelS_Eg1Eg2)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule simple_refinement_safe_RelS_Eg1Eg2)
   using A.‚Ñõ_to_‚Ñõ‚á©3 A.‚Ñõ‚á©3_mem_eq apply fast
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule bisim_simple_‚Ñõ)
  apply safe
  apply(drule (1) induction_RelS_Eg1Eg2, clarify)
  done

lemma RelS_Eg1Eg2_secure_refinement_‚Ñõ:
  "secure_refinement (A.‚Ñõ Œì ùíÆ P) RelS_Eg1Eg2 ‚Ñêsimple"
  apply(rule secure_refinement_simpler)
  apply(rule secure_refinement_simple)
  apply(rule RelS_Eg1Eg2_secure_refinement_simple_‚Ñõ)
  done

lemma strong_low_bisim_mm_R‚á©C_of_RelS_‚Ñõ:
  "conc.strong_low_bisim_mm (R‚á©C_of (A.‚Ñõ Œì ùíÆ P) RelS_Eg1Eg2 ‚Ñêsimple)"
  apply(rule R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm)
    apply(rule A.‚Ñõ_bisim)
   apply(rule RelS_Eg1Eg2_secure_refinement_‚Ñõ)
  apply(simp add: sym_def ‚Ñêsimple_def)
  done

lemma read_buffer‚á©C_secure:
  "conc.low_mds_eq mds‚á©0 mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2 ‚üπ ‚àÉ Œì' ùíÆ' P'.
   (‚ü®C.read_buffer‚á©C, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®C.read_buffer‚á©C, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà (R‚á©C_of (A.‚Ñõ Œì' ùíÆ' P') RelS_Eg1Eg2 ‚Ñêsimple)"
  apply(insert A.read_buffer_typed[OF HOL.refl HOL.refl HOL.refl])
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rule_tac x=Œì' in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x=a in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x=b in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x=x in exI)
  apply(clarsimp simp: R‚á©C_of_def)
  apply(rule_tac x=A.read_buffer in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0" in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1" in exI)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule read_buffer_RelS)
  apply(rule_tac x=A.read_buffer in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0" in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2" in exI)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule read_buffer_RelS)
  apply(simp add: A_of_mds‚á©0_is_mds‚á©s ‚Ñêsimple_def)
  apply(drule low_mds_eq_from_conc_to_abs)
  apply(rule A.Typed_in_‚Ñõ, simp)
      unfolding A.tyenv_wellformed_def apply safe
       unfolding A.mds_consistent_def apply clarsimp
      unfolding A.types_wellformed_def mds‚á©s_def apply simp
     unfolding A.types_stable_def apply simp
    apply clarsimp
    (* should be easy: low_mds_eq and low var ‚ü∂ equal mem var *)
    unfolding A.low_mds_eq_def apply clarsimp
    apply(rename_tac v, erule_tac x=v in allE)
    apply clarsimp
    apply safe
     apply(clarsimp simp: mds‚á©A_of_def mds‚á©0_def)
     apply(rename_tac xb, case_tac xb, simp_all)
    apply(case_tac v, clarsimp)
       unfolding dma_def mds‚á©0_def mds‚á©A_of_def pred_def
       using reg‚á©C_not_visible_abs apply auto[4]
   using A.pred_def apply clarsimp
  using A.pred_def apply clarsimp
  done

lemma "conc.com_sifum_secure (C.read_buffer‚á©C, mds‚á©0)"
  unfolding conc.com_sifum_secure_def conc.low_indistinguishable_def
  apply clarify
  apply(drule_tac read_buffer‚á©C_secure)
  apply(erule exE)+
  apply(rule conc.mm_equiv_intro)
   apply(rule_tac Œì=Œì' and ùíÆ=ùíÆ' and P=P' in strong_low_bisim_mm_R‚á©C_of_RelS_‚Ñõ)
  by simp

end

end

Theory EgHighBranchRevC

theory EgHighBranchRevC
imports Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.Compositionality
        Dependent_SIFUM_Type_Systems.Language
        "HOL-Eisbach.Eisbach_Tools"
        "../CompositionalRefinement"
begin

text ‚Äπ
  Theory for exploring refinement of a program that branches on a high variable.

  The purpose of this particular example is to demonstrate that in order to prove any branching
  on a High-classified variable remains safe when refined to a concrete implementation, it is
  necessary to ensure that the two concrete branches of execution take the same number of steps,
  possibly by skip-padding the one with less steps in it, and provide an appropriate coupling
  invariant to link the corresponding concrete steps of the two branches of the if-statement.
‚Ä∫

type_synonym 'var addr = 'var
type_synonym val = nat
type_synonym 'var mem = "'var addr ‚áí val"

(* Arithmetic expression evaluation *)
datatype 'var aexp = Const "val" |
                     Load "'var addr" |
                     Add "'var aexp" "'var aexp" |
                     Sub "'var aexp" "'var aexp"

fun
  ev‚á©A :: "'var mem ‚áí 'var aexp ‚áí val"
where
  "ev‚á©A mem (Const v) = v" |
  "ev‚á©A mem (Load x) = mem x" |
  "ev‚á©A mem (Add x y) = ev‚á©A mem x + ev‚á©A mem y" |
  "ev‚á©A mem (Sub x y) = ev‚á©A mem x - ev‚á©A mem y"

(* Boolean expression evaluation *)
datatype 'var bexp = Eq "'var aexp" "'var aexp" |
                     Neq "'var aexp" "'var aexp" |
                     Lte "'var aexp" "'var aexp" |
                     Gt "'var aexp" "'var aexp"

fun
  ev‚á©B :: "'var mem ‚áí 'var bexp ‚áí bool"
where
  "ev‚á©B mem (Eq x y) = (ev‚á©A mem x = ev‚á©A mem y)" |
  "ev‚á©B mem (Neq x y) = (ev‚á©A mem x ‚â† ev‚á©A mem y)" |
  "ev‚á©B mem (Lte x y) = (ev‚á©A mem x ‚â§ ev‚á©A mem y)" |
  "ev‚á©B mem (Gt x y) = (ev‚á©A mem x > ev‚á©A mem y)"

(* Function that gives the control variables of a given variable.
 * None for this example. *)
definition
  ùíû_vars :: "'var addr ‚áí 'var addr set"
where
  "ùíû_vars x ‚â° {}"

(* NB: mds ~ "mode state"
 * mds‚á©s is the initial mode state *)
definition
  mds‚á©s :: "Mode ‚áí 'var set"
where
  "mds‚á©s ‚â° Œªm. case m of AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚áí {} | _ ‚áí {}"

primrec
  aexp_vars :: "'var aexp ‚áí 'var set"
where
  "aexp_vars (Const _) = {}" |
  "aexp_vars (Load v) = {v}" |
  "aexp_vars (Add x y) = aexp_vars x ‚à™ aexp_vars y" |
  "aexp_vars (Sub x y) = aexp_vars x ‚à™ aexp_vars y"

fun
  bexp_vars :: "'var bexp ‚áí 'var addr set"
where
  "bexp_vars (Neq x y) = aexp_vars x ‚à™ aexp_vars y" |
  "bexp_vars (Eq x y) = aexp_vars x ‚à™ aexp_vars y" |
  "bexp_vars (Lte x y) = aexp_vars x ‚à™ aexp_vars y" |
  "bexp_vars (Gt x y) = aexp_vars x ‚à™ aexp_vars y"

fun
  bexp_neg :: "'var bexp ‚áí 'var bexp"
where
  "bexp_neg (Neq x y) = (Eq x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Eq x y) = (Neq x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Lte x y) = (Gt x y)" |
  "bexp_neg (Gt x y) = (Lte x y)"

fun
  bexp_assign :: "'var addr ‚áí 'var aexp ‚áí 'var bexp"
where
  "bexp_assign x a = (Eq (Load x) a)"

datatype var = h_var | x_var | y_var | z_var

definition
  dma :: "var mem ‚áí var addr ‚áí Sec"
where
  "dma m x ‚â° if x = h_var then High else Low"

type_synonym t_ev‚á©A = "var mem ‚áí var aexp ‚áí val"
type_synonym t_ev‚á©B = "var mem ‚áí var bexp ‚áí bool"
type_synonym t_aexp_vars = "var aexp ‚áí var set"
type_synonym t_bexp_vars = "var bexp ‚áí var addr set"

locale sifum_example =
  sifum_lang_no_dma "ev‚á©A::t_ev‚á©A" "ev‚á©B::t_ev‚á©B" "aexp_vars::t_aexp_vars" "bexp_vars::t_bexp_vars" +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚üπ (lc, lc'') ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚üπ lc' = lc''"

definition
  ùíû :: "var addr set"
where
  "ùíû ‚â° ‚ãÉx. ùíû_vars x"

sublocale sifum_example ‚äÜ  sifum_security dma ùíû_vars ùíû eval‚á©w undefined
  apply(unfold_locales)
       apply(blast intro: eval_det)
      apply(rule Var_finite)
     apply(auto simp: ùíû_vars_def dma_def ùíû_def split: if_splits)[3]
  apply(auto simp: ùíû_def)
  done

context sifum_example begin
(*
  y := 0; z := 0;
  x := y;
  if h then x := y
       else x := y + z

  Must have NoWrite z to prevent an agent getting something observable by spiking the value of z.
  Also take NoWrite y & h to simplify reasoning about reg values staying consistent with the mem.
 *)
definition
  prog_high_branch :: "(var addr, var aexp, var bexp) Stmt"
where
  "prog_high_branch ‚â°
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq h_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq y_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq z_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     )"
end

datatype var‚á©C = h_mem | x_mem | y_mem | z_mem | reg0 | reg1 | reg2 | reg3

definition
  dma‚á©C :: "var‚á©C mem ‚áí var‚á©C addr ‚áí Sec"
where
  "dma‚á©C m x ‚â° if x = h_mem then High else Low"

type_synonym t_ev‚á©A‚á©C = "var‚á©C mem ‚áí var‚á©C aexp ‚áí val"
type_synonym t_ev‚á©B‚á©C = "var‚á©C mem ‚áí var‚á©C bexp ‚áí bool"
type_synonym t_aexp_vars‚á©C = "var‚á©C aexp ‚áí var‚á©C set"
type_synonym t_bexp_vars‚á©C = "var‚á©C bexp ‚áí var‚á©C addr set"

locale sifum_example‚á©C =
  sifum_lang_no_dma "ev‚á©A::t_ev‚á©A‚á©C" "ev‚á©B::t_ev‚á©B‚á©C" "aexp_vars::t_aexp_vars‚á©C" "bexp_vars::t_bexp_vars‚á©C" +
  assumes eval_det: "(lc, lc') ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚üπ (lc, lc'') ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚üπ lc' = lc''"

definition
  ùíû‚á©C :: "var‚á©C addr set"
where
  "ùíû‚á©C ‚â° ‚ãÉx. ùíû_vars x"

sublocale sifum_example‚á©C ‚äÜ  sifum_security dma‚á©C ùíû_vars ùíû‚á©C eval‚á©w undefined
  apply(unfold_locales)
       apply(blast intro: eval_det)
      apply(rule Var_finite)
     apply(auto simp: ùíû_vars_def dma‚á©C_def ùíû_def split: if_splits)[3]
  apply(auto simp: ùíû‚á©C_def)
  done

context sifum_example‚á©C begin
(*
  y := 0; z := 0;
  x := y;
  if h
    then
      // "then"-branch: x := y
      NOP ;
      NOP ;
      LOAD r0 y ;
      STORE x r0 ;
    else
      // "else"-branch: x := y + z
      LOAD r1 y ;
      LOAD r2 z ;
      ADD r0 r1 r2 ;
      STORE x r0 ;
 *)
definition
  prog_high_branch‚á©C :: "(var‚á©C addr, var‚á©C aexp, var‚á©C bexp) Stmt"
where
  "prog_high_branch‚á©C ‚â°
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq h_mem AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq y_mem AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq z_mem AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ‚Äï ‚ÄπJust set up the memory to match our assumptions‚Ä∫
     Assign y_mem (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_mem (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load y_mem) ;;
     ‚Äï ‚ÄπFrom this point onwards we model the if-statement using registers.‚Ä∫
     ‚Äï ‚ÄπNote that we can just as well (re-)use reg0 instead of reg3 - verify with a search-replace.‚Ä∫
     ‚Äï ‚ÄπLeaving it this way to make the reg usages easier to distinguish for the reader, though.‚Ä∫
     Assign reg3 (Load h_mem) ;;
     If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) (
       Skip ;;
       Skip ;;
       Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
       Assign x_mem (Load reg0)
     ) (
       Assign reg1 (Load y_mem) ;;
       Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
       Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
       Assign x_mem (Load reg0)
     )"
end

context sifum_example begin
lemma ùíû_simp[simp]:
  "ùíû = {}"
  by(auto simp: ùíû_def ùíû_vars_def split: if_splits)

declare ùíû_vars_def [simp]

(* Manual proof of bisimulation because we can't use the type system *)
inductive inv :: "(((var addr, var aexp, var bexp) Stmt, var addr, val) LocalConf) ‚áí bool"
where
  inv‚á©1h: "‚ü¶c = prog_high_branch; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mds AsmNoWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©1h': "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq y_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq z_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©1y: "‚ü¶c =
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq y_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq z_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©1y': "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq z_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©1z: "‚ü¶c =
     ModeDecl Skip (Acq z_var AsmNoWrite) ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©1z': "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©2: "‚ü¶c =
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©2': "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©3: "‚ü¶c =
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©3': "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = 0‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©4: "‚ü¶c =
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = 0‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©4': "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = 0‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©5: "‚ü¶c =
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ); mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = 0‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©5_then: "‚ü¶c = Assign x_var (Load y_var);
     mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = 0‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©5_else: "‚ü¶c = Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
     mds AsmNoWrite = {z_var, y_var, h_var}; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = 0‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©" |
  inv‚á©6: "‚ü¶c = Stop‚üß ‚üπ
   inv ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©"

definition z_locked_steps
where "z_locked_steps ‚â° {
     Stop ;;
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ),
     Assign y_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ),
     Stop ;;
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     ),
     Assign z_var (Const 0) ;;
     Assign x_var (Load y_var) ;;
     If (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0)) (
       Assign x_var (Load y_var)
     ) (
       Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
     )}"

inductive_set rel_inv :: "(((var addr, var aexp, var bexp) Stmt, var addr, val) LocalConf) rel"
where
  rel_inv_if:
  "‚ü¶c = Assign x_var (Load y_var);
    c' = Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    z_var ‚àà mds AsmNoWrite; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = mem' z_var‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv" |
  rel_inv_if':
  "‚ü¶c' = Assign x_var (Load y_var);
    c = Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    z_var ‚àà mds AsmNoWrite; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}; mem z_var = mem' z_var‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv" |
  rel_inv_start:
  "‚ü¶c = c'; z_var ‚àâ mds AsmNoWrite; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv" |
  rel_inv_z_locked:
  "‚ü¶c ‚àà z_locked_steps;
    c = c'; z_var ‚àà mds AsmNoWrite; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv" |
  rel_inv_z_initted:
  "‚ü¶c ‚àâ z_locked_steps;
    c = c'; mem z_var = mem' z_var; z_var ‚àà mds AsmNoWrite; mds AsmNoReadOrWrite = {}‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv"

declare z_locked_steps_def[simp add]

(* the bisimulation is phrased as a conjunction of a global invariant and a
   relational invariant, defined above, plus the background requirement
   of low-equivalence modulo modes *)
inductive_set  R :: "(((var addr, var aexp, var bexp) Stmt, var addr, val) LocalConf) rel"
where
(* Having a c = c' requirement here is actually too restrictive *)
  "‚ü¶mds = mds'; low_mds_eq mds mem mem'; inv ‚ü®c,mds,mem‚ü©; inv ‚ü®c',mds',mem'‚ü©;
    (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚üß ‚üπ
 (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà R"

lemma rel_inv_sym:
  "low_mds_eq mds mem mem' ‚üπ (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c, mds, mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c, mds, mem'‚ü©, ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv"
  apply(auto elim!: rel_inv.cases intro: rel_inv.intros)
  done

lemma R_sym':
  "(‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà R ‚üπ
   (‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©, ‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©) ‚àà R"
  apply(rule R.intros)
      apply(blast elim: R.cases dest: low_mds_eq_sym dest: rel_inv_sym)+
  apply(erule R.cases)
  apply(erule rel_inv.cases)
      apply clarsimp
      apply(rule rel_inv_if', simp+)
     apply(rule rel_inv_if, simp+)
    apply(rule rel_inv_start, simp+)
   apply(rule rel_inv_z_locked, simp+)
  apply(rule rel_inv_z_initted, simp+)
  done

lemma R_sym:
  "sym R"
  by(rule symI, clarify, erule R_sym')

lemma inv_closed_glob_consistent:
  "inv ‚ü®c', mds', mem‚ü© ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx. case A x of None ‚áí True | Some (v, v') ‚áí mem x ‚â† v ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds' x ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx. dma mem [‚à•‚á©1 A] x ‚â† dma mem x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds' x  ‚üπ
       inv ‚ü®c', mds', mem [‚à•‚á©1 A]‚ü©"
  apply(erule inv.cases)
             using inv.intros apply (force, force, force, force, force, force, force, force, force)
        apply(rule inv‚á©3', clarsimp+)
        apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
        apply(cases "A z_var")
         apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
        apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
       apply(rule inv‚á©4, clarsimp+)
       apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
       apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
       apply(cases "A z_var")
        apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
       apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
      apply(rule inv‚á©4', clarsimp+)
      apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
      apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
      apply(cases "A z_var")
       apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
      apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
     apply(rule inv‚á©5, clarsimp+)
     apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
     apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
     apply(cases "A z_var")
      apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
     apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
    apply(rule inv‚á©5_then, clarsimp+)
    apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
    apply(cases "A z_var")
     apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
    apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
   apply(rule inv‚á©5_else, clarsimp+)
   apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
   apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
   apply(cases "A z_var")
    apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
   apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
  apply(rule inv‚á©6, clarsimp+)
  done

(* The "right-hand" side of inv_closed_glob_consistent *)
lemma inv_closed_glob_consistent_r:
  "inv ‚ü®c', mds', mem‚ü© ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx. case A x of None ‚áí True | Some (v, v') ‚áí mem x ‚â† v' ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds' x ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx. dma mem [‚à•‚á©2 A] x ‚â† dma mem x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds' x  ‚üπ
       inv ‚ü®c', mds', mem [‚à•‚á©2 A]‚ü©"
  apply(erule inv.cases)
               using inv.intros apply (force, force, force, force, force, force, force, force, force)
        apply(rule inv‚á©3', clarsimp+)
        apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
        apply(cases "A z_var")
         apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
        apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
       apply(rule inv‚á©4, clarsimp+)
       apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
       apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
       apply(cases "A z_var")
        apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
       apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
      apply(rule inv‚á©4', clarsimp+)
      apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
      apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
      apply(cases "A z_var")
       apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
      apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
     apply(rule inv‚á©5, clarsimp+)
     apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
     apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
     apply(cases "A z_var")
      apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
     apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
    apply(rule inv‚á©5_then, clarsimp+)
    apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
    apply(cases "A z_var")
     apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
    apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
   apply(rule inv‚á©5_else, clarsimp+)
   apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
   apply(erule_tac x=z_var in allE)
   apply(cases "A z_var")
    apply(simp add:apply_adaptation_def)
   apply(clarsimp simp add:var_asm_not_written_def dma_def apply_adaptation_def)
  apply(rule inv‚á©6, clarsimp+)
  done

lemma rel_inv_closed_glob_consistent:
  "(‚ü®c, mds', mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx a b.
          A x = Some (a, b) ‚ü∂
          (mem x = a ‚ü∂ mem' x ‚â† b) ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds' x ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx. dma mem [‚à•‚á©1 A] x ‚â† dma mem x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds' x ‚üπ
       ‚àÄx. dma mem [‚à•‚á©1 A] x = Low ‚àß (x ‚àà mds' AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚ü∂ x ‚àà ùíû) ‚ü∂
           mem [‚à•‚á©1 A] x = mem' [‚à•‚á©2 A] x ‚üπ
       (‚ü®c, mds', mem [‚à•‚á©1 A]‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem' [‚à•‚á©2 A]‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv"
  apply(safe elim!: rel_inv.cases)
  using rel_inv.intros dma_def by simp+

lemma R_closed_glob_consistent:
  "closed_glob_consistent R"
  unfolding closed_glob_consistent_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply(erule R.cases)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rule R.intros)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce simp: low_mds_eq_def)
    apply(rule inv_closed_glob_consistent)
      apply simp
     apply(fastforce split: option.splits)
    apply assumption
   apply(rule inv_closed_glob_consistent_r)
     apply simp
    apply(fastforce split: option.splits)
   apply(subgoal_tac "dma mem = dma mem' ‚àß dma mem [‚à•‚á©1 A] = dma mem' [‚à•‚á©2 A]")
    apply simp
   apply(rule conjI)
    apply(rule low_mds_eq_dma)
    apply assumption
   apply(rule dma_ùíû)
   apply(simp add: ùíû_Low)
  apply(rule rel_inv_closed_glob_consistent)
  apply(simp_all)
  apply(fastforce split: option.splits)
  done

lemma R_low_mds_eq:
  "(‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©) ‚àà R ‚üπ
        low_mds_eq mds mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2"
  apply(blast elim: R.cases)
  done

inductive_cases rel_invE: "(‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv"

method seq_decl_inv_method uses inv_rule rel_inv_rule =
 (erule rel_invE, simp+,
   drule seq_elim, simp,
   clarsimp,
   drule upd_elim, drule skip_elim, simp,
   clarsimp,
   rule conjI,
    rule eval‚á©w.seq,
    rule decl_eval‚á©w', simp+,
   rule R.intros, simp+,
      fastforce simp: low_mds_eq_def,
     rule inv_rule, simp+,
    rule inv_rule, simp+,
   rule rel_inv_rule, simp+)

method seq_stop_inv_method uses inv_rule rel_inv_rule =
 (erule rel_invE, simp+,
   drule seq_stop_elim, clarsimp,
   (rule exI)+,
   intro conjI,
    rule seq_stop_eval‚á©w,
   rule R.intros, (simp|clarsimp simp: low_mds_eq_def dma_def ev‚á©A.simps)+,
     (rule inv_rule; simp|blast?),
    (rule inv_rule; simp|blast?),
   rule rel_inv_rule, simp+)

method assign_inv‚á©6_method =
 (rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI,
  rule_tac x="mem‚á©2(x_var := ev‚á©A mem‚á©2 (Load y_var))" in exI,
  erule rel_invE, simp+,
  (drule assign_elim, simp,
   rule conjI,
    clarsimp simp: ev‚á©A.simps,
    erule_tac x=z_var in allE,
    clarsimp,
    rule assign_eval‚á©w', simp+,
    clarsimp simp: ev‚á©A.simps,
   rule R.intros, simp+,
      unfold low_mds_eq_def dma_def, clarsimp simp: ev‚á©A.simps,
     (rule inv‚á©6, simp+)+,
   rule rel_inv_z_initted, simp+)+)

lemma R_inv:
  notes ev‚á©A.simps[simp del]
  shows  "(‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©) ‚àà R ‚üπ
       (‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©1', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©) ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚üπ
       ‚àÉc‚á©2' mem‚á©2'.
          (‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©) ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚àß
          (‚ü®c‚á©1', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©) ‚àà R"
  apply(erule R.cases)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(erule inv.cases)
                 apply(unfold prog_high_branch_def)
                 apply clarsimp
                 apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI)
                 apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©2 in exI)
                 apply(seq_decl_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©1h' rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_start)
                apply(seq_stop_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©1y rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_start)
               apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI)
               apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©2 in exI)
               apply(seq_decl_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©1y' rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_start)
              apply(seq_stop_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©1z rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_start)
             apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI)
             apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©2 in exI)
