             apply(seq_decl_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©1z' rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_z_locked)
            apply(seq_stop_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©2 rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_z_locked)

           (* Assign ;; *)
           apply clarsimp
           apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI)
           apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2(y_var := ev‚á©A mem‚á©2 (Const 0))" in exI)
           apply(erule rel_invE, simp+)
            apply(drule seq_elim, simp)
            apply clarsimp
            apply(drule assign_elim, simp)
            apply(rule conjI)
             apply(rule eval‚á©w.seq)
             apply(rule assign_eval‚á©w)
            apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
               apply(unfold low_mds_eq_def dma_def, clarsimp simp: ev‚á©A.simps)
              apply(rule inv‚á©2', fast+)+
            apply(rule rel_inv_z_locked, simp+)
          apply(seq_stop_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©3 rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_z_locked)

         (* Assign ;; *)
         apply clarsimp
         apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI)
         apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2(z_var := ev‚á©A mem‚á©2 (Const 0))" in exI)
         apply(erule rel_invE, simp+)
          apply(drule seq_elim, simp)
          apply clarsimp
          apply(drule assign_elim, simp)
          apply(rule conjI)
           apply(rule eval‚á©w.seq)
           apply(rule assign_eval‚á©w)
          apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
             apply(unfold low_mds_eq_def dma_def, clarsimp simp: ev‚á©A.simps)
            apply(rule inv‚á©3', simp+)
            apply(simp add: ev‚á©A.simps)
           apply(rule inv‚á©3', simp+)
           apply(simp add: ev‚á©A.simps)
          apply(rule rel_inv_z_initted, simp+)
            apply(simp add: ev‚á©A.simps) (* do it separately so it doesn't mess everything else up *)
           apply simp+
        apply(seq_stop_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©4 rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_z_initted)

       (* Assign ;; *)
       apply clarsimp
       apply(rule_tac x=c‚á©1' in exI)
       apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2(x_var := ev‚á©A mem‚á©2 (Load y_var))" in exI)
       apply(erule rel_invE, simp+)
       apply(drule seq_elim, simp)
       apply clarsimp
       apply(drule assign_elim, simp)
       apply(rule conjI)
        apply(rule eval‚á©w.seq)
        apply(rule assign_eval‚á©w)
       apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
          apply(unfold low_mds_eq_def dma_def, clarsimp simp: ev‚á©A.simps)
         apply(rule inv‚á©4', simp+)+
       apply(rule rel_inv_z_initted, simp+)
      apply(seq_stop_inv_method inv_rule:inv‚á©5 rel_inv_rule:rel_inv_z_initted)

     (* (If (cond) Then Else) *)
     apply clarsimp
     apply(erule rel_invE, simp+)
     apply(rule_tac x="(if ev‚á©B mem‚á©2 (Neq (Load h_var) (Const 0))
                        then (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var)
                        else (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)))" in exI)
     apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2" in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
       apply(erule if_elim)
        apply clarify
        apply(rule if_eval‚á©w)
       apply clarify
       apply(rule if_eval‚á©w)
      apply(erule if_elim)
       apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
          apply(unfold low_mds_eq_def dma_def, clarsimp)
         apply(rule inv‚á©5_then, simp+)
        apply safe
         apply(rule inv‚á©5_then, simp+)
        apply(rule inv‚á©5_else, simp+)
       apply safe
        apply(rule rel_inv_z_initted, simp+)
       apply(rule rel_inv_if, simp, simp, simp, simp, simp)
 
     apply(rule R.intros, simp+)
        apply(unfold low_mds_eq_def dma_def, clarsimp)
       apply(rule inv‚á©5_else, simp+)
      apply safe
       apply(rule inv‚á©5_then, simp+)
      apply(rule inv‚á©5_else, simp+)
     apply safe
      apply(rule rel_inv_if', simp+)
     apply(rule rel_inv_z_initted, simp+)
 
    (* Assign - then | else *)
    apply assign_inv‚á©6_method
   apply assign_inv‚á©6_method
  using stop_no_eval by fastforce

lemma strong_low_bisim_mm_R:
  "strong_low_bisim_mm R"
  unfolding strong_low_bisim_mm_def
  proof(safe)
    show "sym R" by(rule R_sym)
  next
    show "closed_glob_consistent R" by(rule R_closed_glob_consistent)
  next
    fix c‚á©1 mds mem‚á©1 c‚á©2  mem‚á©2
    assume "(‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©) ‚àà R"
    thus "low_mds_eq mds mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2"
    by(rule R_low_mds_eq)
  next
    fix c‚á©1 mds mem‚á©1 c‚á©2  mem‚á©2 c‚á©1' mds' mem‚á©1'
    assume "(‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©) ‚àà R"
       and "(‚ü®c‚á©1, mds, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©1', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©) ‚àà eval‚á©w"
    thus "‚àÉc‚á©2' mem‚á©2'.
          (‚ü®c‚á©2, mds, mem‚á©2‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©) ‚àà eval‚á©w ‚àß
          (‚ü®c‚á©1', mds', mem‚á©1'‚ü©, ‚ü®c‚á©2', mds', mem‚á©2'‚ü©) ‚àà R"
       by(rule R_inv)
  qed

lemma prog_high_branch_secure':
  "low_mds_eq mds‚á©s mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2 ‚üπ
       (‚ü®prog_high_branch, mds‚á©s, mem‚á©1‚ü©, ‚ü®prog_high_branch, mds‚á©s, mem‚á©2‚ü©) ‚àà R"
  apply(rule R.intros)
  apply simp_all
   apply(rule inv‚á©1h)
     apply (simp_all add: mds‚á©s_def)
   apply(rule inv‚á©1h)
     apply (simp_all add: mds‚á©s_def)
  unfolding prog_high_branch_def by(fastforce intro: rel_inv.intros)

lemma "com_sifum_secure (prog_high_branch, mds‚á©s)"
  unfolding com_sifum_secure_def low_indistinguishable_def
  apply clarify
  apply(rule mm_equiv_intro)
   apply(rule strong_low_bisim_mm_R)
  by (rule prog_high_branch_secure')

end

locale sifum_refinement_high_branch =
  A: sifum_example +
  C: sifum_example‚á©C

primrec var‚á©C_of :: "var ‚áí var‚á©C"
where
  "var‚á©C_of h_var = h_mem" |
  "var‚á©C_of x_var = x_mem" |
  "var‚á©C_of y_var = y_mem" |
  "var‚á©C_of z_var = z_mem"

sublocale sifum_refinement_high_branch ‚äÜ
  sifum_refinement dma dma‚á©C ùíû_vars ùíû_vars ùíû ùíû‚á©C A.eval‚á©w C.eval‚á©w undefined var‚á©C_of
  apply(unfold_locales)
     apply(rule inj_onI, simp)
     apply(case_tac x)
         apply(case_tac y, simp+)
        apply(case_tac y, simp+)
       apply(case_tac y, simp+)
      apply(case_tac y, simp+)
    apply(case_tac x‚á©A)
       apply(clarsimp simp:dma_def dma‚á©C_def)+
  done

context sifum_refinement_high_branch begin

(* Adapted these helpers from Eg1Eg2 *)
lemma conc_only_vars_not_visible_abs:
  "(‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àà range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ mem‚á©C v‚á©C = mem‚á©C' v‚á©C) ‚üπ mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'"
  by (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)

lemma conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs:
  "‚àÄv‚á©C e. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C = mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C(v‚á©C := e))"
  using conc_only_vars_not_visible_abs
  by simp

lemma reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything:
  "reg ‚àà {reg0, reg1, reg2, reg3} ‚üπ reg = var‚á©C_of x ‚üπ False"
  by (induct x, clarsimp+)

lemma reg_not_visible_abs:
  "reg ‚àà {reg0, reg1, reg2, reg3} ‚üπ reg ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of"
  using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything
  by blast

(* Helpers carried over from Eg1Eg2 *)
lemma assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Load y, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := mem y)‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
  by (metis A.assign_eval‚á©w ev‚á©A.simps(2))

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Load y, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := mem y)‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.unannotated[OF C.assign, where E="[]", simplified]
  apply(drule_tac x=x in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x="Load y" in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mds in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mem in meta_spec)
  apply clarsimp
  done

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©A:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Const c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := c)‚ü©) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
  by (metis A.assign_eval‚á©w ev‚á©A.simps(1))

lemma assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C:
  shows "(‚ü®x ‚Üê Const c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®Stop, mds, mem (x := c)‚ü©) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.unannotated[OF C.assign, where E="[]", simplified]
  apply(drule_tac x=x in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x="Const c" in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mds in meta_spec)
  apply(drule_tac x=mem in meta_spec)
  apply clarsimp
  done

lemma mem_assign_refinement_helper_var:
  "mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x := mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y)))
       = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) (x := (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) y)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mem‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext, clarsimp)
  apply(cases x)
   apply(case_tac x‚á©A, clarsimp+)+
  done

lemma mem_assign_refinement_helper_const:
  "mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x := c))
       = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) (x := c)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mem‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext, clarsimp)
  apply(cases x)
      apply(case_tac x‚á©A, clarsimp+)+
  done

lemma NoRW‚á©A_implies_NoRW‚á©C:
  "x ‚àà mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚üπ
   var‚á©C_of x ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite"
  unfolding mds‚á©A_of_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp only: var‚á©C_of_def)
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp add: f_inv_into_f)
  done

lemma NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C:
  "x ‚àà mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C AsmNoWrite ‚üπ
   var‚á©C_of x ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoWrite"
  unfolding mds‚á©A_of_def
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp only: var‚á©C_of_def)
  apply clarsimp
  apply (simp add: f_inv_into_f)
  done

lemma if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©A:
  "(‚ü®If B T E, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B mem B then T else E, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w
    ‚üπ
   (‚ü®If B T E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B mem B then T ;; TAIL else E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
  using A.eval‚á©w.seq
  by auto

lemma if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©C:
  "(‚ü®If B T E, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B‚á©C mem B then T else E, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
    ‚üπ
   (‚ü®If B T E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©,
    ‚ü®if ev‚á©B‚á©C mem B then T ;; TAIL else E ;; TAIL, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  using C.eval‚á©w.seq
  by auto

fun aexp‚á©C_of
where
  "aexp‚á©C_of (Const c) = (Const c)" |
  "aexp‚á©C_of (Load v) = (Load (var‚á©C_of v))" |
  "aexp‚á©C_of (Add x y) = Add (aexp‚á©C_of x) (aexp‚á©C_of y)" |
  "aexp‚á©C_of (Sub x y) = Sub (aexp‚á©C_of x) (aexp‚á©C_of y)"

lemma mem_assign_refinement_helper_aexp:
  "mem‚á©A_of (mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x := ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (aexp‚á©C_of a)))
       = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) (x := ev‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C) a)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: mem‚á©A_of_def)
  apply(rule ext, clarsimp)
  apply(rename_tac x‚á©A)
  apply(cases x)
     apply(case_tac x‚á©A, induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
    apply(case_tac x‚á©A, induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
      apply(induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
   apply(case_tac x‚á©A, induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
    apply(induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
  apply(case_tac x‚á©A, induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
  apply(induct rule:aexp‚á©C_of.induct, clarsimp+)
  done

inductive_set rel_inv‚á©C :: "(((var‚á©C addr, var‚á©C aexp, var‚á©C bexp) Stmt, var‚á©C addr, val) LocalConf) rel"
where
  rel_inv‚á©C_1:
  "‚ü¶c =
     Skip ;;
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c' =
     Assign reg1 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_1':
  "‚ü¶c' =
     Skip ;;
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c =
     Assign reg1 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_2:
  "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c' =
     Stop ;;
     Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_2':
  "‚ü¶c' =
     Stop ;;
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c =
     Stop ;;
     Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_3:
  "‚ü¶c =
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c' =
     Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_3':
  "‚ü¶c' =
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c =
     Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_4:
  "‚ü¶c =
     Stop ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c' =
     Stop ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_4':
  "‚ü¶c' =
     Stop ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c =
     Stop ;;
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_5:
  "‚ü¶c =
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c' =
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_5':
  "‚ü¶c' =
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    c =
     Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0)‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" |
  rel_inv‚á©C_default:
  "‚ü¶c = c'‚üß ‚üπ
      (‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"

inductive_cases rel_inv‚á©CE: "(‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"

lemma rel_inv‚á©C_sym:
  "sym rel_inv‚á©C"
  unfolding sym_def
  apply(auto elim!: rel_inv‚á©C.cases intro: rel_inv‚á©C.intros)
  done

lemma rel_inv‚á©C_closed_glob_consistent:
  "C.closed_glob_consistent rel_inv‚á©C"
  unfolding C.closed_glob_consistent_def
  apply(safe elim!: rel_inv‚á©C.cases)
  using rel_inv‚á©C.intros by simp+

inductive_set RefRel_HighBranch :: "(
    (((var, var aexp, var bexp) Stmt √ó (Mode ‚áí var set)) √ó (var ‚áí val)) √ó
     ((var‚á©C, var‚á©C aexp, var‚á©C bexp) Stmt √ó (Mode ‚áí var‚á©C set)) √ó (var‚á©C ‚áí val)
    ) set"
where
  acq_mode_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = ModeDecl Skip (Acq x SomeMode) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = ModeDecl Skip (Acq (var‚á©C_of x) SomeMode) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  assign_load_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x ‚Üê aexp.Load y) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = ((var‚á©C_of x) ‚Üê aexp.Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoWrite;
    y ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    x ‚àâ ùíû;
    y ‚àâ ùíû;
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  assign_const_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x ‚Üê Const z) ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = ((var‚á©C_of x) ‚Üê Const z) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoWrite;
    x ‚àâ ùíû;
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_reg_load_rel: "‚ü¶
    c‚á©A = (If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else);
    c‚á©C = (reg3 ‚Üê (Load (var‚á©C_of x))) ;; ((If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else));
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß x ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    reg3 ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚àß reg3 ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚àÄx'. x ‚àà ùíû_vars x' ‚ü∂ x' ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    (‚àÄmem‚á©A' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©A'' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe change in ‚Äπmem‚á©C‚Ä∫ does not affect ‚Äπmem‚á©A‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe concrete and abstract versions of the bool condition must become consistent‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©B mem‚á©C' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; (If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; (If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch)
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_reg_stop_rel: "‚ü¶
    c‚á©A = (If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else);
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; ((If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else));
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß x ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπWe will need to carry this through to the ‚Äπif_reg_rel‚Ä∫ case.‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©B mem‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A (Neq (Load x) (Const 0));
    (‚àÄmem‚á©A' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©A'' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe change in ‚Äπmem‚á©C‚Ä∫ does not affect ‚Äπmem‚á©A‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe concrete and abstract versions of the bool condition must remain consistent‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©B mem‚á©C' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) ‚àß
         ev‚á©B mem‚á©C'' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®(If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A,
          ‚ü®(If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch)
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_reg_rel: "‚ü¶
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπIs a more generic version possible for an arbitrary ‚Äπb‚á©A‚Ä∫?‚Ä∫
    ‚å¶‚Äπc‚á©A = (If b‚á©A c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else);‚Ä∫
    ‚å¶‚Äπb‚á©A = Eq (Load x) (Const 0);‚Ä∫  ‚Äï ‚Äπ‚Äπev‚á©B mem‚á©A b‚á©A‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    c‚á©A = (If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else);
    c‚á©C = (If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    x ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß x ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe concrete and abstract versions of the bool condition must have remained consistent‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©B mem‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A (Neq (Load x) (Const 0));
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAs for ‚Äï ‚Äπif_reg_load_rel‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    reg3 ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoReadOrWrite ‚àß reg3 ‚àâ mds‚á©C GuarNoWrite;
    x ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚àÄx'. x ‚àà ùíû_vars x' ‚ü∂ x' ‚àâ mds‚á©A GuarNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAs we would expect, the two branches must be related by the coupling invariant.‚Ä∫
    ‚àÄmem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''. (‚ü®c‚á©C_then, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C_else, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C;
    (‚àÄmem‚á©A' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©A'' mem‚á©C''.
       mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
       mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
       ev‚á©B mem‚á©C'' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) ‚àß
       ev‚á©B mem‚á©C' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©A' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) ‚àß
       (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A,
        ‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0))) then c‚á©A_then else c‚á©A_else), mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
       (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
        ‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©C'' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0))) then c‚á©C_then else c‚á©C_else), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
       ‚ü∂
       (‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©A'' (Neq (Load x) (Const 0))) then c‚á©A_then else c‚á©A_else), mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,
        ‚ü®(if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©C'' (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0))) then c‚á©C_then else c‚á©C_else), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch)
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

(*
  Assign x_var (Load y_var)
    - to -
  Skip ;;
  Skip ;;
  Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
  Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
*)
  if_then_rel_1: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Skip ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_then_rel_1': "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
     Skip ;;
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_then_rel_2: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Skip ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )

    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_then_rel_2': "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
     Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;;
     Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_then_rel_3: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail = Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe value of ‚Äπreg0‚Ä∫ and ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫ must now become consistent‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_then_rel_3': "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail = Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe value of ‚Äπreg0‚Ä∫ and ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫ at this point must be consistent‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load y_var);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚Äπand must remain consistent‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_then_rel_4: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var);
    c‚á©C = Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπThe value of ‚Äπreg0‚Ä∫ and ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫ at this point must be consistent‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load y_var);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A''‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

(*
  Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))
    - to -
  Assign reg1 (Load y_mem) ;;
  Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
  Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
  Assign x_mem (Load reg0)
*)
  if_else_rel_1: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    c‚á©C = (reg1 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
      Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
      Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
      Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπNow ‚Äπreg1‚Ä∫ takes on ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_else_rel_1': "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
      Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
      Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
      Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAt this point ‚Äπreg1‚Ä∫ contains ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load y_var);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚Äπmaintain it‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_else_rel_2: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    c‚á©C = Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
      Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
      Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAt this point ‚Äπreg1‚Ä∫ contains ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load y_var);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚Äπmaintain it‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπNow ‚Äπreg2‚Ä∫ takes on ‚Äπz_var‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg2) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load z_var) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_else_rel_2': "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail =
      Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;;
      Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    z_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß z_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAt this point ‚Äπreg1‚Ä∫ contains ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫ and ‚Äπreg2‚Ä∫ contains z_var‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load y_var);
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg2) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load z_var);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚Äπmaintain it‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg2) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load z_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg2) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Load z_var) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_else_rel_3: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    c‚á©C = Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail = Assign x_mem (Load reg0);
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite);
    y_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß y_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    z_var ‚àà mds‚á©A AsmNoWrite ‚àß z_var ‚àâ mds‚á©A AsmNoReadOrWrite;
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπAt this point ‚Äπreg1‚Ä∫ contains ‚Äπy_var‚Ä∫ and ‚Äπreg2‚Ä∫ contains ‚Äπz_var‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load y_var);
    ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Load reg2) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A (Load z_var);
    ‚àÄmds‚á©A' mem‚á©A' mem‚á©A'' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C' mem‚á©C''.
        (
         mds‚á©A' = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' ‚àß
         mem‚á©A'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg1) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load y_var) ‚àß
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg2) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Load z_var) ‚àß
         ‚Äï ‚ÄπThus the value of ‚Äπreg0‚Ä∫ becomes consistent with ‚Äπy_var + z_var‚Ä∫‚Ä∫
         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A' (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)) ‚àß
         (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
        )
         ‚ü∂
         (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  if_else_rel_3': "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    c‚á©C_tail = Assign x_mem (Load reg0);

         ev‚á©A mem‚á©C'' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A mem‚á©A'' (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)) ‚àß

    ‚üß

  if_else_rel_4: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var));

        )

         (‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
    ‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  stop_seq_rel: "‚ü¶c‚á©A = Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail;
    c‚á©C = Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail;
    mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C;
    mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C;
    (‚ü®c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch‚üß
    ‚üπ
    (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" |

  stop_rel:
    "(‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"

inductive_cases RefRelE: "(‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"

definition abs_steps' :: "(_,_,_) Stmt ‚áí (_,_,_) Stmt ‚áí nat" where
  "abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C ‚â°
    (if (‚àÉx m c‚á©A_tail. c‚á©A = ((Skip@[x +=‚á©m m]) ;; c‚á©A_tail)) ‚àß
        (‚àÉx m c‚á©C_tail. c‚á©C = ((Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m m]) ;; c‚á©C_tail)) then (Suc 0)
     else if (‚àÉ c‚á©A_tail c‚á©C_tail. c‚á©A = (Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail) ‚àß c‚á©C = (Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail)) then (Suc 0)
     else if (‚àÉ x then‚á©A else‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C.
        c‚á©A = (Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A) ‚àß
        (c‚á©C = ((reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of x)) ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C)) ‚à®
         c‚á©C = (Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C))
        then 0
     else if (c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Load y_var) ‚àß
        c‚á©C ‚àà {Skip ;; Skip ;; Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Stop ;; Skip ;; Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Skip ;; Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Stop ;; Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Assign reg0 (Load y_mem) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Stop ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0)})
        then 0
     else if (c‚á©A = (x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)) ‚àß
        c‚á©C ‚àà {(reg1 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
                Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Stop ;; Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
                Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Assign reg2 (Load z_mem) ;;
                Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Stop ;;
                Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Assign reg0 (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0),
              Stop ;; Assign x_mem (Load reg0)})
        then 0
     else (Suc 0))"

fun abs_steps
where
"abs_steps ‚ü®c‚á©A, _, _‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü®c‚á©C, _, _‚ü©‚á©C = abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C"

lemma closed_others_RefRel_HighBranch:
  "closed_others RefRel_HighBranch"
unfolding closed_others_def
proof(clarify)
fix c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C mem‚á©C'
assume
  in_rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
    ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
  vars: " ‚àÄx. mem‚á©C x ‚â† mem‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
and  dmas: "‚àÄx. dma‚á©C mem‚á©C x ‚â† dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' x ‚ü∂ ¬¨ var_asm_not_written mds‚á©C x"
from in_rel vars dmas
show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
  proof (induct rule: RefRel_HighBranch.induct)
  case (acq_mode_rel c‚á©A x SomeMode tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using acq_mode_rel
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.acq_mode_rel)
  next
  case (assign_load_rel c‚á©A x y tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using assign_load_rel
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.assign_load_rel)
  next
  case (assign_const_rel c‚á©A x z tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using assign_const_rel
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.assign_const_rel)
  next
  case (if_reg_load_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_reg_load_rel
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_reg_load_rel)
  next
  case (if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_reg_stop_rel
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_reg_stop_rel.hyps(3,5,6) if_reg_stop_rel.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg3 = mem‚á©C' reg3" and
        x‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of x)" and
        x‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C x = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C
        by (clarsimp simp:var_asm_not_written_def, blast)+
      with if_reg_stop_rel.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "(mem‚á©C' reg3 = 0) = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x = 0)"
        by fastforce
      with if_reg_stop_rel RefRel_HighBranch.if_reg_stop_rel
      show "(‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        by auto
    qed
  next
  case (if_reg_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_reg_rel(1-11)
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_reg_rel.hyps(3,5,6) if_reg_rel.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg3 = mem‚á©C' reg3" and
        x‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of x)" and
        x‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C x = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C
        by (clarsimp simp:var_asm_not_written_def, blast)+
      with if_reg_rel.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "(mem‚á©C' reg3 = 0) = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' x = 0)"
        by auto
      show "(‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply (rule RefRel_HighBranch.if_reg_rel, simp+)
            using if_reg_rel apply simp
           using if_reg_rel apply simp
          using conds_still_match apply simp
         using if_reg_rel apply blast+
        done
    qed
  next
  case (if_then_rel_1 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_1
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_1)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_1' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_1'
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_1')
  next
  case (if_then_rel_2 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_2
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_2)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_2' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_2'
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_2')
  next
  case (if_then_rel_3 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_3
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_3)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_3' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_3'
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_then_rel_3'.hyps(4,5,6,7) if_then_rel_3'.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg0 = mem‚á©C' reg0" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by fastforce+
      with if_then_rel_3'.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "mem‚á©C' reg0 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Load y_var, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_3' if_then_rel_3' conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_then_rel_4 c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_then_rel_4
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_then_rel_4.hyps(3-7) if_then_rel_4.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg0 = mem‚á©C' reg0" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (fast, metis+)
      with if_then_rel_4.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "mem‚á©C' reg0 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Load y_var, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_then_rel_4 if_then_rel_4 conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_else_rel_1 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_1
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_1)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_1' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_1'
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_else_rel_1'.hyps(4-7) if_else_rel_1'.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg1 = mem‚á©C' reg1" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (metis (no_types) insertCI reg_not_visible_abs, metis+)
      with if_else_rel_1'.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "mem‚á©C' reg1 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; (reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;; (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_1' if_else_rel_1' conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_else_rel_2 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_2
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_else_rel_2.hyps(4-7) if_else_rel_2.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg1 = mem‚á©C' reg1" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (metis (no_types) insertCI reg_not_visible_abs, metis+)
      with if_else_rel_2.hyps
      have conds_still_match: "mem‚á©C' reg1 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®(reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;; (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_2 if_else_rel_2 conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_else_rel_2' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_2'
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_else_rel_2'.hyps(4-8) if_else_rel_2'.prems(1)
      have regs_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg1 = mem‚á©C' reg1 ‚àß mem‚á©C reg2 = mem‚á©C' reg2" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var" and
        z‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of z_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of z_var)" and
        z‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C z_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' z_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (metis (no_types) insertCI reg_not_visible_abs, metis+)
      with if_else_rel_2'.hyps(5,9,10)
      have conds_still_match: "mem‚á©C' reg1 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var ‚àß mem‚á©C' reg2 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' z_var"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_2' if_else_rel_2' conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_else_rel_3 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_3
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_else_rel_3.hyps(4-8) if_else_rel_3.prems(1)
      have regs_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg1 = mem‚á©C' reg1 ‚àß mem‚á©C reg2 = mem‚á©C' reg2" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var" and
        z‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of z_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of z_var)" and
        z‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C z_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' z_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (metis (no_types) insertCI reg_not_visible_abs, metis+)
      with if_else_rel_3.hyps(5,9,10)
      have conds_still_match: "mem‚á©C' reg1 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var ‚àß mem‚á©C' reg2 = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' z_var"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®(reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_3 if_else_rel_3 conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_else_rel_3' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_3'
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_else_rel_3'.hyps(4-8) if_else_rel_3'.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg0 = mem‚á©C' reg0" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var" and
        z‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of z_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of z_var)" and
        z‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C z_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' z_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (metis (no_types) insertCI reg_not_visible_abs, metis+)
      with if_else_rel_3'.hyps(5,9)
      have conds_still_match:
        "ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C') (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_3' if_else_rel_3' conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (if_else_rel_4 c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using if_else_rel_4
    proof (clarsimp)
      from if_else_rel_4.hyps(3-7) if_else_rel_4.prems(1)
      have reg_untouched: "mem‚á©C reg0 = mem‚á©C' reg0" and
        y‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of y_var)" and
        y‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C y_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' y_var" and
        z‚á©C_untouched: "mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of z_var) = mem‚á©C' (var‚á©C_of z_var)" and
        z‚á©A_untouched: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C z_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C' z_var"
        using reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything mem‚á©A_of_def NoWrite‚á©A_implies_NoWrite‚á©C var_asm_not_written_def
        by (metis (no_types) insertCI reg_not_visible_abs, metis+)
      with if_else_rel_4.hyps(4,8)
      have conds_still_match:
        "ev‚á©A mem‚á©C' (Load reg0) = ev‚á©A (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C') (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var))"
        by simp
      show "(‚ü®x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®(x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using RefRel_HighBranch.if_else_rel_4 if_else_rel_4 conds_still_match by simp
    qed
  next
  case (stop_seq_rel c‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  show "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using stop_seq_rel
    by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.stop_seq_rel)
  next
  case (stop_rel mds‚á©C mem‚á©C)
  show ?case by (simp add:RefRel_HighBranch.stop_rel)
  qed
qed

lemma preserves_modes_mem_RefRel_HighBranch:
  "preserves_modes_mem RefRel_HighBranch"
unfolding preserves_modes_mem_def2
proof(clarsimp)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C
  assume in_rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
  thus "mem‚á©A = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C ‚àß mds‚á©A = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C"
    by (cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases, blast+)
qed

lemma new_vars_private_RefRel_HighBranch:
  "sifum_refinement.new_vars_private dma‚á©C C.eval‚á©w var‚á©C_of RefRel_HighBranch"
unfolding new_vars_private_def
(* Slightly more intuitive goals without simp converting ‚à® to ‚ü∂ *)
proof(clarify)
  fix c‚á©A mds‚á©A mem‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©C mem‚á©C c‚á©C' mds‚á©C' mem‚á©C'
  assume in_rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
      does_eval: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
  let "?diff_mem v‚á©C" = "mem‚á©C' v‚á©C ‚â† mem‚á©C v‚á©C"
  let "?diff_dma v‚á©C" = "dma‚á©C mem‚á©C' v‚á©C < dma‚á©C mem‚á©C v‚á©C"
  let "?conc_only v‚á©C" = "v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of"
  show "(‚àÄv‚á©C. (?diff_mem v‚á©C ‚à® ?diff_dma v‚á©C) ‚àß ?conc_only v‚á©C ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite) ‚àß
         mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite - range var‚á©C_of ‚äÜ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite - range var‚á©C_of"
  using in_rel does_eval
  proof(cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases)
  case (acq_mode_rel x SomeMode tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    moreover with does_eval
    have "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C (SomeMode := insert (var‚á©C_of x) (mds‚á©C SomeMode))"
      by (metis (mono_tags) C.seq_decl_elim C.update_modes.simps(1))
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
  case (assign_load_rel x y tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(13) set_eq_subset)
  next
  case (assign_const_rel x z tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(13) set_eq_subset)
  next
  case (if_reg_load_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(13) set_eq_subset)
  next
  case (if_reg_stop_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.seq_stop_elim subset_refl)
  next
  case (if_reg_rel x then‚á©A else‚á©A then‚á©C else‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    have mds‚á©C_unchanged: "mds‚á©C = mds‚á©C'"
      by (metis C.if_elim C.seq_elim Stmt.distinct(39))
    moreover with if_reg_rel(5)
    have "‚àÄv‚á©C. (?diff_mem v‚á©C ‚à® ?diff_dma v‚á©C) ‚àß ?conc_only v‚á©C ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite"
      by simp
    moreover from mds‚á©C_unchanged
    have "mds‚á©C AsmNoReadOrWrite - range var‚á©C_of ‚äÜ mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite - range var‚á©C_of"
      by clarify
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
  case (if_then_rel_1 tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.eval‚á©w.seq C.eval_det C.seq_stop_elim C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w C.skip_eval‚á©w subsetI)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_1' tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.seq_stop_elim subsetI)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_2 tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.eval‚á©w.seq C.eval_det C.seq_stop_elim C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w C.skip_eval‚á©w subsetI)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_2' tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.seq_stop_elim subsetI)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_3 tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (full_types) C.seq_assign_elim subset_refl)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_3' tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.seq_stop_elim subsetI)
  next
  case (if_then_rel_4)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim order_refl)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_1 tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (full_types) C.seq_assign_elim subset_refl)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_1' tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.seq_stop_elim subsetI)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_2 tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (full_types) C.seq_assign_elim subset_refl)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_2' tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.seq_stop_elim subsetI)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_3 tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (full_types) C.seq_assign_elim subset_refl)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_3' tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) C.seq_stop_elim subsetI)
  next
  case (if_else_rel_4)
    with does_eval
    show ?thesis
      by (metis C.assign_elim order_refl)
  next
  case (stop_seq_rel tail‚á©A tail‚á©C)
    with does_eval C.seq_stop_elim
    show ?thesis by blast
  next
  case (stop_rel)
    with does_eval C.stop_no_eval have False by simp
    thus ?thesis by simp
  qed
qed

inductive_cases inR_E:
"(‚ü®c, mds, mem‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c', mds', mem'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R"

lemma refrel_helper_Acq_Rel_ex1I:
"
  (‚ü®(Skip@[x +=‚á©m SomeMode]) ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
      ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
  ‚üπ
  ‚àÉ!c‚á©C_tail.
  c‚á©2‚á©C = (Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m SomeMode]) ;; c‚á©C_tail ‚àß
        ((‚ü®(Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m SomeMode]) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C(SomeMode := insert (var‚á©C_of x) (mds‚á©C SomeMode)), mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
          ‚àà C.eval‚á©w)"
  apply(cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases)
       apply simp
      apply clarsimp
      apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
      apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C(SomeMode := insert (var‚á©C_of x) (mds‚á©C SomeMode))" in allE)
      apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
      apply(erule impE)
       apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in exI)
       apply(rule conjI)
        apply(rule HOL.refl)
       apply(rule conjI)
        apply(rule A.eval‚á©w.seq)
        apply(rule A.decl_eval‚á©w', rule HOL.refl, clarsimp)
        apply(rule mode_acquire_refinement_helper)
       apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
       apply(rule C.decl_eval‚á©w', rule HOL.refl, clarsimp)
      apply(rule_tac a=c‚á©C_tail in ex1I)
       apply clarsimp
        apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
        apply(rule C.decl_eval‚á©w', rule HOL.refl, clarsimp)
       apply blast+
  done

lemma refrel_helper_Assign_Load_ex1I:
"
  (‚ü®(x ‚Üê Load y) ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
      ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
  ‚üπ
  ‚àÉ!tail‚á©C.
  c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; tail‚á©C ‚àß
        ((‚ü®(var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y))‚ü©‚á©C)
          ‚àà C.eval‚á©w)"
  apply(cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases, simp+)
          apply clarsimp
          apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
          apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
          apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y))" in allE)
          apply(erule impE)
           apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in exI)
           apply(rule conjI)
            apply(rule HOL.refl)
           apply(rule conjI)
            apply(rule A.eval‚á©w.seq)
            apply(simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_var)
           apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
           apply(simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
          apply(rule_tac a=c‚á©C_tail in ex1I)
           apply clarsimp
           apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
           apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
          apply blast
         apply clarsimp
        apply(simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_var)
       apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
      apply(rule_tac a=c‚á©C_tail in ex1I)
       apply clarsimp
      apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
     apply blast
    apply(rule ex1I, clarsimp+)
  done


lemma refrel_helper_Assign_Const_ex1I:
"
  (‚ü®(x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
      ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
  ‚üπ
  ‚àÉ!tail‚á©C.
  c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©C ‚àß
        ((‚ü®(var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z)‚ü©‚á©C)
          ‚àà C.eval‚á©w)"
  apply(cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases, simp+)
          apply clarsimp
          apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
          apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
          apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z)" in allE)
          apply(erule impE)
           apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in exI)
           apply(rule conjI)
            apply(rule HOL.refl)
           apply(rule conjI)
            apply(rule A.eval‚á©w.seq)
            apply(simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_const)
           apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
           apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)
          apply(rule_tac a=c‚á©C_tail in ex1I)
           apply clarsimp
           apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
           apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)
          apply blast
         apply clarsimp
        apply(simp add: assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_var)
       apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)
      apply(rule_tac a=c‚á©C_tail in ex1I)
       apply clarsimp
      apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)
     apply blast
    apply(rule ex1I, clarsimp+)
  done

(* Could possibly be useful if we have one that just does seq *)
lemma refrel_helper_Assign_Const:
"
  (‚ü®(x ‚Üê Const z), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
      ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
  ‚üπ
  c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z) ‚àß
        ((‚ü®(var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
          ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z)‚ü©‚á©C)
          ‚àà C.eval‚á©w)"
  by (cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases, (simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C)+)

type_synonym t_Neq_C = "(var‚á©C aexp ‚áí var‚á©C aexp ‚áí var‚á©C bexp)"

lemma refrel_helper_If_Reg_Load_exI:
  "
  c‚á©C = (reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of x)) ;; Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C
  ‚üπ
  c‚á©2‚á©A = If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A
  ‚üπ
  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
    ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
   ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
  ‚üπ
  A.neval
     ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
     ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A
  ‚üπ
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπDistinguish between the different concrete cases‚Ä∫
  ‚Äï ‚Äπfor which the abstract program remains the same.‚Ä∫
  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C
  ‚üπ
  ‚àÉthen‚á©C' else‚á©C'.
  ((c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of x)) ;; Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C')
 ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
    ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg3 := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x))‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
)"
  apply(cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases, simp+)
       apply clarsimp
       apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg3 := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x))" in allE)
       apply(erule impE)
        apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in exI)
        apply(rule conjI)
         apply(simp add: conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs)
        apply(rule conjI)
         apply clarsimp
         apply(simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
        apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
        apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
       apply(rule C.eval‚á©w.seq)
       apply(simp add:assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C)
      apply(erule rel_inv‚á©CE, simp+)+
  done

lemma refrel_helper_If_Reg_Stop_exI:
  "
  c‚á©C = Stop ;; Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C
  ‚üπ
  c‚á©2‚á©A = If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A
  ‚üπ
  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
    ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
   ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch
  ‚üπ
  A.neval
     ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
     ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A
  ‚üπ
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπDistinguish between concrete cases for which abstract program remains the same.‚Ä∫
  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C
  ‚üπ
  ‚àÉthen‚á©C' else‚á©C'.
  ((c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C')
 ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
    ‚ü®Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
)"
  apply(cases rule:RefRel_HighBranch.cases, simp+)
      apply(erule rel_inv‚á©CE, simp+)+
     apply(rule C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w)+
    apply(erule rel_inv‚á©CE, simp+)+
  done

lemma refrel_helper_If_Reg_exI:
assumes
  conds_match: "ev‚á©B (sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) =
    ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0))" and
  rest_assms: "c‚á©C = Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C ‚àß
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπDistinguish between concrete cases for which abstract program remains the same.‚Ä∫
  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
shows
"
  ‚àÉthen‚á©C' else‚á©C'.
  ((c‚á©2‚á©C = Stmt.If ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C')
 ‚àß
   (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
    ‚ü®if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C ((Neq::t_Neq_C) (Load reg3) (Const 0))) then (then‚á©C') else (else‚á©C'),
                  mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
     ‚àà C.eval‚á©w
)"
  using rest_assms
  apply(clarsimp simp del:ev‚á©B.simps split del:if_splits)
  apply(erule rel_inv‚á©CE, (clarsimp simp del:ev‚á©B.simps split del:if_splits)+)
  apply(rule C.if_eval‚á©w)
  done

inductive_cases Skip_tail_RefRel_HighBranchE: "(‚ü®Skip ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©, ‚ü®Skip ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm Skip_tail_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases Stop_tail_RefRel_HighBranchE: "(‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©, ‚ü®Stop ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm Stop_tail_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases Acq_Mode_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(Skip@[x +=‚á©m SomeMode]) ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
  ‚ü®(Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m SomeMode]) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm Acq_Mode_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases Assign_Load_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(x ‚Üê aexp.Load y) ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
  ‚ü®((var‚á©C_of x) ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm Assign_Load_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases Assign_Const_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(x ‚Üê Const z) ;; c‚á©A_tail, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
  ‚ü®((var‚á©C_of x) ‚Üê Const z) ;; c‚á©C_tail, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm Assign_Const_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases If_Reg_Load_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
  ‚ü®(reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; ((If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else)), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm If_Reg_Load_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases If_Reg_Stop_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
  ‚ü®Stop ;; ((If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else)), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm If_Reg_Stop_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases If_Reg_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) c‚á©A_then c‚á©A_else), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
  ‚ü®((If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) c‚á©C_then c‚á©C_else)), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
thm If_Reg_RefRel_HighBranchE

inductive_cases If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(x_var ‚Üê Load y_var), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"

inductive_cases If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE:
"(‚ü®(x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)), mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"

inductive_cases inv‚á©5E:
"A.inv ‚ü®Assign x_var (Load y_var), mds, mem‚ü©"

inductive_cases inv‚á©6E:
"A.inv ‚ü®Assign x_var (Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)), mds, mem‚ü©"

lemma induction_full_RefRel_HighBranch:
  notes neq0_conv[simp del] neq0_conv[symmetric, simp add]
  shows
  "‚ü¶(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
         ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
        ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch;
        (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B‚üß
       ‚üπ ‚àÉn c‚á©1‚á©A'.
              A.neval
               ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A n
               ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of
                         mds‚á©C', sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
               ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
              (‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of
                            mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of
                            mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A)
                  ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of
                            mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©1‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A
                   n ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,
                       ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
proof(induct rule: RefRel_HighBranch.induct)
case (acq_mode_rel c‚á©A x m tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
  from acq_mode_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_acq: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  moreover from acq_mode_rel.prems acq_mode_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C(m := insert (var‚á©C_of x) (mds‚á©C m))" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    by (metis (mono_tags) C.seq_decl_elim C.update_modes.simps(1))+
  moreover from mds‚á©C'_def
  have mds‚á©A'_def: "?mds‚á©A' = A.update_modes (x +=‚á©m m) (mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C)"
    unfolding A.update_modes.simps
    by(blast intro: mode_acquire_refinement_helper)
  moreover with mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def acq_mode_rel A.eval‚á©w.seq A.decl_eval‚á©w
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    by presburger
  hence neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    by clarsimp
  moreover from acq_mode_rel(5)
  have mds‚á©C'_concrete_vars_unwritable:
    "(‚àÄv‚á©C. v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚ü∂ v‚á©C ‚àà mds‚á©C' AsmNoReadOrWrite)"
    by(auto simp: mds‚á©C'_def)
  moreover with acq_mode_rel(6)[simplified] acq_mode_rel.hyps(4) neval‚á©A c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by (metis A.neval_Suc_simp One_nat_def acq_mode_rel.prems)
  moreover have "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
           (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
           ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
           A.neval
            ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
            ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
           (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
               (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
