               (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
               ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
               (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
    proof(clarsimp)
      fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
      assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
        in_RefRel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
           ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
        in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
        eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
         ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A)
        ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
      let ?c‚á©2‚á©C' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©C"
      from in_rel_inv‚á©C acq_mode_rel(2) rel_inv‚á©CE
      have "c‚á©2‚á©C = (Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m m]) ;; tail‚á©C" by blast
      hence eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
        by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq C.decl_eval‚á©w' mds‚á©C'_def)
      from in_R acq_mode_rel(1)
      have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = (Skip@[x +=‚á©m m]) ;; tail‚á©A" by (blast elim:inR_E A.rel_invE)
      with acq_mode_rel(1,3,4)
      have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
        by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:A.eval‚á©w.seq A.decl_eval‚á©w' mds‚á©C'_def mode_acquire_refinement_helper)
      with eval‚á©2‚á©A acq_mode_rel(1,3,4)
      have c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = Stop ;; tail‚á©A" and
        mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
        using A.eval_det by blast+
      from acq_mode_rel(3) in_RefRel c‚á©2‚á©A_def refrel_helper_Acq_Rel_ex1I
      obtain tail‚á©C' where
        c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "c‚á©2‚á©C = (Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m m]) ;; tail‚á©C'" and
        eval‚á©2‚á©C': "(‚ü®(Skip@[var‚á©C_of x +=‚á©m m]) ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                   ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C(m := insert (var‚á©C_of x) (mds‚á©C m)), mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
        by blast
      have eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
        by(simp add: mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def eval‚á©2‚á©C')
      with eval_tail‚á©C C.eval_det have
        tails_eq: "tail‚á©C = tail‚á©C'" by blast
      moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      proof -
        from Acq_Mode_RefRel_HighBranchE[OF in_RefRel[simplified c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def acq_mode_rel(3)]]
        have "((‚ü®(Skip@[x +=‚á©m m]) ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of  mds‚á©C,  mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
                ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A)
               ‚àà A.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
              (‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
               ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval‚á©2‚á©C' mds‚á©C'_concrete_vars_unwritable
          by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) mds‚á©C'_def)
        hence "(‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
                ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
               ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using A.eval‚á©w.seq A.decl_eval‚á©w' mds‚á©C'_def A.update_modes.simps mode_acquire_refinement_helper
          by simp
        thus ?thesis
          by(simp add: c‚á©2‚á©C_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def)
      qed
      moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
        using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def tails_eq rel_inv‚á©C_default
        by simp
      moreover note eval_tail‚á©C
      ultimately show "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
              by blast
    qed
  thus ?case using in_Rel' abs_steps_acq neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (assign_load_rel c‚á©A x y tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from assign_load_rel(1) assign_load_rel(2)
  have abs_steps_load: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from assign_load_rel.prems assign_load_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y))"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from assign_load_rel(1,3,4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w" and
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using A.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_var abs_steps_load by simp+
  with assign_load_rel(11)[simplified] assign_load_rel.prems c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using assign_load_rel.hyps(4-5) mds‚á©C'_def by blast
  have
    "‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
    proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "(mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y)))"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C assign_load_rel(2) reg_is_not_the_var‚á©C_of_anything
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; tail‚á©C"
      by (blast elim:rel_inv‚á©CE)
    hence eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def)
    from assign_load_rel(1) in_R inR_E
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = (x ‚Üê aexp.Load y) ;; tail‚á©A"
      by (blast elim:inR_E A.rel_invE)
    hence c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
      and mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_load A.assign_elim A.seq_elim mem_assign_refinement_helper_var
      by fastforce+
    from assign_load_rel(3) in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def refrel_helper_Assign_Load_ex1I
    obtain tail‚á©C' where
      c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; tail‚á©C'" and
      eval‚á©2‚á©C': "(‚ü®(var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of y)) ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                 ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y))‚ü©‚á©C)
                ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by blast
    have eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                  ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of y))‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by(simp add: mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def eval‚á©2‚á©C')
    with eval_tail‚á©C C.eval_det have
        tails_eq: "tail‚á©C = tail‚á©C'" by blast
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                    ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      from Assign_Load_RefRel_HighBranchE[OF in_Rel[simplified c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def assign_load_rel(3)]]
      have "((‚ü®(x ‚Üê aexp.Load y) ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
              ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A)
             ‚àà A.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
            (‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
            ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©C'
        by (metis mds‚á©C'_def)
      hence "(‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
              ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using A.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©A mds‚á©C'_def A.update_modes.simps mem_assign_refinement_helper_var
        by simp
      thus ?thesis
        by(simp add: c‚á©2‚á©C_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def)
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def tails_eq rel_inv‚á©C_default
      by simp
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C eval_tail‚á©C'
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using in_Rel' abs_steps_load neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (assign_const_rel c‚á©A x z tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from assign_const_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_const: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from assign_const_rel.prems assign_const_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = Stop ;; tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z)"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from assign_const_rel(1,3,4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w" and
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using A.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©A mem_assign_refinement_helper_const abs_steps_const by simp+
  with assign_const_rel c‚á©1‚á©C'_def stop_rel mds‚á©C'_def
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" by blast
  have
    "‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
    proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "(mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z))"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C assign_const_rel(2) rel_inv‚á©CE
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©C" by blast
    moreover hence eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def)
    moreover from assign_const_rel(1) in_R inR_E
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = (x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©A"
      by (blast elim:inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
      and mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_const A.assign_elim A.seq_elim mem_assign_refinement_helper_const
      by fastforce+
    moreover from assign_const_rel(3) in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def refrel_helper_Assign_Const_ex1I
    obtain tail‚á©C' where c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "c‚á©2‚á©C = (var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©C'" and
      eval‚á©2‚á©C': "(‚ü®(var‚á©C_of x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                 ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z)‚ü©‚á©C)
                ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by blast
    have eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                  ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C((var‚á©C_of x) := z)‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by(simp add: mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def eval‚á©2‚á©C')
    with eval_tail‚á©C C.eval_det have
        tails_eq: "tail‚á©C = tail‚á©C'" by blast
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                    ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      from Assign_Const_RefRel_HighBranchE[OF in_Rel[simplified c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def assign_const_rel(3)]]
      have "((‚ü®(x ‚Üê Const z) ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A,
              ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A)
             ‚àà A.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
            (‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
            ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©C'
        by (metis mds‚á©C'_def)
      hence "(‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
              ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using A.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_const‚á©A mds‚á©C'_def A.update_modes.simps mem_assign_refinement_helper_const
        by simp
      thus ?thesis
        by(simp add: c‚á©2‚á©C_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def)
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def tails_eq rel_inv‚á©C_default
      by simp
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C eval_tail‚á©C'
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using in_Rel' abs_steps_const neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_reg_load_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_reg_load_rel.hyps(1,2)
  have abs_steps_if_reg_load: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_reg_load_rel.prems if_reg_load_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(reg3 := mem‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x))"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim C.skip_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from if_reg_load_rel(1-4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using reg_not_visible_abs conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs A.neval.intros(1) by simp+
  with if_reg_load_rel c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    apply clarsimp
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©1‚á©C' in allE)
    apply(erule_tac impE)
     apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©C in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply clarsimp
      apply (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
     using if_reg_load_rel.prems mem‚á©A_of_def apply blast
    apply clarsimp
    done
  (* This might be usable for an Isar proof of rel', but not sure how best to approach that *)
  from reg_not_visible_abs conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have mem‚á©1‚á©C'_conds_match: "(mem‚á©1‚á©C' reg3 = 0) = (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C' x = 0)"
    by simp
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
    proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "(mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg3 := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x)))"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_reg_load_rel(2) rel_inv‚á©CE
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of x)) ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C" by blast
    hence eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def)
    from if_reg_load_rel(1) in_R
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_if_reg_load A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+
    from if_reg_load_rel.hyps(2,3) c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def in_Rel neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_if_reg_load in_rel_inv‚á©C
         refrel_helper_If_Reg_Load_exI
    obtain then‚á©C' else‚á©C' where
      c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "(c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of x)) ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C')" and
      eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                 ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C',
                      mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg3 := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x))‚ü©‚á©C)
                ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by metis
    with eval_tail‚á©C C.eval_det have
      tails_eq: "else‚á©C = else‚á©C' ‚àß then‚á©C = then‚á©C'" by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_reg_load_rel(1-9)
    have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,
                    ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C',
                       mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg3 := mem‚á©2‚á©C (var‚á©C_of x))‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      from If_Reg_Load_RefRel_HighBranchE[OF in_Rel[simplified c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def if_reg_load_rel(1-9)]]
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©C'' = sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß
           (?mem‚á©2‚á©C' reg3 = 0) = (sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' x = 0) ‚àß
           (‚ü®(reg3 ‚Üê Load (var‚á©C_of x)) ;;
             Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
           ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A,
              sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
              ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"  
        by (metis neq0_conv)
      moreover have "(?mem‚á©2‚á©C' reg3 = 0) = (sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' x = 0)"
         using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def if_reg_load_rel(1-9)
         by simp
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where
        "sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©C'' = sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
        by simp
      ultimately have "(‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A,
              sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
            ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using c‚á©2‚á©C_def eval_tail‚á©C' if_reg_load_rel(1-9) conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs
        by auto
      thus ?thesis
      using if_reg_load_rel(1-9) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def reg_not_visible_abs
        by simp
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default tails_eq
      by simp
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C' eval_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_reg_load_rel.hyps(3) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_if_reg_load neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_reg_stop_rel.hyps(1,2)
  have abs_steps_if_reg_stop: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_reg_stop_rel.prems if_reg_stop_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by simp+
  from if_reg_stop_rel(1-4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using reg_not_visible_abs conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs A.neval.intros(1) by simp+
  with if_reg_stop_rel c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" by blast
  have
    "‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
    proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_reg_stop_rel(2) rel_inv‚á©CE
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C" by blast
    hence eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def)
    from if_reg_stop_rel in_R inR_E
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_if_reg_stop A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+
    from if_reg_stop_rel.hyps(2,3,7) c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def in_Rel neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_if_reg_stop in_rel_inv‚á©C
         refrel_helper_If_Reg_Stop_exI
    obtain then‚á©C' else‚á©C' where
      c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "(c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C')" and
      eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                 ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by metis+
    with eval_tail‚á©C C.eval_det have
      tails_eq: "else‚á©C = else‚á©C' ‚àß then‚á©C = then‚á©C'" by blast
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,
                    ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                   ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      from If_Reg_Stop_RefRel_HighBranchE[OF in_Rel[simplified c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def if_reg_stop_rel(3)]]
      have "(‚ü®Stop ;; Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
             ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                ‚àà C.eval‚á©w ‚ü∂
            (‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of
                       mds‚á©C, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
            ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using eval_tail‚á©C' mds‚á©C'_def
        by metis
      hence "(‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C, mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A,
             ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
            ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using c‚á©2‚á©C_def eval_tail‚á©C'
        by auto
      thus ?thesis
      using c‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def reg_not_visible_abs
        by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default tails_eq
      by simp
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C' eval_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_reg_stop_rel.hyps(3) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using in_Rel' abs_steps_if_reg_stop neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_reg_rel c‚á©A x then‚á©A else‚á©A c‚á©C then‚á©C else‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©A (Neq (Load x) (Const 0))) then (then‚á©A) else (else‚á©A)"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_reg_rel(1) if_reg_rel(2)
  have abs_steps_if_reg: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_reg_rel.prems if_reg_rel(2)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0))) then (then‚á©C) else (else‚á©C))" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    apply simp_all
    by (erule C.if_elim, clarsimp+)+
  from if_reg_rel(1,3,4) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    using if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©A A.if_eval‚á©w by presburger
  hence neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using abs_steps_if_reg by simp
  from if_reg_rel(3,4,7,12) if_reg_rel.prems c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def eval‚á©A
  have in_Rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by clarsimp
  have
    "‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
    proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_reg_rel(2) rel_inv‚á©CE
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C" by blast
    hence eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
        ‚ü®if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)))
         then (then‚á©C) else (else‚á©C), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B"
      by (blast intro:C.if_eval‚á©w if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©C)
    from if_reg_rel(1-10) in_R inR_E
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = If (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) then‚á©A else‚á©A"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = (if (ev‚á©B (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)))
         then (then‚á©A) else (else‚á©A))" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A if_seq_eval‚á©w_helper‚á©A A.if_eval‚á©w if_reg_rel(1-4) A.eval_det
      by blast+
    from in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_rel_inv‚á©C if_reg_rel(2)
    have mem‚á©2‚á©C_reg_mem‚á©A_x: "ev‚á©B (mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C) (Neq (Load x) (Const 0)) = ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0))"
      apply -
      apply(erule RefRelE, simp_all)
      by (erule rel_inv‚á©CE, simp+)
    with if_reg_rel.hyps(2,3,7) c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def in_Rel eval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_if_reg in_rel_inv‚á©C
         refrel_helper_If_Reg_exI
    obtain then‚á©C' else‚á©C' where
      c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "(c‚á©2‚á©C = Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C' else‚á©C')" and
      eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
                 ‚ü®if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)))
                  then (then‚á©C') else (else‚á©C'), mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by blast
    with eval_tail‚á©C C.eval_det have
      tails_eq: "else‚á©C = else‚á©C' ‚àß then‚á©C = then‚á©C'"
      by (simp add: ‚Äπc‚á©2‚á©C = Stmt.If (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then‚á©C else‚á©C‚Ä∫)
    let ?c‚á©2‚á©C' = "if (ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0))) then (then‚á©C') else (else‚á©C')"
    have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      from in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def if_reg_rel(3,7,9) eval_tail‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
           eval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_if_reg
      have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w ‚ü∂
            (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Reg_RefRel_HighBranchE)
        apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©2‚á©C in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©2‚á©C in allE)
        apply(clarsimp split del: if_split)
        by presburger
      hence "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using c‚á©2‚á©C_def eval_tail‚á©C' mds‚á©C'_def
        by auto
      thus ?thesis
      using c‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def reg_not_visible_abs
        by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
    proof -
      have "(‚ü®if ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then then‚á©C' else else‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C,
             ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚à®
            (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C,
             ‚ü®if ev‚á©B mem‚á©2‚á©C (Neq (Load reg3) (Const 0)) then then‚á©C' else else‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
             ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
        using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_reg_rel.hyps(11) mds‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C.rel_inv‚á©C_default tails_eq by auto
      thus ?thesis
        by (meson rel_inv‚á©C_sym symE)
    qed
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C' eval_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using mds‚á©C'_def by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using in_Rel' abs_steps_if_reg neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_1 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_1.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_1.prems if_then_rel_1(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_elim C.skip_elim by blast+
  from if_then_rel_1(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.intros(1) by auto
  with if_then_rel_1 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg1 := mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem)"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "(reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;;
                (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_1(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg1 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_1(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_1(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq C.skip_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_1(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_1(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      by (clarsimp, meson C.eval‚á©w.seq C.skip_eval‚á©w)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®(reg1 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_1(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg1 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_then_rel_1.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß
           (‚ü®(reg1 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg1 := mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem)" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_1(3) rel_inv‚á©C_2 by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_1.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_1 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_1.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_1.prems if_else_rel_1(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(reg1 := mem‚á©C y_mem)"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from if_else_rel_1(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs by simp+
  with if_else_rel_1 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    apply clarsimp
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©A in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mds‚á©C in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©1‚á©C' in allE)
    apply(erule_tac impE)
     apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©C in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply clarsimp
      apply (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
     using if_else_rel_1.prems mem‚á©A_of_def apply blast
    apply clarsimp
    done
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg1 := mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem)"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "Skip ;;
                (reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_1(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_1(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_1(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq C.skip_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_1(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by clarsimp
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_then: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      with in_then in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_else_rel_1.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
        by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_1(2,3) rel_inv‚á©C_2' mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_1(2,3))
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_1(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_else_rel_1.hyps(1-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="?mem‚á©2‚á©C'" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_1.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_1' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_1'.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_1'.prems if_then_rel_1'(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by blast+
  from if_then_rel_1'(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.intros(1) by auto
  with if_then_rel_1' c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "(reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;;
                (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_1'(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_1'(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_1'(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_1'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_1'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      by (clarsimp, meson C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_1'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_1'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_then_rel_1'.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
        using eval_else_tail‚á©C by blast+
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_1'(3) rel_inv‚á©C_3 by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_1'.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_1' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_1'.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_1'.prems if_else_rel_1'(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by blast+
  from if_else_rel_1'(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 by simp+
  with if_else_rel_1' c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "Skip ;; (reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_1'(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_1'(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_1'(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_1'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by clarsimp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_1'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_else_rel_1'.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_1'(2,3) rel_inv‚á©C_3' mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_1'(2,3))
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_1'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_1'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_1'(1) have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_else_rel_1'.hyps(1-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
        using eval_else_tail‚á©C by blast+
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_1'.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_2 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_2.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_2.prems if_then_rel_2(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_elim C.skip_elim by blast+
  from if_then_rel_2(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.intros(1) by auto
  with if_then_rel_2 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg2 := mem‚á©2‚á©C z_mem)"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "(reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_2(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_2(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_2(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq C.skip_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_2(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_2(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      by (clarsimp, meson C.eval‚á©w.seq C.skip_eval‚á©w)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®(reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_2(1-6)
