    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_then_rel_2.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß
           (‚ü®(reg2 ‚Üê Load z_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="?mem‚á©2‚á©C'" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_2(3) rel_inv‚á©C_4 by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_2.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_2 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_2.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_2.prems if_else_rel_2(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(reg2 := mem‚á©C z_mem)"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from if_else_rel_2(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs by simp+
  with if_else_rel_2 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    apply clarsimp
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©A in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mds‚á©C in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©1‚á©C' in allE)
    apply(erule_tac impE)
     apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©C in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply clarsimp
      apply (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
     using if_else_rel_2.prems mem‚á©A_of_def apply blast
    apply clarsimp
    done
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg2 := mem‚á©2‚á©C z_mem)"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "(reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_2(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_2(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_2(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq C.skip_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_2(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by clarsimp
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_else_rel_2.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Skip ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C" in allE)
        by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_2(2,3) rel_inv‚á©C_4' mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_2(2,3))
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_2(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_else_rel_2.hyps(1-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="?mem‚á©2‚á©C'" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_2.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_2' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_2'.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_2'.prems if_then_rel_2'(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by blast+
  from if_then_rel_2'(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.intros(1) by auto
  with if_then_rel_2' c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "(reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_2'(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_2'(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_2'(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_2'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_2'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      by (clarsimp, meson C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_2'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_then_rel_2'.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval_else_tail‚á©C by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_2'(3) rel_inv‚á©C_5 by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_2'.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_2' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_2'.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_2'.prems if_else_rel_2'(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by blast+
  from if_else_rel_2'(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 by simp+
  with if_else_rel_2' c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "(reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; (x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_2'(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_2'(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_2'(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_2'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by clarsimp
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_else_rel_2'.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_2'(2,3) rel_inv‚á©C_5' mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_2'(2,3))
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_2'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_2'(1) have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_else_rel_2'.hyps(1-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval_else_tail‚á©C by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_2'.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_3 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_3.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_3.prems if_then_rel_3(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(reg0 := mem‚á©C y_mem)"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from if_then_rel_3(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs by simp+
  with if_then_rel_3 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    apply clarsimp
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©A in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mds‚á©C in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©1‚á©C' in allE)
    apply(erule_tac impE)
     apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©C in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply clarsimp
      apply (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
     using if_then_rel_3.prems mem‚á©A_of_def apply blast
    apply clarsimp
    done
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg0 := mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem)"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg0 := ev‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©C (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)))"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_3(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_3(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_3(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C by simp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_3(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_then: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      from in_then c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_3(1) have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
        by clarsimp
      with in_then in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_then_rel_3.hyps(2-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t ‚àß
           (‚ü®(reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg0 := mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem)" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t" by simp
      moreover note c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def if_then_rel_3(1-3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_then_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by fast
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®(reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using C.eval‚á©w.seq C.assign_eval‚á©w' ev‚á©A.simps mds‚á©C'_def by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_3(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_3(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_then_rel_3.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e ‚àß
           (‚ü®(reg0 ‚Üê Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C mem‚á©A_of_def by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_3(3) rel_inv‚á©C_default by clarsimp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_3.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_3 c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_3.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_3.prems if_else_rel_3(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = (Stop ;; tail‚á©C)" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(reg0 := ev‚á©A mem‚á©C (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)))"
    using C.seq_elim C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) Stmt.distinct(13))+
  from if_else_rel_3(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs by simp+
  with if_else_rel_3 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    apply clarsimp
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©A in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mds‚á©C in allE)
    apply(erule_tac x=mem‚á©1‚á©C' in allE)
    apply(erule_tac impE)
     apply(rule_tac x=mem‚á©C in exI)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply(clarsimp)
     apply(rule conjI)
      apply clarsimp
      apply (simp add: mem‚á©A_of_def)
     using if_else_rel_3.prems mem‚á©A_of_def apply blast
    apply clarsimp
    done
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg0 := mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem)"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(reg0 := ev‚á©A mem‚á©2‚á©C (Add (Load reg1) (Load reg2)))"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_3(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_3(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®(reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_3(2,3) C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C by simp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_3(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = (reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by clarsimp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_3(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_then: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      with c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_else_rel_3.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t ‚àß
           (‚ü®(reg0 ‚Üê Load y_mem) ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_then_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by fast
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_t‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_3(2,3) rel_inv‚á©C_default mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using C.eval‚á©w.seq C.assign_eval‚á©w' ev‚á©A.simps mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_3(2,3) by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_3(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_3(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_else_rel_3.hyps(1-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        apply clarsimp
        apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
        apply(erule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C''" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="mds‚á©C" in allE)
        apply(erule_tac x="?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e" in allE)
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs reg_not_visible_abs mem‚á©A_of_def eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using conc_only_var_assign_not_visible_abs eval_else_tail‚á©C reg_not_visible_abs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'_e‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_3.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_3' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_3'.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_3'.prems if_then_rel_3'(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by blast+
  from if_then_rel_3'(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.intros(1) by auto
  with if_then_rel_3' c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_3'(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_3'(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_3'(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_3'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_3'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_then: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      from in_then c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_3'(1) have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
        by clarsimp
      with in_then in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_then_rel_3'.hyps(2-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      moreover note c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def if_then_rel_3'(1-3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_then_tail‚á©C by fast
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_3'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_3'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_then_rel_3'.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval_else_tail‚á©C by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_3'(3) rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_3'.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_3' c‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "c‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_3'.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 0"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_3'.prems if_else_rel_3'(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by blast+
  from if_else_rel_3'(1-5) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    mem‚á©A_unchanged: "?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = mem‚á©A"
    using A.neval.neval_0 by simp+
  with if_else_rel_3' c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           neval‚á©2‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 0 ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    let ?tail‚á©2‚á©C = "x_mem ‚Üê Load reg0"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_3'(2-3)
    have "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C ‚à®
          c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_3'(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover hence
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = c‚á©2‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
      using neval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_this A.neval_ZeroE
      by (clarsimp, blast)+

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'then' branch *)
    moreover have eval_then_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_3'(2,3) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by blast
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_3'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by clarsimp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_3'(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_then_def
    have "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©A"
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_then_def if_else_rel_3'.hyps(4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®Stop ;; ?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by (blast elim: If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using eval_then_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®?tail‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_3'(2,3) rel_inv‚á©C_default mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def by simp

    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'else' branch *)
    moreover have eval_else_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (simp del:fun_upd_apply add:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w mds‚á©C'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_3'(2,3))
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def in_Rel in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_3'(1-6)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE rel_inv‚á©CE)
    moreover have "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚üπ (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    proof -
      assume in_else: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A"
      from in_else c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_3'(1) have
        c‚á©2‚á©A_else_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
        by clarsimp
      with in_else in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_else_def if_else_rel_3'.hyps(1-4) c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
      have "(‚àÉmem‚á©C''.
           mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C ‚àß
           (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C''‚ü©‚á©C,
            ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w) ‚ü∂
             (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
        using eval_else_tail‚á©C by (blast elim: If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE)
      moreover obtain mem‚á©C'' where "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C'' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using eval_else_tail‚á©C by auto
    qed
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp

    moreover note eval_then_tail‚á©C eval_else_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_3'.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_then_rel_4 c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_then_rel_4.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_then_rel_4.prems if_then_rel_4(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = Stop" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(x_mem := mem‚á©C reg0)"
    using C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by metis+
  from if_then_rel_4(1-7) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w" and
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using A.assign_eval‚á©w' ev‚á©A.simps(2) mem_assign_refinement_helper_const var‚á©C_of.simps(2) abs_steps_this
    by (metis, simp, metis)
  with if_then_rel_4 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(x_mem := mem‚á©2‚á©C reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_4(2-3)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_4(1-4,6) in_R
    have z‚á©A: "mem‚á©A z_var = 0"
      using A.prog_high_branch_def inR_E inv‚á©5E
      by (metis if_then_rel_4.hyps(6))
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_then_rel_4(1-4) in_R
    have "mem‚á©A z_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C z_var"
      using inR_E A.low_mds_eq_def dma_def emptyE inv‚á©5E var.distinct(5)
      by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams))
    with z‚á©A have z‚á©2‚á©A: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C z_var = 0"
      by simp

    moreover from in_R if_then_rel_4(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Add (Load y_var) (Load z_var)"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)

    from in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©C_def if_then_rel_4(1,2,3) in_rel_inv‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A_def z‚á©2‚á©A
    have r0y: "mem‚á©2‚á©C reg0 = mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem"
      apply clarsimp
      apply(case_tac "c‚á©A = c‚á©2‚á©A")
       apply clarsimp
       apply(erule If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
       using mem‚á©A_of_def apply force
      apply clarsimp
      apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
      using mem‚á©A_of_def by force

    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = Stop"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A A.assign_elim if_then_rel_4(1)
      by (case_tac "c‚á©A = c‚á©2‚á©A", clarsimp+)

    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_4(1-7) have
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A_def mds‚á©C'_def
      apply clarsimp
      apply(case_tac "c‚á©A = c‚á©2‚á©A")
       apply clarsimp
       apply(drule A.assign_elim)
       apply clarsimp
       using r0y apply clarsimp
       using mem‚á©A_of_def
       apply (metis mem_assign_refinement_helper_const var‚á©C_of.simps(2) var‚á©C_of.simps(3))
      apply clarsimp
      apply(drule A.assign_elim)
      apply clarsimp
      using r0y z‚á©2‚á©A apply clarsimp
      using mem‚á©A_of_def 
      apply (metis mem_assign_refinement_helper_const var‚á©C_of.simps(2) var‚á©C_of.simps(3))
      done

    moreover have eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_then_rel_4(2,3) c‚á©2‚á©C_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C by simp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_then_rel_4(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      by (meson RefRel_HighBranch.stop_rel)
    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp
    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_4(3) rel_inv‚á©C_default by clarsimp
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_then_rel_4.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (if_else_rel_4 c‚á©A c‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "Stop"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from if_else_rel_4.hyps(1-3)
  have abs_steps_this: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from if_else_rel_4.prems if_else_rel_4(2,3)
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = Stop" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C(x_mem := mem‚á©C reg0)"
    using C.assign_elim assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C
    by metis+
  from if_else_rel_4(1-8) mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have eval‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w" and
    neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A"
    using A.assign_eval‚á©w' ev‚á©A.simps(2) mem_assign_refinement_helper_const var‚á©C_of.simps(2) abs_steps_this
    by (metis, simp, metis)
  with if_else_rel_4 c‚á©1‚á©C'_def mds‚á©C'_def mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def
  have rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A',?mds‚á©A',?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A,‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C',mds‚á©C',mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    by blast
  have
    "(‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C))"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    let ?mem‚á©2‚á©C' = "mem‚á©2‚á©C(x_mem := mem‚á©2‚á©C reg0)"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_4(2-3)
    have c‚á©2‚á©C_def: "c‚á©2‚á©C = c‚á©C"
      by (blast elim: rel_inv‚á©CE)
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_4(1-4,6) in_R
    have z‚á©A: "mem‚á©A z_var = 0"
      using A.prog_high_branch_def inR_E inv‚á©6E
      by (metis if_else_rel_4.hyps(6))
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C if_else_rel_4(1-4) in_R
    have "mem‚á©A z_var = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C z_var"
      using inR_E A.low_mds_eq_def dma_def emptyE inv‚á©6E var.distinct(5)
      by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams))
    with z‚á©A have z‚á©2‚á©A: "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C z_var = 0"
      by simp

    moreover from in_R if_else_rel_4(1) inR_E A.rel_invE have
      c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = c‚á©A ‚à® c‚á©2‚á©A = x_var ‚Üê Load y_var"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)

    from in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©C_def if_else_rel_4(1,2,3) in_rel_inv‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A_def z‚á©2‚á©A
    have r0y: "mem‚á©2‚á©C reg0 = mem‚á©2‚á©C y_mem"
      apply clarsimp
      apply(case_tac "c‚á©A = c‚á©2‚á©A")
       apply clarsimp
       apply(erule If_Else_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
       using mem‚á©A_of_def apply force
      apply clarsimp
      apply(erule If_Then_RefRel_HighBranchE, simp+)
      using mem‚á©A_of_def by force

    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def have
      c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = Stop"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A A.assign_elim if_else_rel_4(1)
      by (case_tac "c‚á©A = c‚á©2‚á©A", clarsimp+)

    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_4(1-7) have
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'"
      using eval‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©A_def mds‚á©C'_def
      apply clarsimp
      apply(case_tac "c‚á©A ‚â† c‚á©2‚á©A")
       apply clarsimp
       apply(drule A.assign_elim)
       apply clarsimp
       using r0y apply clarsimp
       using mem‚á©A_of_def
       apply (metis mem_assign_refinement_helper_const var‚á©C_of.simps(2) var‚á©C_of.simps(3))
      apply clarsimp
      apply(drule A.assign_elim)
      apply clarsimp
      using r0y z‚á©2‚á©A apply clarsimp
      using mem‚á©A_of_def 
      apply (metis mem_assign_refinement_helper_const var‚á©C_of.simps(2) var‚á©C_of.simps(3))
      done

    moreover have eval_tail‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      using if_else_rel_4(2,3) c‚á©2‚á©C_def c‚á©1‚á©C'_def C.eval‚á©w.seq assign_eval‚á©w_load‚á©C by simp
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A'_def mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def c‚á©2‚á©A_def if_else_rel_4(1-8) c‚á©1‚á©C'_def
    have "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A, mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      by (meson RefRel_HighBranch.stop_rel)
    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is also in the 'then' branch *)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def rel_inv‚á©C_default by simp
    (* c‚á©2‚á©C is in the other, 'else' branch *)
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®Stop, mds‚á©C, ?mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_4(3) rel_inv‚á©C_default by clarsimp
    moreover note eval_tail‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A'_def
    ultimately show "(‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
      using mds‚á©C'_def if_else_rel_4.hyps(1-6) by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_this neval‚á©A by blast
next
case (stop_seq_rel c‚á©A tail‚á©A c‚á©C tail‚á©C mds‚á©A mds‚á©C mem‚á©A mem‚á©C)
  let ?c‚á©1‚á©A' = "tail‚á©A"
  let ?mds‚á©A' = "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C'"
  let ?mem‚á©1‚á©A' = "mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1‚á©C'"
  from stop_seq_rel(1,2)
  have abs_steps_stop: "(abs_steps' c‚á©A c‚á©C) = 1"
    by (simp add:abs_steps'_def)
  from stop_seq_rel
  have c‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "c‚á©1‚á©C' = tail‚á©C" and
    mds‚á©C'_def: "mds‚á©C' = mds‚á©C" and
    mem‚á©1‚á©C'_def: "mem‚á©1‚á©C' = mem‚á©C"
    using C.seq_stop_elim by auto
  hence neval‚á©A: "A.neval ‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A 1 ‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A" and
    rel': "(‚ü®?c‚á©1‚á©A', ?mds‚á©A', ?mem‚á©1‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
    using stop_seq_rel A.seq_stop_eval‚á©w by auto
  have "‚àÄc‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'.
                  (‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C)
                  ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                  (‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C ‚àß
                  A.neval
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, sifum_refinement.mem‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A 1
                   ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A ‚ü∂
                  (‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
                      ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
                      (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C)"
  proof(clarsimp)
    fix c‚á©2‚á©A c‚á©2‚á©C mem‚á©2‚á©C c‚á©2‚á©A' mem‚á©2‚á©A'
    assume in_R: "(‚ü®c‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.R" and
           in_Rel: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch" and
           in_rel_inv‚á©C: "(‚ü®c‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C" and
           eval‚á©2‚á©A: "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A, mds‚á©A, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A) ‚àà A.eval‚á©w"
    from in_rel_inv‚á©C stop_seq_rel(2) obtain tail‚á©C' where c‚á©2‚á©C_def:
      "c‚á©2‚á©C = Stop ;; tail‚á©C'"
      by (blast elim:rel_inv‚á©CE)
    hence eval_tail‚á©C': "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà C.eval‚á©w"
      by (blast intro:C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w)
    moreover from stop_seq_rel(1) in_R inR_E
    have c‚á©2‚á©A_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A = Stop ;; tail‚á©A"
      by (blast elim: inR_E A.rel_invE)
    moreover from c‚á©2‚á©A_def
    have c‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "c‚á©2‚á©A' = tail‚á©A" and
      mem‚á©2‚á©A'_def: "mem‚á©2‚á©A' = mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2‚á©C"
    using eval‚á©2‚á©A abs_steps_stop A.seq_stop_elim
      by simp+
    moreover with c‚á©2‚á©C_def have
      "(‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
      using in_Rel c‚á©2‚á©A_def c‚á©2‚á©C_def mds‚á©C'_def Stop_tail_RefRel_HighBranchE C.seq_stop_eval‚á©w
      by blast
    moreover have "(‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®tail‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using c‚á©1‚á©C'_def in_rel_inv‚á©C stop_seq_rel(2) c‚á©2‚á©C_def
      by (blast elim:rel_inv‚á©CE intro:rel_inv‚á©C.intros)
    ultimately show "‚àÉc‚á©2‚á©C' mem‚á©2‚á©C'.
              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C, mds‚á©C, mem‚á©2‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà sifum_lang_no_dma.eval‚á©w ev‚á©A ev‚á©B ‚àß
