              (‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©A', sifum_refinement.mds‚á©A_of var‚á©C_of mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©A'‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C)
              ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch ‚àß
              (‚ü®c‚á©1‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©1‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®c‚á©2‚á©C', mds‚á©C', mem‚á©2‚á©C'‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà rel_inv‚á©C"
      using mds‚á©C'_def by blast
  qed
  thus ?case using rel' abs_steps_stop neval‚á©A by blast
next
case stop_rel
  with C.stop_no_eval have False by simp
  thus ?case by simp
qed

lemma RefRel_HighBranch_secure_refinement:
  "secure_refinement A.R RefRel_HighBranch rel_inv‚á©C"
  apply(unfold secure_refinement_def2)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule closed_others_RefRel_HighBranch)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule preserves_modes_mem_RefRel_HighBranch)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule new_vars_private_RefRel_HighBranch)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule rel_inv‚á©C_closed_glob_consistent)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rule induction_full_RefRel_HighBranch, simp+)
  done

lemma strong_low_bisim_mm_R‚á©C_of_R:
  "C.strong_low_bisim_mm (R‚á©C_of A.R RefRel_HighBranch rel_inv‚á©C)"
  apply(rule R‚á©C_of_strong_low_bisim_mm)
    apply(rule A.strong_low_bisim_mm_R)
   apply(rule RefRel_HighBranch_secure_refinement)
  apply(rule rel_inv‚á©C_sym)
  done

definition
  mds‚á©0 :: "Mode ‚áí var‚á©C set"
where
  "mds‚á©0 ‚â° Œªm. case m of AsmNoReadOrWrite ‚áí {reg0, reg1, reg2, reg3} |
                        AsmNoWrite ‚áí {} |
                        _ ‚áí {}"

lemma regs_the_only_concrete_only_vars:
  "v‚á©C ‚àâ range var‚á©C_of ‚üπ v‚á©C ‚àà {reg0, reg1, reg2, reg3}"
  by (case_tac v‚á©C, (clarsimp|metis rangeI var‚á©C_of.simps)+)

lemma prog_high_branch_RefRel:
  "(‚ü®A.prog_high_branch, mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0, mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©A, ‚ü®C.prog_high_branch‚á©C, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©C‚ü©‚á©C) ‚àà RefRel_HighBranch"
  unfolding A.prog_high_branch_def C.prog_high_branch‚á©C_def mds‚á©0_def
  using regs_the_only_concrete_only_vars doesnt_have_mode has_mode‚á©A NoRW‚á©A_implies_NoRW‚á©C
  apply clarsimp

  apply(rule acq_mode_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_decl_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)

  apply(rule acq_mode_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_decl_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)

  apply(rule acq_mode_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_decl_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)

  apply(rule assign_const_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)
  
  apply(rule assign_const_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)

  apply(rule assign_load_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule stop_seq_rel, simp+)

  apply(rule if_reg_load_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, clarsimp)
  apply(rule if_reg_stop_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)

  apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, clarsimp)

  apply(rule if_reg_rel, (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(rule rel_inv‚á©C_1, clarsimp+)
  apply(rule conjI)

   (* Then *)
   apply clarsimp
   apply(rule if_then_rel_1, (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.if_elim, simp+)
   apply(drule C.seq_elim, simp+)
   apply(drule C.skip_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule if_then_rel_1', (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule if_then_rel_2, (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.seq_elim, simp+)
   apply(drule C.skip_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule if_then_rel_2', (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule if_then_rel_3, (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule if_then_rel_3', (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule if_then_rel_4, (simp|clarsimp)+)
   apply(drule C.assign_elim, simp+)
   apply(rule stop_rel)

  (* Else *)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(rule if_else_rel_1, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.if_elim, simp+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule if_else_rel_1', (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule if_else_rel_2, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule if_else_rel_2', (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule if_else_rel_3, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_assign_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule if_else_rel_3', (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.seq_stop_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule if_else_rel_4, (simp|clarsimp)+)
  apply(drule C.assign_elim, simp+)
  apply(rule stop_rel)
  done

lemma mds‚á©s_A_of_mds‚á©0:
  "mds‚á©s = mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0"
  apply(rule preserves_modes_mem_mds‚á©A_simp)
  apply clarsimp
  apply(case_tac m)
     unfolding mds‚á©s_def mds‚á©0_def mds‚á©A_of_def
     apply(clarsimp simp: reg_not_visible_abs)+
  done

lemma A_of_mds‚á©0_is_mds‚á©s:
  "mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0 = mds‚á©s"
  by (simp add: mds‚á©s_A_of_mds‚á©0)

lemma prog_high_branch‚á©C_in_R‚á©C_of_R:
  "C.low_mds_eq mds‚á©0 mem‚á©1 mem‚á©2 ‚üπ
       (‚ü®C.prog_high_branch‚á©C, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©1‚ü©‚á©C, ‚ü®C.prog_high_branch‚á©C, mds‚á©0, mem‚á©2‚ü©‚á©C)
        ‚àà (R‚á©C_of A.R RefRel_HighBranch rel_inv‚á©C)"
  apply(clarsimp simp: R‚á©C_of_def)
  apply(rule_tac x=A.prog_high_branch in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0" in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©1" in exI)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule prog_high_branch_RefRel)
  apply(rule_tac x=A.prog_high_branch in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mds‚á©A_of mds‚á©0" in exI)
  apply(rule_tac x="mem‚á©A_of mem‚á©2" in exI)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule prog_high_branch_RefRel)
  apply(simp add: A_of_mds‚á©0_is_mds‚á©s)
  apply(rule conjI)
   apply(rule A.prog_high_branch_secure')
   apply(clarsimp simp: A.low_mds_eq_def)
   apply(case_tac x)
   unfolding C.low_mds_eq_def mem‚á©A_of_def dma_def dma‚á©C_def ùíû‚á©C_def mds‚á©0_def
   apply clarsimp+
  apply(rule rel_inv‚á©C_default, simp)
  done

lemma "C.com_sifum_secure (C.prog_high_branch‚á©C, mds‚á©0)"
  unfolding C.com_sifum_secure_def C.low_indistinguishable_def
  apply clarify
  apply(rule C.mm_equiv_intro)
   apply(rule strong_low_bisim_mm_R‚á©C_of_R)
  by (rule prog_high_branch‚á©C_in_R‚á©C_of_R)

end

end
